62b5(phal chen): chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa dag
62b6(phal chen): sngan chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs// 'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa'i rnams// sprin chen cher bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad// bskal po brjod du med par/
62b7(phal chen): rgyal bas sngon// smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing // 'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen// 'khyil ba zhes bya chu klung lha dga' 'o// 'gro
63a1(phal chen): dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul sgoms shing // mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyongs// yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta// de la dri
63a2(phal chen): med mig gi lha yang mos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni// kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi// sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i
63a3(phal chen): yid rnam thar 'di ni sgra dbyangs sgrog pas thos// bskoskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don du// sngan chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong // de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten
63a4(phal chen): mdzes// lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dga'// rgyal ba sngan chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho
63a5(phal chen): sdug bsngal 'jil// zhi byed chu klung lha mi des dga' 'o// sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang // 'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing // rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs
63a6(phal chen): pa yongs su bsal// kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo // thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na// yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung // rgyal bas
63a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de// rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'// sgrib pa'i glong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri// 'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas/
63b1(phal chen): mkha' mnyam 'od kyi sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o// sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste// bsod nams zhing ri 'dus byas sdug
63b2(phal chen): bsngal 'dor// byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad// rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no// de la lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyi rnam pa
63b3(phal chen): thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes
63b4(phal chen): pra'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar pa
63b5(phal chen): nI/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha madrangs kyi drung mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni
63b6(phal chen): snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lhas kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni
63b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par bskyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha gtsug pud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam/
64a1(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lU yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/
64a2(phal chen): sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha smos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par
64a3(phal chen): thar pa ni/ chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gau lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams
64a4(phal chen): cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri
64a5(phal chen): ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o// de nas ma
64a6(phal chen): tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
64a7(phal chen): dag smras so// rang byung ye shes sngon ma skyes pas ni// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te// ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed// bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs
64b1(phal chen): rgyus bla na med// sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sbyin// 'gro bya kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed// dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha na
64b2(phal chen): 'di la 'jug/ bde gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas// 'gro ba dag na'i chos kyi legs pas mdzes// 'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam par snang // stobs dang gzug
64b3(phal chen): kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i// thugs rje rgya mtsho sngan chad rnam sbyangs pas// de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// de ni mangs
64b4(phal chen): mthong lnga yis rab tu mthong // thabs rnams kun gyi sgo nas don yod par// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyad gyur cing // 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad// 'di ni
64b5(phal chen): thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to// 'gro ba 'di ni mos yangs gang yod pa// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'o// nags
64b6(phal chen): tshal rgyan gyi gtsug pung de la 'jug/ 'jig rten rnams la byams pa ched skyed de// sems can rnams la phran phyir rang byung skyes// lam rab dge ba'i ni ba rab tu ston// zhib
64b7(phal chen): sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to// phyogs su sems can yongs smin byed pa'i tshe// bde gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa// byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung
65a1(phal chen): spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so// rgyal ba 'jig rten yid du myong ba spong // dga' ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu skyed// 'gro ba kud kyi dbang po rnam
65a2(phal chen): par sbyong // dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags// skye bo kun gyi bsam pa des mkhyen te// sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba longs smid
65a3(phal chen): mdzad// rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to// / de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab
65a4(phal chen): tu gnon pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha tsan dad gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ blta ba don yod pas sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o// sman gyi lha
65a5(phal chen): 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal
65a6(phal chen): mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o// smad gyi lha spu'i glong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nad thams
65a7(phal chen): cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rngam par skyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba mdongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi
65b1(phal chen): le shes kyi mig rnam par drug par byed ba zhes bya'o// sran gyi n+ya sna dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas ngod kyi dbyis 'byung ba rna
65b2(phal chen): bya'o// sman gyi lha'i ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bras yang dag par skul ba zhes bya'o//
65b3(phal chen): sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// smar gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed
65b4(phal chen): ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nang rab tu zhi bar byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de nas sman gyi lnga phur sum
65b5(phal chen): tshogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spyan gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas
65b6(phal chen): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen// thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas// sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grel//
65b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab// de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod// skye dgu rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// can dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to//
66a1(phal chen): sngan chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos// bskul pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang // srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med// de la rdul med 'ong
66a2(phal chen): kyi lha 'jug go// rgyal ba bskal pa stong drug brgya dag tu// mthong zhing mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon// tshul rnams kun tu rang byung ngon yod de// de la rgyal mtshan
66a3(phal chen): mchog ni de ltar 'jug/ rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang // nad las rab tu 'grel pa'i 'od bkye bas// 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad// spu mang
66a4(phal chen): rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no// sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba rtag tu mdongs shing rab tu rmongs gyur rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam
66a5(phal chen): par sbyong // de ni mun dang bral ba'i lces mthong ngo // rgyal bya'i gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' las pa'i// chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung // de ni sems
66a6(phal chen): can mo lus kun kyang shes// 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// srid par sems can yongs su smi ni byas pa/
66a7(phal chen): de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang // nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste// 'gro ba kun phan don du de skyes so// 'gro ba
66b1(phal chen): kun la las rnamam shin tu // don phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so// sangs rgyas 'gro bang rnams kyi 'od las bya// phyogs rnams thams chung gA lus su thub d+hA/
66b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes mya dran pa'i gzi brjid bskyed// mngangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to// / de la nags tshal gyi lho ya lA ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni
66b3(phal chen): ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// nags tshul gyi sgyu 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i khyod kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen
66b4(phal chen): kun nas spungs pa'i shugs shes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lnga myu gu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa ste tshogs kyi myu gru rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par
66b5(phal chen): byed pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i 'phreng ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su myong zhing rnam par sgom pa
66b6(phal chen): zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam
66b7(phal chen): bar dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par
67a1(phal chen): 'jug pa'i chos kyi ston mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal mi l+h+wam sbyang yang du 'ong ba'i dbyas kyi rnas pa bya ba/ sems nas sa cang/
67a2(phal chen): kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po dang ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod ba rgya
67a3(phal chen): chen po'i dkyil 'khor skyeng pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi nyid rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
67a4(phal chen): thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyas pa yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// nags tshul gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro'i 'od kyi
67a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o// de nas nags tshul gyi lha la lags
67a6(phal chen): tshogs kyi sprin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltos nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
67a7(phal chen): bsod nams stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams dang // sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung // stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin// 'gro ba kun na 'phags
67b1(phal chen): shing rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba thams cad med kyi thugs rje'i s+ho// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// bla tshogs sgyus 'ong /
67b2(phal chen): rnam thar 'di la 'jug/ sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag/ mos pargya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston// myu gu yid 'ong /
67b3(phal chen): kyi rnam thar yin// rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor// bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// rnam thar 'di ni 'phreng ba'i dpal
67b4(phal chen): gyis mthong // sngan chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams// zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran// kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs// yal ga khyod kyi
67b5(phal chen): brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud// rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu langs// sna tshogs rgyan
67b6(phal chen): gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung // dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par bskyed// sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes// 'di ni sgra rnams
67b7(phal chen): sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing // sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung // rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston// kun tu/
68a1(phal chen): dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug/ ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams// myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag/ de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen
68a2(phal chen): lam ston// 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can ma rungs sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams// bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan mi bder gshegs
68a3(phal chen): skad cig gcig gis lta// ri li 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo // / de la ri'i lho rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam ga
68a4(phal chen): zhi zhing yangs la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba bsam gyis
68a5(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyun ces bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par
68a6(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o// ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med
68a7(phal chen): pa'i gtsug bud kyi rnam par thar pa ni bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi
68b1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' las pa'i spang ba rnam par bskun pa ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med bu'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa 'i/
68b2(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o// rI'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chagus pa
68b3(phal chen): thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyun gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
68b4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam
68b5(phal chen): gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun nus sra ba rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho chen po mtha' yas pa dang
68b6(phal chen): 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa
68b7(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos// sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas sbyang //
69a1(phal chen): rnam thar zhing gi rdul med bsgom mdzad pas// 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i thugs kyang bskyed// sangs rgyas spyanas dri meng dbul dbye ba// yan lag mtshan spyan
69a2(phal chen): 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston// nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnamathar to// sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' las 'gro bar mdzon//
69a3(phal chen): rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags// dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'// rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug/ rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig
69a4(phal chen): rten chos ma chags// bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo// sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor bas ma lus 'dul// dga' ba dri med gtsug pud rnam thar to// 'jig rten
69a5(phal chen): kun ni mdongs gyur mun stug zhugs// thugs rje de rab sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing // 'gro khams yun rings nyal ba sad par mdzad// rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to//
69a6(phal chen): srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod che// zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas// de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod// zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang
69a7(phal chen): lha 'jug pa'o// las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing bsgribs pa'i rnams// srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas// de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal/
69b1(phal chen): gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems so// rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun// phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskam
69b2(phal chen): ba kun tu gnas// 'od mang rdul gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go// sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang // sna tshogs thabs kyis
69b3(phal chen): 'jig rten chos kyang stod// tshul mngon mig gi lha yos de thos so// chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zang tshang med pa// sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung // bskal pa/
69b4(phal chen): kun brjod 'jig rten mngal ston// rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug/ de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/
69b5(phal chen): skad cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha bsod nams brten pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par
69b6(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyud ces bya'o// sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs
69b7(phal chen): bsgom pas rnam par dpyod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i migo rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i
70a1(phal chen): sbyor ba zhes d+hag/ sa'i lha gse kyi mig gi dpal gyi ram par ba bdi/ lus thams cad yongs su ga byar byed pa'i tshul son pa ni sa bya'o//
70a2(phal chen): lha spu las spros kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed bu'i rnam par gyur ba ni/ sa sa rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par som pa brjod pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha sgra dbyangs/
70a3(phal chen): ying du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thur pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha me tog gi glong sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud kyi rnam par
70a4(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tham
70a5(phal chen): cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyis rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lho khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa nI/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang
70a6(phal chen): dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyan bsgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i
70a7(phal chen): lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis/
70b1(phal chen): brjo du da dpa ma rung rdzun tharnams dang // byams pan na 'ang mi dang brnams pas // dbyar s+yas nas rgyum ma shigs sa// dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems cad yang
70b2(phal chen): nas sa dang // ji nang byung chub sems dngu'i bsod nams dag/ rgyal ba'i sku gcig de med bsod nams 'di// bso mas dri mthong drub tu dgalta bar 'gyur// 'byu
70b3(phal chen): med cing byon pa gang yang med// ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs// sems can rgyan gyis 'di rab tu ston// 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin ni// sngan
70b4(phal chen): chad thub pas spyod pa spyang pa dang // 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par bzlog pa ni// rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te// rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o// de bzhin gshegs
70b5(phal chen): ba'i sa ni mtha' yas te// 'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig skyon// dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa lI lha// dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta// sangs rgyas
70b6(phal chen): gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab// sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas
70b7(phal chen): mngal lha// sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su// phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad// mu las dri nim 'od kyis yi lho// sangs rgyas se
71a1(phal chen): can 'dul ba de la lha// phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing // 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskul bar brjod// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyang
71a2(phal chen): sa li lha// rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan// rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi// spros kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkrung zhing // sems can ma
71a3(phal chen): lus yongs su smin mdzad pa// me tog gtsug pud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje lta bu ste// mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra// 'gro ba kun
71a4(phal chen): gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus// rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o// // de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa yang dag
71a5(phal chen): par sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rgyar rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
71a6(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha smyos pa'i mya ngan thams
71a7(phal chen): cad spong bas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar
71b1(phal chen): par/ shes rab kyis kung tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa'o// grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ thabs kyi sgo krung ras spyod pa'i mthu zhes bya'o//
71b2(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha bsod drams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i
71b3(phal chen): khyod kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems cad rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug bud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa
71b4(phal chen): ni/ nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
71b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o// de nas grong khyer gyi lho rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i
71b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// snang bya brnyes shing
71b7(phal chen): phyogs su rnam par mdzes// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du sdang // sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te/
72a1(phal chen): de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen// rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'// rgyal bas bskal pa
72a2(phal chen): mtha' yas yang dag spyad// sngan chang rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung // dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob// 'gro ba
72a3(phal chen): 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing // de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chung sems can rnams// kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog/ nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'/
72a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te// tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas// mar me me tog 'od kyi lha dga'
72a5(phal chen): 'o// de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan// de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu bsgom pa yis// mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab
72a6(phal chen): tu dga'// bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs// de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas// bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de
72a7(phal chen): rab tu dga'// srid pa rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams// 'khor gyur rab rib mdongs pa gzigs pas na// de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung // dri med 'od kyis/
72b1(phal chen): rnam thar 'di thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos// 'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dpung yang med// de dag bstan cing 'gro la rnam par 'dul// spos kyi
72b2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can rmongs pa mur pas mdongs gyur cing // rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes
72b3(phal chen): 'gyur// rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug// de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyad gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtsharan gyi rngam par thar pa ri/ sangs
72b4(phal chen): rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi sngon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad
72b5(phal chen): dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyong pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'jug snga grogs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems
72b6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston cing / rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bad
72b7(phal chen): pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyad ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i
73a1(phal chen): ma dA thur ban+d+ha/ 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phran snam tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o//
73a2(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi 'phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug bud kyi rnam par thar pa ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mi dran pa ston pa 'byung ba
73a3(phal chen): zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' ya swa pA la yang dag par 'jug
73a4(phal chen): bzhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa chos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o//
73a5(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub
73a6(phal chen): lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i khyod kyi rnam par thar pa ni byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs
73a7(phal chen): rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o// de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge badri
73b1(phal chen): bya med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i cha/
73b2(phal chen): tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa mang po mtha' dang dpung med par// de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sdom srung dran// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
73b3(phal chen): cing bsgrubs bstan// de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i tshad// zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par// mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas/
73b4(phal chen): sngo yi 'od kyi lha de ni// bde gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa// de dag zhing rnams kun tu
73b5(phal chen): rarAbA n+tu/ 'gro bar snangs rgyas rmi las bzhin rgyan cing // sbyin gyi ste dbyungs lnga de rab kyangag/ mtha' las bskal bar dka' bar rab kyang ngo /
73b6(phal chen): 'i sbyi myos 'phrul ldan pa'i bya// rgyamatsho'i spyan pa yongs su can pa // de la ma tog migs
73b7(phal chen): tan rin chen 'ong 'gro mtha' las smin/ 'gro ba kun tu ming po byang chub ras/ rab tu brtse ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis
74a1(phal chen): 'od 'gro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste// de la rdul ba chos kyi chur snang 'bebras// ji ltar myos par/
74a2(phal chen): nem nur rnam par sel// de yi gtsug phyud 'byung ba dga' ba thob// rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o// chos don
74a3(phal chen): dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// rgya mtshor tho dad yang dag shes pas 'jug/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du// 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas//
74a4(phal chen): de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags// de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran// mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan//
74a5(phal chen): rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni// byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la// phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de// pad+mos
74a6(phal chen): ning gsal ba'i lha de ni// rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga' 'o// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab// snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grags// yang
74a7(phal chen): dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni// thams cad sna tshogs sdang ba'i 'od nyan to// de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba
74b1(phal chen): yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi su 'od zer gyi kha dog bad+mo'i drab
74b2(phal chen): thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug pud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshes
74b3(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang rgyun 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du sems
74b4(phal chen): can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa nri/ skad cig gcig gis pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul pa
74b5(phal chen): byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang / dbyangs dang / snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs spyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i shugs
74b6(phal chen): dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'i// rkang gis 'gro shing tsan dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin du
74b7(phal chen): ldang ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad+mo ying du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba bskyed pa zhes
75a1(phal chen): bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba byed pa zhes bya'o//
75a2(phal chen): rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtswa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par skul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
75a3(phal chen): de nas rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su
75a4(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing // bskal pa mtha' yas sngan chud spyod pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun rdul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i//
75a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thabs kyis mcho de// skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yas pa// dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sprul mdzad nas// zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs/
75a6(phal chen): mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer lta des rab tu mthong // 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab// 'khor rnams kun tu 'byam klas mtha' yas pa'i// rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu
75a7(phal chen): ston// me tog gtsug pung lha des de mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis// sems can mtha' yas yongs
75b1(phal chen): su smin par mdzad// shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo // sems can sbed kyi sprul ba kun 'phros pa// re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs// rin chen dri med 'od kyang
75b2(phal chen): rab tu gtong // rkang 'gro dbul gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs po'i spyod yul mtha' yas te// 'khor du rgyal po chos kyi chur yang 'bebs// bde gshegs
75b3(phal chen): de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing // dga' sgra dbyangs kyis rnam thar de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan/
75b4(phal chen): 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul// tsan ngan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan// spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang // dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi
75b5(phal chen): rnams// sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te// de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs su bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gom pa gom par yon tan rgya
75b6(phal chen): mtsho ston// de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong // rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo // 'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis// phyogs bcur sems can
75b7(phal chen): yang dag bskul bar mdzad// me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu 'thob/ de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha
76a1(phal chen): khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa n+di/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o//
76a2(phal chen): lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus
76a3(phal chen): kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la rjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga'
76a4(phal chen): ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi
76a5(phal chen): rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro
76a6(phal chen): ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thur pa ni/ sems can thams cad
76a7(phal chen): gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyi dga' ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems
76b1(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su srung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems
76b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang rmongs pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam
76b3(phal chen): pur thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal
76b4(phal chen): mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang dgu par 'dzin cing yang drag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o//
76b5(phal chen): de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams
76b6(phal chen): cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag smras so// ri rab rdul phran shin tu phra snyed kyi// bskal ba de dag pa snga'i bskal pa ni// rdul ces bya bar 'od
76b7(phal chen): mdzes 'od zer rgyal// mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran// sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba// de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu// rgyal ba'i 'od
77a1(phal chen): zer dra ba sems can 'dul// 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo // dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu/
77a2(phal chen): sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul// dbyangs kyis 'dul ba de la dga' bar nyan// rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos// sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// 'gro ba/
77a3(phal chen): kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang // me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong // 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du// la la bzhugs dang
77a4(phal chen): bzhengs dang gshegs par mthong // de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas// dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye bas/
77a5(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur// dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung // nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug bsngal gzir ba'i rnams/
77a6(phal chen): mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil// snang ba'i 'phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon// rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes
77a7(phal chen): pa ni// 'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel// khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra// sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing // bdud kyi lam gyis dkrugs te 'phyar
77b1(phal chen): ba'i rnams// de dag rgyal ba'i rnam thar lam gyon te// bsrung nang myong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ltos// sa sa rgyas m+b+hi
77b2(phal chen): gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing // 'jig rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul// kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo// de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen
77b3(phal chen): kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi su rnam par dpyod pa yang dgu par ston pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi
77b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog
77b5(phal chen): 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul pa zhes bya'o// lago na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam
77b6(phal chen): bar thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig
77b7(phal chen): rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i
78a1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra
78a2(phal chen): dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyun yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje song ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/
78a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par
78a4(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sems can ma rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs lhur rab tu sbyin cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug bud pad+me 'od kyi
78a5(phal chen): rnam par shang ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po cha thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lags
78a6(phal chen): rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzong po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus log na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nus/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'ang
78a7(phal chen): dag rnams// chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi// chos nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon tam mtha' las sku gzugs kyis// 'jig rten kun tu rnam par mdzes// @
78b1(phal chen): ba spu thams cad nas// 'od zer drab bsam mi khyab// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ste// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis// chos kyi dbyings/
78b2(phal chen): su khyab byas shing // 'gro ba kun la mngon sum du// mi zad su ni shin tu stod// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog/ gsung gis sems can rloms
78b3(phal chen): cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs// 'jig rten dbang po kun gnas nA// thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang // de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la// 'dren pa dag ni chos
78b4(phal chen): ston mdzad// rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston// rgya chen mtha' med
78b5(phal chen): tshul dag la// rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas// kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar gyur// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs
78b6(phal chen): rgyas kun mchod pas// bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin// kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa// thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad// 'gro/
78b7(phal chen): la sangs rgyas mngon sum du// byang chub snying por rnam par mdzes// 'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang // chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing /
79a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston// bam po lnga pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa/
79a2(phal chen): ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / 'gro ba la
79a3(phal chen): mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par
79a4(phal chen): thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sgro thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su
79a5(phal chen): bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi
79a6(phal chen): rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yang dag par
79a7(phal chen): ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub
79b1(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par stod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rang gi lus kyi/
79b2(phal chen): sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du snyan pa rgya chen pos thams
79b3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsum gyis mi
79b4(phal chen): khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su
79b5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs// mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa// de la
79b6(phal chen): bsam las chos sprin char yang phab// ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba// de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang ste// 'on kyang bde gshegs gshegs dang 'phro ba med//
79b7(phal chen): zhing rnams kun tu yul mang rab tu ston// sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de// spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun
80a1(phal chen): gsungs pas// rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste// mtha' yas phyogs su mtha' dang
80a2(phal chen): dbus myed so// rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul pa spos// 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen// phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang // 'jig
80a3(phal chen): rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung // thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de// 'dul bas sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong // rdul srubs kun tu mtha'
80a4(phal chen): dang dbus med pa'i// rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston// sngan chad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams// ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod// yangs dus
80a5(phal chen): bskal ba ji med yod pa'i rnams// skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston// de ro mi sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bsten// 'jig rten gtso bi'i ye shes pas ma
80a6(phal chen): yas ltos// 'byam klas mi zad mtha' yas lo bgrangs pas// rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas sa lta ste// thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med// rgyal
80a7(phal chen): sras kun gyis shes par sla ba min// sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste// chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing /
80b1(phal chen): ga kun du kyang chub nga sa/ sangs rgyag gas sem brjod pas na// cho gnas rnams rgya sa ldam brjod pa sbyin// 'gro ba mas cad m+b+ha /
80b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ phyogs kyi dbyi
80b3(phal chen): thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyar byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa/
80b4(phal chen): ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par
80b5(phal chen): 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams
80b6(phal chen): kyi tshogs dang / zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni
80b7(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul gyis yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs
81a1(phal chen): rgyus kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
81a2(phal chen): yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes
81a3(phal chen): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni / 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shingo/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
81a4(phal chen): pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing
81a5(phal chen): mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa
81a6(phal chen): thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku meng pa las/
81a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas
81b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji snyed gang dag
81b2(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing // rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs// 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung // sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya cheran skor// skad
81b3(phal chen): cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyod yul dbyings rnams rgyal bstod// 'gro ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu// byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par
81b4(phal chen): 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad spyod spyad de// nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab bkye zhing // sangs rgyas
81b5(phal chen): zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis// skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la mtha' dbus
81b6(phal chen): medad/ phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs// rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul lo rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa// rgyal bas 'dir ni kun kyang /
81b7(phal chen): rab tu bstan// skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang // bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu// rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'// tshul rnams
82a1(phal chen): kun skor sangs rgyas chags pa med// 'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam las mdzes// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu// sangs rgyas rgya
82a2(phal chen): rgya chen bsnyen bkur bas// de byas 'jig rten gtse la phyogs dbyings rnams// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas byung ba dag
82a3(phal chen): rdul gyi sbubs su tshang med zhing yang ston// de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don
82a4(phal chen): spyad// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab skyed cing // 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas mtshan med sku
82a5(phal chen): maud rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang // 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad//
82a6(phal chen): de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang
82a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub
82b1(phal chen): sems drupa 'a thams cad kyi sems skang cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lnga ba zhes bya'o// byung chu sems dpa' yon tan rimachen 'byung ba le shes
82b2(phal chen): dpal gyi gtsug zung kyi rnam par thar pa n+ti/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pasdu ba zhes pa'o// byag/
82b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'o ye shes kyi phyogs yang
82b4(phal chen): dge bar 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha mo dang
82b5(phal chen): par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni
82b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje langs
82b7(phal chen): pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu
83a1(phal chen): 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil
83a2(phal chen): 'khor yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par stong mdzad kyi smon lam rgya
83a3(phal chen): mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par
83a4(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer
83a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'od can dpal gyi zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
83a6(phal chen): dag smras so// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bas ma yas dang// se yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas// tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe// sangs
83a7(phal chen): rgyas zhing langs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa// skad cig dgongs pas
83b1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' las 'gro mnyam bsam po tshim par gsung // brgal pa rgya che mi zang bu med par// rgyal ba 'gro la mngon sum kun nas bzhugs// mgon po
83b2(phal chen): snga ma chang ji ltar sbyangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rdul de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun ra snang // snying po byang chub
83b3(phal chen): kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing // 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes/
83b4(phal chen): dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de// rgyal ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku//
83b5(phal chen): ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de// phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char langs 'bebs// chos rjes thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag/ bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra
83b6(phal chen): mtha' yas te// rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing // rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas spyod pa
83b7(phal chen): thams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de bzhin ye shes rnams rgyal bas bstan// phyogs rnams kun tu rang byung rnam par mdzes// smon lam
84a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston// ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog/ sangs rgyas yul ni phyogs su zad pa
84a2(phal chen): med// dbus dang mthu' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags med brnyes pas na// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na shin tu mdzes// / de'i
84a3(phal chen): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dang / pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang / 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dri
84a4(phal chen): thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang
84a5(phal chen): 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'thon par gyur te/
84a6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub
84a7(phal chen): sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems
84b1(phal chen): dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul badz+ra/
84b2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang
84b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs
84b4(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed cing / 'di ltar nor bu'i rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu 'byir/ spos kyi sprin thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
84b5(phal chen): thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin ni rnam par 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
84b6(phal chen): sprin ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgrir ma'i sprin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu
84b7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi shing gi lal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par sbyong / rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ rgyan mdzes pa thams
85a1(phal chen): cad yang dag par spyon pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang / sa
85a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhag par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
85a3(phal chen): te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs
85a4(phal chen): pa la mngon du bltas nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pod+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo bkrung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to// byang chub
85a5(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
85a6(phal chen): yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brong ba rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab
85a7(phal chen): pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so// gzung kyi sgo rgya mtsho thab cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so// dus
85b1(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis la rab tu gnas pa rnams so// dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po rab tu thong pa rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su
85b2(phal chen): dag pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa shu stag go/
85b3(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par/
85b4(phal chen): bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen// chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste// phyogs
85b5(phal chen): rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byas nas// 'byam klus 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de// thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings
85b6(phal chen): kun rgyas par// dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod bskor cing // shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skang
85b7(phal chen): cig sems la mi zad yon tan gzugs// rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so// bskal pa rgya mtshor sngan chad//
86a1(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pas srid ba rgya mtsho 'dir// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can sprin byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de'i chos 'dzin to//
86a2(phal chen): yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag/ thams cadas sa rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas// pad+mo'i snying po pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes
86a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri// rin chem nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing // spos 'phro sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu byung // snying po du ma'i me tog 'phreng spyangs
86a4(phal chen): pa'o// rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed// 'od zer skyon ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgya ni// thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu
86a5(phal chen): mdzes// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed// rin chen chen du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang // nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khrung kun nas brgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab
86a6(phal chen): tu mdzes// zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su bzung // rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan// gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs
86a7(phal chen): rnam par shin tu mdzes// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog/ gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams kun na snang /
86b1(phal chen): thub pa de 'dra'i seng ge'i gangan la bzhugs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs su tu ldog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gying dkyil 'khor yong pa
86b2(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par bzlas te/ de'i mtshigs rdzu bcad pa'i'adi dag sum ma// 'dzin bdo gshegs sa sa rgyas byin rnabyas to// byang chub skyong ba stan drang snang ba dang
86b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas mchad pa'i mchad pa du ma dag/ rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang // spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po n+dan// me toge slong po seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor/
86b4(phal chen): rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang // 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun// rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan/
86b5(phal chen): las snang // sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang // 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lta// rin chen lnga ldi pad+mo mang gtags pa// phye zhing byang chub sems dpa'
86b6(phal chen): mang po rnams// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing // sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed// sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin//
86b7(phal chen): 'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu phyung // sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus// mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa// 'khod
87a1(phal chen): yangs rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa ste// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram// byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun to// sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan
87a2(phal chen): yod pa// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te// me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram// gser tshen mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan// sa yi lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing /
87a3(phal chen): skad cig sems kyi mi zangs yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing // kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo // rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal bar 'bar// spos mang
87a4(phal chen): dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing // lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs rnams bcun zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag sa rgyun phun sum
87a5(phal chen): tshogs yod par// de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od
87a6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug bud kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad srung /
87a7(phal chen): pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu// zhing kun phun sun tshogs pa mthong ba'i rnams// snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la// mi zangs dang de dag rab tu snang // rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi//
87b1(phal chen): sa la rin ched mdzes kun rnam par bkram// rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor// sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang // sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi ngas pa'i drung
87b2(phal chen): kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos rgyar byas las// bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod// rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab
87b3(phal chen): cing // rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog/ sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston// rin chen 'od 'phro sgror ma rnam par snang //
87b4(phal chen): 'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu byung // nor bu dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan// sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// rin
87b5(phal chen): chen mang po chen bzang rgyan du bkye// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog/ de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong // ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub shing gi
87b6(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa dag/ sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod// sangs rgyas gdon las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi// chos
87b7(phal chen): bde bar gshegs pas gang gsung ba// sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du// sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung // dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na// de
88a1(phal chen): drag ji bzhin rjod kyi 'gro la 'gengs// srog chags rnams kyi tsam mongs zhi bar byed// sa 'khor de nas de 'ang rab tu zlog/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun
88a2(phal chen): sum gang dag dang // dri mengs ni glang gis mdzes gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyun rnams re re zhing // bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus/ de nus byung /
88a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs/
88a4(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du//
88a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang // rin chen kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab//
88a6(phal chen): de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes// ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun sgor rdza babs sprin kyang bres// stegs bu'i 'phreng ba kun nas rgyar du bkod/
88a7(phal chen): gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang rnam par brgyus// me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin chem shing sdong ngar gyi bla re bres// nor bu thams cad sgo nas 'phreng ba 'brul// de na ye shes rgya
88b1(phal chen): mtsha rab tu mdzes// spos dri rgyal mtshan rin che dru ba ste// 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kur nas shin tu bres// de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags
88b2(phal chen): pa bzhugs// phyogs rnams kun mo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams// dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing // 'byam klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba// sangs rgyas
88b3(phal chen): pho brang 'di ni de dag grag/ me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes// de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang // gzugs
88b4(phal chen): brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu sdang // phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang bkye ba// de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes par brgyan//
88b5(phal chen): babs mnga' yang sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi// sangs rgyas po brang rnam pa bsam yas to// gzhal med khang mang thams cad de la snga
88b6(phal chen): de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang // mtha' dang dpung med bu yang de bzhin med//
88b7(phal chen): rang byu nga sangs rgyas po brang de na bzhugs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthun
89a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu
89a2(phal chen): pra snyed kyi// bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung // snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes// spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang
89a3(phal chen): dag rgyu// yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris// shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung //
89a4(phal chen): lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil// snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes// yal gdog pa kun nas mngon pa ste//
89a5(phal chen): 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags// me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed// snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab// 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par
89a6(phal chen): mdzes// dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes// yal ga'i sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs// snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung // me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad
89a7(phal chen): nor// mu tig nor dag phyogs dang phyogs rnams kun nas brgyus// phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de// snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin// bde gshegs snying po/
89b1(phal chen): byang chub 'di la ltos// pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med srung // rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor glan nas 'phro// dril bu'i dra ba'i sbyor gyi sna dbyangs 'byor// phyogs bcu'i shing bzang
89b2(phal chen): gzugs rnams gang yod pa// 'byas klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad drag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang // de drung sangs rgyas dri ming rnam par mdzes// yal ga gun
89b3(phal chen): nas rin chen mi zad nor// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing // bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char pab rtsi// phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'od 'i/
89b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sngan chad cir gyur dang // byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal ga kun las rin chen nor mi zad// sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis mi khyab
89b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pa pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/
89b6(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul pa// de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag/ de ni mtha' dang dpung yang med pa
89b7(phal chen): ste// snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo // me tog mang po'i 'phreng ba sbyangs bkye zhing // 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lnga
90a1(phal chen): tshogs rnams// sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed// spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung /
90a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim// shIng gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes// pad+mo 'phrul pa sdug cing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed/
90a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing // sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun nas
90a4(phal chen): snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed// byang chub shing gri rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams/
90a5(phal chen): rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan chad du// rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston// byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de/
90a6(phal chen): dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing // rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang de dag ston// rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe/
90a7(phal chen): sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa// thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed sdong
90b1(phal chen): gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste// de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang // snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' las
90b2(phal chen): phyogs kun na// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyum gyi skyon can dag/ mtha' las sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang // sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o//
90b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas
90b4(phal chen): nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tshe// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing // gnas dang gnas
90b5(phal chen): min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i// bde gshegs stobs rnam par dag par mthong // bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te// mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs/
90b6(phal chen): pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas 'od las dri bzhin phyogs bkang zhing // las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod// sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byam klas stobs skyongs tshe//
90b7(phal chen): bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang // sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug/ 'jig rten kun
91a1(phal chen): mabs pa sna rdzogs dang // byasas paji bzhin sbyor ba rnas stong ba// de dag ji bAzhin rgyal bachos ston te// rang byung mas pa mkhyen du'i sgrubs
91a2(phal chen): gyur to// phyogs rnams ma lus rnying rnams rgya mtsho dang // 'byam sa mas sems sbyim khams dang chos kyi 'ardzas// nam mkha' khams rnams mnyam nyid ma khyen sa rdog
91a3(phal chen): rang byung su rtse khoms mkhyem stobs kyang rjor// bdag shegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro// sang cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs// phyogs dang ning dang brgal pa
91a4(phal chen): 'gro bkang zhing // sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan// bsam gtan rnam thar stobs sa mtha' dbus med// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed/
91a5(phal chen): thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel// sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs pa med// srid cig kun la dus gsum
91a6(phal chen): spu rtser ston// zhing dang sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos// de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan// thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste// des ni chos dbyings
91a7(phal chen): ma lus gsal bar gzigs// thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa// brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan// 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang /
91b1(phal chen): / nga
91b2(phal chen): sa sa
91b3(phal chen): / / la byu rgyu na dus bkang ba/ byang chu byung rgya sa
91b4(phal chen): ma stsal zlog po rje mede myeng cing // sbyin pa'i mthar byer sngan chung spyad pas na// de phyir thub pa'i skun mtshan gyis rgyus// 'gro ba kun gyis pa lta'i dga' ba ste// bas
91b5(phal chen): brdzu ma nga mtha'i las ston// tshul khrims par byed pa stos skyes pas// dpyor bsal pa phyogs su nga// shin du 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal
91b6(phal chen): log pa ma ba nyid la dang bad / spyad chung bzang po'i dkyil mapor rnam sa ma dzes// 'gro ngas sum mnyam yom kun ldan to// de bas phyogasas 'a rnams
91b7(phal chen): shing bya sngo// bskal pa rgyamo tshemang por sngon srung // 'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal// de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste// shing rab drung na
92a1(phal chen): rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// bskul pa langs par rgyal bas rab tu spyad// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med/
92a2(phal chen): dga' ba bskyed// nyon mongs dri ma sgrib pa kun kyang sel// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngod spyod cing // shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas ston bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun
92a3(phal chen): pa yongs su bsal// de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas// phyogs rnams kun
92a4(phal chen): na kun la mngon par bzhugs// phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon du lta// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab skyong tshe// bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che zhing // phyi ma'i bskal par
92a5(phal chen): 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam par// spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs// de phyir rang byung
92a6(phal chen): stobs kyi pha rol phyir// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags// thams cad mkhyer nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i// ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas// de phyir
92a7(phal chen): chags med ye shes pha rol phyid// phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs rgyas
92b1(phal chen): kyimathus 'khor rgyal tsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ da'i mtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i rlung
92b2(phal chen): ma rnam pa ma yab zang // sa rnams langs pa ji ltar gyur bskyed pa// de ba'in kun kyang rim tshan mnas spyod// dpe ba'i ma dga' ba'i thugs kyi yul// byag
92b3(phal chen): dpyongs gur gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong ring // gzhal med pa rga le bar dri med yongs sbyangs pas// chos dbyings langs la ye shes rab tu byung // thams cad chos la dri mengs
92b4(phal chen): gnyis te// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing // rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mcho byas nas// 'gro po tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni
92b5(phal chen): sa gsum ste// snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lha mthong brtan// gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos// 'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa
92b6(phal chen): gzhal med sa// mthu yi 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o// dka' rgyal snying
92b7(phal chen): bo mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de// zhing rnams kun du 'gro zhi ba'i la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan// shes
93a1(phal chen): rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sprin la spyod// 'byam klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra// de 'byung byang chub
93a2(phal chen): shing chen 'di las grags// chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed// 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring
93a3(phal chen): du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan// thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo
