93a4(phal chen): ste// gzhal med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog/ tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug/ 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i
93a5(phal chen): blo gros sa// bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing las brjod// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas
93a6(phal chen): yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu// rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu gragade nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal
93a7(phal chen): mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni//
93b1(phal chen): dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems// rgyal dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun sngon lam rnam dag spyod yul te/
93b2(phal chen): dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong // bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa
93b3(phal chen): dag/ la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la// kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal po'i gzugs sku
93b4(phal chen): de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing // yon tan mtha' yas 'od sbyin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong // la la rgyal ba'i ye shes
93b5(phal chen): chags med 'jug/ dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong /
93b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste// phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba snod bzhin skul bar byed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
93b7(phal chen): la la la 'jug/ la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug/ sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu sdang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas
94a1(phal chen): 'od ni la las der yang mthong // ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod
94a2(phal chen): pa bstan pa la// la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed// la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams// bde gshegs bsod nams byung ba ji bzhin
94a3(phal chen): mthong // pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// ji ltar ngag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong // sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med de// mtha' dang dpung
94a4(phal chen): med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong // // de nas
94a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byon gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos
94a6(phal chen): kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo//
94a7(phal chen): 'ur 'ur / rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par
94b1(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i sbyin bsam gyis ni khyab pa'i ra de bzhin gsheg pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu bab bo// 'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna chog kyi sbyin gyi char thas cang rab tungab bo// rin po che sna tshog thams cad kyi sbyim pa/
94b2(phal chen): rin nga tsha'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po che kha dog sna chog dang mu tig thams cad kyi sbyin dang / spos
94b3(phal chen): dang tsan dan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu
94b4(phal chen): ma'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin pa che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sbyin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu
94b5(phal chen): ngag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'o sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chur de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du
94b6(phal chen): mngon par phab bo// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
94b7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang / mchod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to//
95a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / ting nge 'dzin/
95a2(phal chen): kyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan dang / tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gnan dang gdadang
95a3(phal chen): phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang / chos kyi tshul la spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / de bzhini gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / yul/
95a4(phal chen): dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed
95a5(phal chen): do// 'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa
95a6(phal chen): chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u ste dang po'i/
95a7(phal chen): bam po drug pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
95b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis ni dza lta bu zhigs / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul na ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byin gyi rlung
95b2(phal chen): ni jo lta bu zhig mngar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyong yul ni ji lta bu'ig ma 'a/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs nr-i
95b3(phal chen): lta bya zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting
95b4(phal chen): 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
95b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrog pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
95b6(phal chen): la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi snyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
95b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku
96a1(phal chen): ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
96a2(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sang+yas kyi 'od zer ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
96a3(phal chen): rnams la sas rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig mnga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
96a4(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston byang chub
96a5(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu
96a6(phal chen): yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya
96a7(phal chen): mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston byang chub
96b1(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu
96b2(phal chen): zhig tu yongs su ston byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
96b3(phal chen): sa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa'
96b4(phal chen): rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
96b5(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grangasangs rgyas
96b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstar
96b7(phal chen): po mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad
97a1(phal chen): rlung / ma rnam kya ga tha smya pa rgyas po rnams kyang bstan pa yang du thang / smras rgyas su sa spya d+ma rgyurnas byu ba na d+hA na/
97a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas sa su na'i chang rgya mtshornams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang sem pa dang / de nas byang chubs pa' dedag gi byed gyi rlabs kyis
97a3(phal chen): gyi sprin de dag las tshigs sgra bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // mtha' yas rgya chen bskal bar rab spyad de// byang chub shing drung rang byung yang drug skyes// phyi ba'i bskal bar
97a4(phal chen): ba'i sngon gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tsom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni langs pa rab tu bskyed// sems/
97a5(phal chen): can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bdel 'gro ba thams cad 'god// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul skyed// de bzhin gshegs
97a6(phal chen): la lta zhing kun+da nas gnas// de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// the tsom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol// rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu// de bzhin
97a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa// de dag tshul ni rnam ngag bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
97b1(phal chen): ci yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang // rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam snang ba// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas nyi
97b2(phal chen): 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang // mi bsangs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bklag tu gsol/
97b3(phal chen): ji ltar chos rgyal po brang mnga' mdzad cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang // thugs brtse'i slad du yang dag
97b4(phal chen): bstan du gsol// rgyal ba'i spyad ni ji ltar tshad med cing // snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul
97b5(phal chen): la 'jug pa bstan du gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa/
97b6(phal chen): 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du gsol// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang // rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag
97b7(phal chen): byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsol// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtogs pa
98a1(phal chen): thugs kyis thugs su chud nas zhal gyi sgo tshams kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/
98a2(phal chen): rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyun byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ 'od shin
98a3(phal chen): tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/
98a4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di
98a5(phal chen): lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od
98a6(phal chen): zer dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi
98a7(phal chen): 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu skrag pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing lang
98b1(phal chen): 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi rlung gi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed do// 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs
98b2(phal chen): bcur sa sa rgyas kyi ming go rdul shin tu phreng sbed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gros kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
98b3(phal chen): ba skad kyi 'jig rted kyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rkyen gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub
98b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to//
98b5(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de// phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon
98b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes// spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed// des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas// byang
98b7(phal chen): chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag/ srid pa'i rgyud na sngan chad 'khor ba'i tshe// rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa// de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol/
99a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so// rgyun rnams sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang // byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'byung // 'od rnam/
99a2(phal chen): bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan// byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te/
99a3(phal chen): sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de las chos nyid zhi sgra rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams stong gi rdul skyed sngan chad du// spyod tshe pha rol phyir kun rgyas par mdzad/
99a4(phal chen): stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyis// rgyal ba de yi zhal ltar kun kyang dang // zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas// rgyal sras mang po rab tu
99a5(phal chen): dga' ste lhags// mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs shing // thams cad 'khor de rgyal ba mngon sum lta// gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo/
99a6(phal chen): rnams// rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bab kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang deng // dus gsum rgyal
99a7(phal chen): ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste// rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyis// rgyal ba'i drung du sbyar te 'dong bar gyis/
99b1(phal chen): spyas rgyas rnam par ldang mdzad lags na// 'od zer kun bya maras rab tu dang // des rgyas 'du ji sa ni 'dra de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro sum mngoms pa
99b2(phal chen): chos ston tu/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam che dag nas de bzhin ga shegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams byang chub sems dang shA
99b3(phal chen): rang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig
99b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i
99b5(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu
99b6(phal chen): po rnam par sangs rgyas pa nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan
99b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder
100a1(phal chen): 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyid bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin bcus
100a2(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyi ma'i 'khor mo'i
100a3(phal chen): lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis
100a4(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
100a5(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang
100a6(phal chen): spros thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba med
100a7(phal chen): kyis nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brter te
100b1(phal chen): ga tshogs song ba ci smra gas mamangon par stsal nas rgyal ma zung banas tel ba ra gyu/ de rnas pa 'jig rnan gyi 'ams rgyal tsha 'di nga
100b2(phal chen): chags su lto phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma gyi ma po cha thams cad drang bas rnam par brgyam pa'i snying ba zhes bya ba ru / 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i chung ngangs
100b3(phal chen): mas 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang mtha' layas nga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du/ de bzhir gshegs pa sumangs mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'i'o
100b4(phal chen): rgya mtshonas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par sdang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu
100b5(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying
100b6(phal chen): po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
100b7(phal chen): pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yig par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
101a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rdul po kun nas sgra 'byin snying / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brdabs pa dang /
101a2(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sde tshogs kyis sring po byang chub kyi rgyun byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal ba sgo kun nas rin
101a3(phal chen): po che'i 'od zer dang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres
101a4(phal chen): par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyar ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas/
101a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi
101a6(phal chen): khyab po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan ljang drug par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs bu dang
101a7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshod gyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
101b1(phal chen): brlabyas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal tham snyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul tha ma med kyis rnam mala' kun nas lag par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing /
101b2(phal chen): tsum ldan 'dus gang nA der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ras phyogs su brten te/ in+d+ra d+hi l+yA dang / 'dzam du rlud dang / badz+ra ra ga sna tshogs
101b3(phal chen): kyi snying pa can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas rmyil ro kyang bcus te 'khod par gyur te/ de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su rung
101b4(phal chen): phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi sngar
101b5(phal chen): yongs su 'byung bya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
101b6(phal chen): spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyar zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
101b7(phal chen): 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing
102a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa d+mang
102a2(phal chen): rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus
102a3(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
102a4(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs
102a5(phal chen): kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams
102a6(phal chen): cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis
102a7(phal chen): rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang
102b1(phal chen): dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i ldang pa 'artsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kum nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa ldang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten
102b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag
102b3(phal chen): 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par
102b4(phal chen): gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
102b5(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs
102b6(phal chen): kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
102b7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin/
103a1(phal chen): bcus nams n+d+ha d+hAnas log par byen gyis nga thathams cad nas mnga'i dag du'i sas 'byung ba'i sa kyi gang gi sbyi dus la
103a2(phal chen): log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas lag par byin gyis brlabs
103a3(phal chen): dang me tog thams cad kyi smon rab tu nar ba'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' klan nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor
103a4(phal chen): thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
103a5(phal chen): lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing
103a6(phal chen): gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
103a7(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
103b1(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor rdul shin tu za ba med kyis nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das grangad ba dar /
103b2(phal chen): byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod
103b3(phal chen): bar gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha 'di dang 'dab chags su byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu
103b4(phal chen): klung dang shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/
103b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad
103b6(phal chen): pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
103b7(phal chen): der 'ong bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i
104a1(phal chen): rgyal po kun tu mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i
104a2(phal chen): rgyun mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyun pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna
104a3(phal chen): tshegs kyi 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas 'phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i
104a4(phal chen): snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad+mo'i 'phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin
104a5(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi
104a6(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan dang 'phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po
104a7(phal chen): can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yol ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can
104b1(phal chen): rgya snron bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brnabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spyos dang rin para'i tshogs m+b+ha tshugs kyisu kun nus brgyan pa'i nyims rnam par byung bar byas/
104b2(phal chen): ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu bri bsrod
104b3(phal chen): kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs
104b4(phal chen): mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to//
104b5(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba
104b6(phal chen): yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal
104b7(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi
105a1(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu zla ba skyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gdu na bya der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams ca
105a2(phal chen): bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla ro'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
105a3(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spros rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzug
105a4(phal chen): kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang / sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus
105a5(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par
105a6(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab
105a7(phal chen): par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha'
105b1(phal chen): kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'ong 'gro zhing spang ba'i rgyal ma tshar gyi tha re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rnar
105b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs par na rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas ldog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs
105b3(phal chen): pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas
105b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung
105b5(phal chen): bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od
105b6(phal chen): rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
105b7(phal chen): sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba
106a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/
106a2(phal chen): sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi
106a3(phal chen): gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
106a4(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis
106a5(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshe na rnam pa sna tshogs
106a6(phal chen): kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis
106a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
106b1(phal chen): log par byin gyis brdabyas pa dang / chos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan da kyi bye ba ra bos sun/
106b2(phal chen): tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab
106b3(phal chen): par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra
106b4(phal chen): snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs
106b5(phal chen): mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khr-i in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas
106b6(phal chen): yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po
106b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med
107a1(phal chen): pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshonas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad bya'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba
107a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che
107a3(phal chen): thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
107a4(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin
107a5(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprini bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i
107a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i yal gA'i sgo kun
107a7(phal chen): nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rigs kyi
107b1(phal chen): la ma ma thas rnams pa stananas drug par byen gyis babs pa dang / sems sa cig gis sems san mtha' la sa ba'i gzugs ngas su smra bya /
107b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor bya sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byer gyis porabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'ad gling dkyil 'am
107b3(phal chen): gyi sbyi bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'khor ci dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus
107b4(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nam mkha' kun
107b5(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ sa
107b6(phal chen): ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dri dang
107b7(phal chen): 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams
108a1(phal chen): rgyu shA/ de na ga gags sa d+hA ma sa 'das 'gyus [ऽ]
108a2(phal chen): rgyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyingasas 'od 'jo ba rnam par byung ba 'byung ba'i rgyunas shes bya byung chu bas sa sna dpa' lag na khams rgyam rnam da
108a3(phal chen): bye ba skyed dang rnan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der 'ong bar gyurat+no/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'di byer gyi sbyin bcus nam mkha' kun nas lags par byin gyis
108a4(phal chen): rlob cing spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin pa che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus
108a5(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
108a6(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog
108a7(phal chen): gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu rgyud par sangs rgyas
108b1(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nus yog par byin gyis brdabs pa dang / rin po che zad mi shes pa
108b2(phal chen): thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi za ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od zer gyi sbyin
108b3(phal chen): bcus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byir gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom
108b4(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyogs su brten nas/ steng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod
108b5(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rkyen gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
108b6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes
108b7(phal chen): bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub
109a1(phal chen): sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed dang /
109a2(phal chen): lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun+da na sa log par byin gyis
109a3(phal chen): rlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun rgya chen pos
109a4(phal chen): rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
109a5(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin
109a6(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
109a7(phal chen): rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro
109b1(phal chen): ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig gi ston pa 'od 'phro ba'i spyir bcus nAm mkha' kuran nam phyog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
109b2(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na
109b3(phal chen): ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag
109b4(phal chen): mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed nas kyang /
109b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
109b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sman 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
109b7(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te/ byi nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par
110a1(phal chen): sprul cing / skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// 'khod pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad re re nas/ 'od zer gyi rin po che thams cad ltar la dog snga
110a2(phal chen): tsheg pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to// rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
110a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dpyid kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang
110a4(phal chen): zhing 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur to// zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gsheg pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes par gyur to//
110a5(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
110a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul
110a7(phal chen): shin tu phra bsnyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi
110b1(phal chen): khams rgyam tsho'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul ba'i zho ga nas yang dag par skul ba
110b2(phal chen): byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche'o rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgyu
110b3(phal chen): thams cad rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba spyad kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig
110b4(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rtedan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
110b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred kyi phyogs bcu'i
110b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul zhen
110b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi
111a1(phal chen): skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad ra byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu
111a2(phal chen): gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par skul pa
111a3(phal chen): byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu rab tu bdal te/ zhing r-i rer yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can re rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du
111a4(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i phung po la rab tu 'god do//
111a5(phal chen): sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni nyan thos dang /
111a6(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do// zhing de
111a7(phal chen): dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni sngan chad mi bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
111b1(phal chen): sred byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par 'thob pa la yang dag par stsal lo// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu za bamed de pa'i ru gshegs ci/
111b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas srung zhing gzigs pa la yongs su myangs te rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skang stobs thams cad
111b3(phal chen): kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang
111b4(phal chen): sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang brgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do//
111b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed
111b6(phal chen): byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog/ bskul pa rgya mtshor skyo med spyad pa spyod/
111b7(phal chen): sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grel kyang // yid la skyo med zhum pa gang yang med// 'di yi tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing /
112a1(phal chen): tshul 'dir bskal pa rgyam tsho zad par byed// mtha' med dbus med lpags gang yang med// de dag chos nyid nub rab tu sgrog/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i sdo la
112a2(phal chen): gang yod pa// rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don du// de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su sbyong // de dag spyod pa'i rgyun ni 'di 'dra'o// rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer byin te//
112a3(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'od zer sgo rnams re rer mtha'
112a4(phal chen): las pa'i// bsam las zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste// rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab
112a5(phal chen): gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyong byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jigs par mi byed de// sa 'di rnam drag tshul 'chang dag gi'o// tshul rnams
112a6(phal chen): kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul// skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang // rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi'o// dus
112a7(phal chen): gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i chos nyid chags med blo rtogs so//
112b1(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog
112b2(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba'i
112b3(phal chen): phyir/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer
112b4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog sgron ma sprin du bdal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/ tshul thams kyi phyogs 'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/
112b5(phal chen): phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan
112b6(phal chen): nasatesangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
112b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu spros nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs
113a1(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol
113a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/ sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun
113a3(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang
113a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
113a5(phal chen): pad+mo chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa/ lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa/
113a6(phal chen): ze ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
113a7(phal chen): cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa
113b1(phal chen): smyon pa'i snga rab tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs parnyan gyi sbyin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpani
113b2(phal chen): spyong pa dang / smon lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo // pad+ma chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
113b3(phal chen): la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas
113b4(phal chen): byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'jug
113b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shing lnga ba snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i 'phreng ba de dag la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
113b6(phal chen): cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su
113b7(phal chen): song ba'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
114a1(phal chen): rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams
114a2(phal chen): cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams
114a3(phal chen): cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa/
114a4(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
114a5(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal/
114a6(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste// ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed
114a7(phal chen): kyi// rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to// spu gcig rtse la zhing mang
114b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste// sgra rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa skyon// zhing rnams re
114b2(phal chen): dag na rab bzhugs shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong /
114b3(phal chen): zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // chos dbyings 'byam gyis rtag tu
114b4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas/
114b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can// chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor
114b6(phal chen): rnams kun na gnas// zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod// rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs
114b7(phal chen): rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba// de dag smon lom rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag
115a1(phal chen): shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ma snyed kyi/
115a2(phal chen): lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston// sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ de nas byang chub
115a3(phal chen): sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di
115a4(phal chen): dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab// dus rnams kun tu 'byung ste// chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na// 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod/
115a5(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa med cing gnas pa med// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams
115a6(phal chen): cad mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// kha dog bsam
115a7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
115b1(phal chen): sru dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams// ning rnams kun du rab sgrog cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston// spu rnams re re kun nas kyang // phyogs bcu 'o
115b2(phal chen): zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer mo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung //
115b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor// ye shes zab mas
115b4(phal chen): shes bya ba// rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gnan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing /
115b5(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam byung zhing // rnam par 'phrul
115b6(phal chen): pa rab tu ston/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i
115b7(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes// rgya chen gsung ni rab byung ba// zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog/
116a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par// 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing // byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas/
116a2(phal chen): 'jig rten kun la mngon// sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong // mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas
116a3(phal chen): sprin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye shes rnam rgyu'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med// 'byung ba yod par rnam
116a4(phal chen): par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin// 'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste// 'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas
116a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings las byung // de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod// yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste// sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med// rgyal ba
116a6(phal chen): gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun la rab tu byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// 'jig
116a7(phal chen): rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na snang // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la// yon
116b1(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho zang mi shes// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// de dag yon tan zad pa med/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' blos 'od 'gro ba'i rnam rdza ba'i 'od kyis/
116b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sngar// byang chub sems dpa'
116b3(phal chen): gang bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong // ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang // de bzhin
116b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad dang // bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung // kun tu byin gyis
116b5(phal chen): brlabs rnams dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// kun tu bzang po'o smon lam dang // spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa// de dag zhing rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas
116b6(phal chen): kun gyis rnam 'phrul mthong // kun tu mnyam pa nyid gyur cing // kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te// ye shes lus kyis rjes song na// sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o//
116b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spu dag tu// rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing
117a1(phal chen): dag tu// byin gyis rlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus ngag dang // ming gis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying por rnam
117a2(phal chen): 'phrul dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyis ston par byed// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang /
117a3(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams// skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na// byang
117a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang // mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang
117a5(phal chen): bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas
117a6(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon du yog/ 'jig rten khams rnams/
117a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho dang // phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul pa'o// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang
117b1(phal chen): gzhan gyi ming dag gis// zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// rnam par snang mdzad byin gyis brlabs// ning rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang //
117b2(phal chen): kun tu bzang ba'i smon lam dag/ brjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung // zhing kun rdul la sku yi rnams// thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung
117b3(phal chen): ba med// 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// zhing kun rdul phran sbubs dag tu// rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu
117b4(phal chen): sgrog/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu mi 'dres sku
117b5(phal chen): ngag gis// chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te// 'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi//
117b6(phal chen): mgon po ji snyed bzhug pa rnams// de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// de ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa/
117b7(phal chen): de dag kun gyi bsam yis pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu gragade nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes
118a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su banang pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi/
118a2(phal chen): ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing // ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa'i rnams// de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu
118a3(phal chen): 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgya// de bzhin nyid la gnas/
118a4(phal chen): shing rten// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad su dag tu// zhing rnams kun na gnas/
118a5(phal chen): shing spyod// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags med spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas
118a6(phal chen): thams cad spyod yul du// lus pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bsnyags
118a7(phal chen): dbyangs// chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog pa// chos dbyings rjes su shes pa'i rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams
118b1(phal chen): shin tu sgrog/ dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal// dbyangs kyi de dag sa la zhugs// sgra yi shes la rmongs pa med// sems can sna lang spyod yul te// thams cad
118b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa kun gyi yang // rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yang phyinam gyur cig/ stobs kyis la rab gnas te// bskal ba bye bAr spyang bas na// chos nyid
118b3(phal chen): 'di la rab tu 'jugade nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs
118b4(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes sa ni thob pa'i
118b5(phal chen): rnams// 'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong // shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang /
118b6(phal chen): sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing // lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste// zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang /
118b7(phal chen): dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing // ye shes sa la rnam par gnas// chos la rnam spyod khong du chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnam
119a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mthong // ning rnams 'byam gas thabs cad /
119a2(phal chen): du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod// bdag mthong bas ni lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par
119a3(phal chen): mngon par byas// ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun kyi bsam mthun par// sems can kun la mngon sum du/
119a4(phal chen): lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don du sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yos na// byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ste// gang gis mgon pa
119a5(phal chen): mthong ba yi// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab// mgron po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i// byin rlabs mtha' dang dpung med de// chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nus/
119a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
119a7(phal chen): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te/
119b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// yon tan sprin ni rab tu rjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang rab bstan cing //
119b2(phal chen): chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug/ dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang // sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rab tu gnas shing de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
119b3(phal chen): shes 'jug/ shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par mi nus te// ye shes mig gi rab sbyangs shing // 'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin
119b4(phal chen): rlabs dang // chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs// chos rnams mtha' yas glong gi rnams// chos kun mtshan nyid rnams
119b5(phal chen): la ste/ kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing // chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing // thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes// 'ongs pa med cing 'phos
119b6(phal chen): pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sgo rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang // mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun
119b7(phal chen): gyis mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag thams cad ba spu la'ang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams
120a1(phal chen): ni re res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ de nas byung
120a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcud
120a3(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro//
120a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul na'ang
120a5(phal chen): ma 'dres par// 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i glong //
120a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in+d+ra nI lar kun nas gnas// spyi'u tshugs dag dang snrel zhi dang // pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad
120a7(phal chen): khyud dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par// thub pa med par gram 'dal ba// de dag kun
120b1(phal chen): 'khong rnams smra// shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i skud byings na// 'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag ga chos nyid 'di /
120b2(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// gcig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis// chos bstan pa mo kun tu 'byung /
120b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab tu rjod// dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// mi zad tshul rnams rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na
120b4(phal chen): yang // rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'drar// snying po byang chub rnams na snang // 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min// de nus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su
120b5(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta zhing
120b6(phal chen): blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel// mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams//
120b7(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu byung // rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar/
121a1(phal chen): rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho chos las 'byung ba rnams//
121a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// 'di yi yul la rnam par spyod// kun tu bzang po'i skyon lam la// gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu/
121a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la lta// ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing // chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o// sangs
121a4(phal chen): rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung // chags pa med la rab tu zhugs// spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing // ye
121a5(phal chen): shes spyod yul gyur pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi sa gnon to// skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa/
121a6(phal chen): de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul gcig steng du rnam par sbyong // zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa// chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa'i rnams// zhing
121a7(phal chen): gcig tu ni sdud pa byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
121b1(phal chen): par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su btsud pa 'di dag smras so// ning rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa// rlom kyi
121b2(phal chen): sprin gyi char 'bebs so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// sems can kun gyi sang dag tu// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnams bstan pa rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams
121b3(phal chen): kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang /
121b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos kyi sku ni tha dad min// nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa
121b5(phal chen): med// gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa// mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul la mi gnas te// nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid 'di rtog
121b6(phal chen): gyur na// ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med cing byung ba med// nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs// gzung du med las la
121b7(phal chen): bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad/
122a1(phal chen): smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // tha med chos kyi 'khor lo drug/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal ba bsam yas papa/
122a2(phal chen): spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang
122a3(phal chen): chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs
122a4(phal chen): pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to// 'di
122a5(phal chen): naji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid
122a6(phal chen): 'di kho na rab tu ston to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
122a7(phal chen): bam po bdun pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can de nyid la
122b1(phal chen): 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
122b2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par btags pa'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings tshugs pa med cing / rgya che ba khyab par byed
122b3(phal chen): pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i glong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing / shin tu 'dal ba'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i dbyings ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang
122b4(phal chen): dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nAs yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can
122b5(phal chen): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i glong / phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa
122b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus
122b7(phal chen): par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams
123a1(phal chen): cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la
123a2(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams
123a3(phal chen): cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par zhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
123a4(phal chen): klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khams su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i
