123a5(phal chen): khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i ris su gtogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
123a6(phal chen): mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings spangs
123a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig
123b1(phal chen): rnyed gyi 'bras thams cad kyi rdul shin tu za ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba med la rab tu zhugs nas / zhing re re dI /
123b2(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
123b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ byung
123b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i
123b5(phal chen): rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
123b6(phal chen): ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi
123b7(phal chen): sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
124a1(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon lam dang / spyod pas yongs su dag
124a2(phal chen): bya'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang
124a3(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
124a4(phal chen): chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs
124a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi snang
124a6(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya
124a7(phal chen): mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
124b1(phal chen): po kun tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug
124b2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
124b3(phal chen): thams cad 'jig pa dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sangs
124b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya ma
124b5(phal chen): lnga rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten
124b6(phal chen): gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang /
124b7(phal chen): sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
125a1(phal chen): rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
125a2(phal chen): de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
125a3(phal chen): phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyus pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i
125a4(phal chen): sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba
125a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par
125a6(phal chen): ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa
125a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams
125b1(phal chen): brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin thaza ba'i khongs na
125b2(phal chen): yod pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/
125b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i modo la ting nge 'dzin de la sa tsA ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rted gyi lam rgya mtsho'i dru gis
125b4(phal chen): phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs
125b5(phal chen): kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum du mnyam pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgro
125b6(phal chen): dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi
125b7(phal chen): 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / sems can phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs
126a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med par 'byam klas pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nus langs par gyur te/
126a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams
126a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos
126a4(phal chen): kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams
126a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//
126a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
126a7(phal chen): snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
126b1(phal chen): byung ba tu drugs par gyur to// de ba'i gshegs pa thams cad rtsu brgyan ma ma thams ca la zhing gan dang gzham dum cam tshun 'jig rten ni khams rnam rnam gis pan
126b2(phal chen): sa pa gas bya gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' ri ljo dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ayang dang / 'byung ba da/ byang chub tu rnam par 'chang myong dang /
126b3(phal chen): las 'das pa bstan pa rtse mtsho'i sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams rna mtsha'i rdul shin tu phra bamid la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
126b4(phal chen): thams cad ma 'a/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khadrar yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rjem
126b5(phal chen): rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
126b6(phal chen): mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grags par gyur
126b7(phal chen): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
127a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par
127a2(phal chen): gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/
127a3(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo
127a4(phal chen): rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
127a5(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan
127a6(phal chen): gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/
127a7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par
127b1(phal chen): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing
127b2(phal chen): rnams 'bram klas kun ma kun tu bzang po de// pad+mo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong // kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha'
127b3(phal chen): dang dbus med do// lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de// sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam
127b4(phal chen): 'phrul pa// thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa med pa rgya chen sgrog/ ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung
127b5(phal chen): drug tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te// zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa mang po ston// zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi nabs drung ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun
127b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs// kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i
127b7(phal chen): mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye zhing // sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston/
128a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag
128a2(phal chen): la bstan// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chub cing //
128a3(phal chen): dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya ba ston// skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam gnas shing // rnam
128a4(phal chen): par 'phrul pa dam par ston par rab tu snang // phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi
128a5(phal chen): yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs// ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu gnon// chos rnams 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gi byang chub
128a6(phal chen): spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa ston// de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan// ting 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa
128a7(phal chen): rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon tan legs sgra 'byung // / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus
128b1(phal chen): thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi ngu ro gcig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/
128b2(phal chen): smon la mo kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i snying po ste// chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la bzhugs
128b3(phal chen): med kyang // kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang // phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags po khyab// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'o// rgyal ba thams cad
128b4(phal chen): sku thob phyir spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chung byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhi
128b5(phal chen): rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung du// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa'i rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal
128b6(phal chen): bar kun kyang snang // chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la shin tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing /
128b7(phal chen): rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang // rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dang // nam mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyi gang
129a1(phal chen): byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams langs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med// rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan
129a2(phal chen): sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston// gang gi don du bskal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i
129a3(phal chen): spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs
129a4(phal chen): bcu rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang // sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston// 'khor rnams langs pa
129a5(phal chen): 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun tu bzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor//
129a6(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum
129a7(phal chen): pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par
129b1(phal chen): bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par
129b2(phal chen): bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ dus
129b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
129b4(phal chen): po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa/ k+She rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom
129b5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dra zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
129b6(phal chen): rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya
129b7(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsas gyis ma khyab pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbazhin gshegs pa rgyam tsho thams cad mapa' dang dbras mang pa
130a1(phal chen): bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye
130a2(phal chen): shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khya
130a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas
130a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom
130a5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstan pa rgya
130a6(phal chen): mtsho ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas
130a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe
130b1(phal chen): byad bzang po yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyaba'o//
130b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed par mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
130b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi dpal rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni
130b4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
130b5(phal chen): gdul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gdul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
130b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
130b7(phal chen): pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
131a1(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la
131a2(phal chen): thub pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bri// sangs rgyas bcom
131a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu
131a4(phal chen): 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
131a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs
131a6(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin
131a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
131b1(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bsab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod
131b2(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun
131b3(phal chen): tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang
131b4(phal chen): spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung po'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par
131b5(phal chen): bstun par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga'
131b6(phal chen): ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun
131b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
132a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kumanasu snang bar byed pa'i mang po shes rab chen po'i na mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor ma rnams pa yongs sag zu
132a2(phal chen): ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba
132a3(phal chen): 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon
132a4(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab// mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o// bsam
132a5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir// sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes/
132a6(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par mi nus so//
132a7(phal chen): gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing // dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu
132b1(phal chen): 'jug/ gang rnams sems dag g.yo meng sgyu med cing // snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang // dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni// 'di dag zos shing dga'/
132b2(phal chen): bathob par 'gyur// kun tu bzang po'i sngon lam sa dag dang // chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa// de dag rgyal
132b3(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'o// byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob// gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te//
132b4(phal chen): 'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'dri dag na// kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab
132b5(phal chen): 'khor ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gis lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs zhing rnams kun// de dag rgyu
132b6(phal chen): kun tu blta bar gyis// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bsgrub pa dang // kun tu mig
132b7(phal chen): gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ste/
133a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / mya sa p+ta dang / du ltar byung ba rnams kyis smras sa so// gas s+ho// gsung byu gyu/
133a2(phal chen): bcug zhe na/ 'di lta / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di sa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pashin
133a3(phal chen): tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jug rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rna mtsho'i lhun shin tu brdzun
133a4(phal chen): ba dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin
133a5(phal chen): tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khyams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rkyen gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal
133a6(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi
133a7(phal chen): dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig
133b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byoran pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar
133b2(phal chen): 'gyur ro// kye rgyas pa'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkye la dmigs pa'i sgo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shing
133b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo // 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /
133b4(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis
133b5(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par
133b6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par
133b7(phal chen): dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu
134a1(phal chen): dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis smon par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la
134a2(phal chen): dmigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo //
134a3(phal chen): 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod
134a4(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas// byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag
134a5(phal chen): 'di lta bu// zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi bsam pa bzhin// smon lam rgya
134a6(phal chen): mtsho bsam las rnam sbyangs shing // sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam
134a7(phal chen): 'phrul dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing // nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing 'byung ngo //
134b1(phal chen): spyod pa rgya mtshomatha' dang dbras med rnams/ khyod cing tshad med pade gshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun myong zhing // bskal pa mtha' las rnying rnams re
134b2(phal chen): ror spyong// sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// las kyis zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung // nyin mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas// mos dang bsam/
134b3(phal chen): pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams// rin chen rgyas byung sna tshogs dri med pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir// rgyal sras rnams
134b4(phal chen): ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyong // chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams// kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston to// rnam dag
134b5(phal chen): mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus kyang med// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// pad+mo'i stan 'khor kha dog mtha' yas
134b6(phal chen): kun// de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yi// zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing
134b7(phal chen): bstan pa// rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// sangs rgyas skad cig gcig/
135a1(phal chen): la byin gyis rog// rgyun gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen/ kye rtul ba'i zas dag/ de la gnas pashin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten
135a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyun thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun+da la rab tu gnas
135a3(phal chen): so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab
135a4(phal chen): tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che
135a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi
135a6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung ba lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po
135a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyam rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so//
135b1(phal chen): 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang b.ra'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyun rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag la
135b2(phal chen): sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba med do//
135b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
135b4(phal chen): mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa// rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od
135b5(phal chen): ldan ltos// 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyibs legs 'khor bar rnam par snang // de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab
135b6(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos
135b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor// 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shing tu mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyad// 'ong
136a1(phal chen): zer 'dra ba'i kun nas sbyin 'bar sngos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te// zhing mang mthu' dang dbus med rgya chen pod+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnam
136a2(phal chen): kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas// yangs shing rin chen mang
136a3(phal chen): ldan rgya che de dag byang chub sems dpas gang // lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas// de na bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu
136a4(phal chen): 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas// chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas// la la gos
136a5(phal chen): dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams ring dang thung dang glong gi gzugs
136a6(phal chen): drang rnam pa sna tshogs te// sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang // rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas/
136a7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas// byang chub sems dpa'i
136b1(phal chen): cod pan rin chen 'khor los gzung bas dag par gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang // rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu
136b2(phal chen): gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul// chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mige yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra// mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri med sems kyi shin tu
136b3(phal chen): bskyed pa ste// nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'dri la snang // las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan//
136b4(phal chen): skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams// zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor
136b5(phal chen): 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod// chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya che ston// rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings langs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun
136b6(phal chen): kyang gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas// ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par
136b7(phal chen): sdang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag na
137a1(phal chen): 'gro dang 'ong ba med// mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur// shin tu yangs pa de dag sngon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis
137a2(phal chen): yongs su bzung // / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
137a3(phal chen): klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nam mkha'i
137a4(phal chen): rnam par du mar rnam par phye ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
137a5(phal chen): klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten
137a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug
137a7(phal chen): go 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni mtshan
137b1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstad pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shinatu phra ba snyed
137b2(phal chen): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
137b3(phal chen): gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos// rnam phye sna tshogs mtha'
137b4(phal chen): las dbyibs su gnas// dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun no zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang // la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste// de dag la la
137b5(phal chen): phyogs na gru bzhir gnas// nor bu pad+mo 'khor lo yan lag brgyad// kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris// rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing /
137b6(phal chen): gser las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te// sgo mang mtha' las pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po
137b7(phal chen): can/ nam mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin// de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phye// de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems
138a1(phal chen): kyis rnam par brtags// sku tshogs rgyan dang spang bas kun nas gnas// rnam par 'phrul pa gargyan dngag zha dag gis// ring rnams rgya mchos
138a2(phal chen): rgyas ston pa mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni// rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te// chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin// de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho
138a3(phal chen): bsam mi khyab// sgra cig rtsi la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing // thams cad rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas// kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'a
138a4(phal chen): rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston// rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams// thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par
138a5(phal chen): brtag so// de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor// rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa// de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyis
138a6(phal chen): sprul pa ni// sna tshogs sems dang bsam pa rnam par brtags// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam pa 'phrul pa sprul pa dag/ rnam par
138a7(phal chen): snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te// rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan
138b1(phal chen): dang gzhan du shes par byaste/ 'di ltar 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rim po chu'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rin po che gcig
138b2(phal chen): las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhur can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
138b3(phal chen): nI 'od kha drog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi
138b4(phal chen): shigs pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i
138b5(phal chen): mtshan nyid kyi lhum can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhum can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la miny+tsA ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'a
138b6(phal chen): gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten
138b7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lhun can no//
139a1(phal chen): 'jam na gyi 'dus rgyamatshal 'amangan bu ma thams cad kyi ma rtag gcad pa kyi sa nar// 'dug na lams myastsol la ga tu bla spyang
139a2(phal chen): 'od kyi sgra ca du// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam tshol lan rgya byams cad sbyin tu bstan pa'i lha na // 'jig rten gyi 'ams na mi tshul 'dzu mams kyi
139a3(phal chen): ba sang cig gis dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni byang chub sems pa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhud can
139a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni rin po cha thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni spangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbya
139a5(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa'i lhunam can no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu
139a6(phal chen): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad ba 'di dge sbas so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la 'ani/
139a7(phal chen): rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas// rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra// rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung /
139b1(phal chen): rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od zer ni// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od gsal zer la gnas// 'od kyi sbyin tsam sna tshogs 'od// byang
139b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtshal la ni// mig yang lta bur gnas pa ste// brjod du med cing gzung du med// smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung
139b3(phal chen): la la nor bu mu tig rgyu// snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar// mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag pa// byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang // rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing /
139b4(phal chen): 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing // rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyis sprul pa yin// la la mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis/
139b5(phal chen): kun tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi// zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas// yul
139b6(phal chen): na mo gnas sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtogs pas yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od zer gyi// nor bus sna tshogs kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang /
139b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul// la la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyis rnam
140a1(phal chen): par bris/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tuH
140a2(phal chen): ba rnyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam pa snga tshogs thams cad kyi sngon rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon ta
140a3(phal chen): 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin+da pa rgya mtsho las rab tu
140a4(phal chen): byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
140a5(phal chen): cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan/
140a6(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i
140a7(phal chen): rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam
140b1(phal chen): dang byud pa yongs su ston pa'i rgyun dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i mas dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan+da pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na
140b2(phal chen): mthu'i rdul shin tu za ba med de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kum tu bzang po ltung 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtsha'i rgyun shin du bstan pa 'di nyid 'angs su brgyad
140b3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rgya che mtha
140b4(phal chen): yas te// rnam dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs gnas// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang // sna tshogs rkyen can yangs par kun nas gnas// kha don
140b5(phal chen): sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung // rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs
140b6(phal chen): par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnam so// de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang sngon lam sprin gyi rnams// de dag zhing mang rgya
140b7(phal chen): mchor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas slar 'byin te// sems can de dag rnam smin ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas
141a1(phal chen): ga /
141a2(phal chen): ni sem / sa sa ma / g+sa/
141a3(phal chen): na na / phyudin nga ma / gas 'grus kyi yo pa byang chu / chog
141a4(phal chen): mas mag ma na pa nga/ la sa ci 'i la du
141a5(phal chen): rgyad kyim mo// 'gro ba'i mis med pazhal brgya mcho ma byas pa// dang mam rgyam tsho kun sa sa ma ma pa// 'jig dzad kyi
141b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtshoni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes parlab ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes
141b2(phal chen): gnyen thams cad la brtan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bskal pa mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya
141b3(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu brtad
141b4(phal chen): pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang
141b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang
141b6(phal chen): 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
141b7(phal chen): kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam
142a1(phal chen): par dag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba/
142a2(phal chen): snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan
142a3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyad//
142a4(phal chen): smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung // kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtshos dag/ zhing mang rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed// sngan chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen
142a5(phal chen): bkur cing // skal ba mnyam pa'i las dge longs sbyangs te// snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun tu
142a6(phal chen): ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho longs sbyangs te// bsam gtan tshul dang rnam tharas sbyangs zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung // mos
142a7(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing // rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha'
142b1(phal chen): las zhing rnams byung // bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam bskyed cing // 'gro ba kun par bang don spyod spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bskrun pas/
142b2(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul med tshad med pa'i// pha rol phyin po ma lus kun sbyangs te// smon lam mthar phyin mi zang goms byas pas//
142b3(phal chen): dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams langs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can
142b4(phal chen): sbyangs pas na// 'di 'dra'i yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas// 'gro ba kun
142b5(phal chen): gyi sdug bsngal mtsho bskams pas// zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing // 'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnam
142b6(phal chen): sa te// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam chung rnam par dag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten
142b7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chung
143a1(phal chen): sa sa/ gyu sa smra ga sa sgyu m+b+ha/ phyu
143a2(phal chen): ni mu cha'i tshang ma ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dgu par byin gyis na pa 'o//
143a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'a
143a4(phal chen): ma byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams
143a5(phal chen): nyung ngu rnam par 'dul ba byin gyis rlob bo// sang sa rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can mam tsho mtha' las pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rdzob ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rte
143a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho ri rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba med du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
143a7(phal chen): bos lang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su
143b1(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi// sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung // de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas
143b2(phal chen): thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos su bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems
143b3(phal chen): can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston// la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob// chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kur gyi sgo// rab tu
143b4(phal chen): mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag/ sbyong zhing 'byam k+Shas phyogs bcu kun na yang // la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad// smon
143b5(phal chen): lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go// la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan// sems can yong bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la theg pa gcig kyang rab ston te/
143b6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas// sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad// la la skad cig gcig gis sems cad
143b7(phal chen): rnams// rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub don du 'dul// la la spu yi sgo nas bsam yas pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed// 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon
144a1(phal chen): bkang zhing // thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing // zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu
144a2(phal chen): sgrog/ bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs
144a3(phal chen): dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs// de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi
144a4(phal chen): khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste// sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan// / kye rgyal ba'i
144a5(phal chen): sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes
144a6(phal chen): par bya ste/ 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho
144a7(phal chen): la la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa
144b1(phal chen): mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rdzu mtshol la mi bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa kun nas su
144b2(phal chen): med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskul pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs
144b3(phal chen): pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
144b4(phal chen): med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstun pa 'di nyid yongs su
144b5(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa
144b6(phal chen): tha dad de// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med//
144b7(phal chen): bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang // bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung // bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal
145a1(phal chen): pa'i sgras kyang bsgrags// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings snang // byin brlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams/
145a2(phal chen): bskal pa gcig gis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung // bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can// la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par
145a3(phal chen): gnas// bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad spyod
145a4(phal chen): spyad pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med// 'dri dag rgya chen bskal pa'i
145a5(phal chen): 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams// bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs// bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba// snang dang dri
145a6(phal chen): med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung // dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o// bskal
145a7(phal chen): pa la lar mi yi gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung // bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes// smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur//
145b1(phal chen): bskul pa la la mtha' las rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus// bsal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu// bsku lta ba rgya ma mo kun kyang tshugs ma
145b2(phal chen): 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yanga'i byid// brgal pa la lar bsal pa kun gyi rgyan kyang 'byung // sring gi rkyen rnams rnam par dag pa 'dra la
145b3(phal chen): yod// bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung // bskul ba'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin// zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis
145b4(phal chen): dag/ zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med// skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par
145b5(phal chen): 'byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mthu' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
145b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'dra ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa
145b7(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di la ste/ 'jig rten
146a1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po bsags pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas/
146a2(phal chen): nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la
146a3(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas pa dang /
146a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong bas bskal brgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i
146a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/
146a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe
146a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi
146b1(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya tsho/
146b2(phal chen): kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig
146b3(phal chen): rten gyi khyams rgya mtsho'i bskul pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/
146b4(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyi byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur
146b5(phal chen): bar yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang // sems can nyon mongs mi bzang ldan pa dang // las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams// de dag
146b6(phal chen): bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa dang // bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul
146b7(phal chen): can// rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams// de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyis// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de ni rnam par dag
147a1(phal chen): par snang // sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur ba yang // de mi chos nyid bas pa las yangs pa yi// byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed bu dang /
147a2(phal chen): de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel byas// de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong // bye ba mang po mtha' las mi zad
147a3(phal chen): pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun tu yang // rgyan la rnam pa tha dang long ba min// bskal pa tha drang tshul gyi bye brag sdang // rdul rnams re re sbubs
147a4(phal chen): su dus kun tu// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi// rgyal sras ji tshul 'dong pa de bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mchod tshul dag par 'gyur// gal te/
147a5(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams ni skye 'gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te// 'dri ni zhing rgyan phun sum
147a6(phal chen): tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na// de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min// zhing go/
147a7(phal chen): mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na// de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag
147b1(phal chen): kun kya rgyad kyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul na/ 'jig rjed kyi khyams
147b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed du shes par bya ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / dA ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldar
147b3(phal chen): 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams chu mtsho'i rdul shing
147b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/
147b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
147b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
147b7(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang
148a1(phal chen): mtshan gyi 'khor lo b+hU mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskul
148a2(phal chen): mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/
148a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
148a4(phal chen): mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa'i
148a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
148a6(phal chen): pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
148a7(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa med cing 'dre ba
148b1(phal chen): gang yang med// 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam las sangs rgyas bzhugs// sems can kun gyi byasam pa yid bzhin du/
148b2(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs rgyan byung kun nus
148b3(phal chen): bres sbyangs te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang // de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med// rdul phran rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la// mi yi gtso bo
148b4(phal chen): 'khor rnams kun bskor cing // 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang // gnod pa dag dang 'dre ba'i nyes pa med// rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas
148b5(phal chen): 'od kyi sprin// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing // bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang // rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang
148b6(phal chen): yang med// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnams 'dul yang //
148b7(phal chen): 'byam klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de// de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing // thabs dang
149a1(phal chen): mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med// rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung // 'gro ba sdod
149a2(phal chen): du gyur la de dag brjod byas te// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang // de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad // zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi
149a3(phal chen): rnams// thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud// rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos// las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min// rdul gcig la ni dus/
149a4(phal chen): gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med// 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// shin tu rgyas
149a5(phal chen): pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi
149a6(phal chen): pa'o// / bam po brgyad pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gro ni dang snying po me tog gi rgyun gyis
149a7(phal chen): brtsan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
149b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/ bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du smodan lam
149b2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu grwa bsnyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ni dang spring po me tog gi rgyan
149b3(phal chen): gis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu gzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ gzhi kun nas rnon po
149b4(phal chen): zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/
149b5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril
149b6(phal chen): bu'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhes
149b7(phal chen): rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to// de'i
150a1(phal chen): steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to//
150a2(phal chen): de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bu s+tha sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tig dang mdu shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i ste
150a3(phal chen): na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glong gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi
150a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spros kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim du kun tu
150a5(phal chen): rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis gzhis rton to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ru ba
150a6(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi sdeng ma ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu
150a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+mo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / ze ba
150b1(phal chen): sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ rnam par dag
150b2(phal chen): pa/ shin tu brtan pa/ rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa/ shIng gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug
150b3(phal chen): go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs
150b4(phal chen): su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
150b5(phal chen): gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de// rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan ched sangs rgyas kyi// drung du sngon
150b6(phal chen): tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas// sngon gyi bskal
150b7(phal chen): pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de// 'od snang btang ba
151a1(phal chen): mkha' yi dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o//
151a2(phal chen): me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha' yi dbyings la gnas// rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par
151a3(phal chen): gnas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong // nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams// byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs
151a4(phal chen): rnams kun tu 'dong // 'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par te// 'od chen kun gyis 'od zer
151a5(phal chen): sprin rnams bkye ba ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la 'god// 'jig rten
151a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar// 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams// rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed// brgya byin dag
151a7(phal chen): dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang / 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas// sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa// 'od zer sgo nas sangs
151b1(phal chen): rgyus thams sa nam sa sduga'agro bam sa kun gyi thamam patshas byas rnas// tshul rnams sna tshogs gnas sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig tu rgya
151b2(phal chen): tog ming po de nA na// rdul phran kun gyi longs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkyi sangs rgyas sbyin rnams 'bar bar srung // rnam par snang mdzad na
151b3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i zhing la ltos// bskal ba rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal byas te// smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang // bzang bar
151b4(phal chen): spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i// dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yin// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las
151b5(phal chen): 'jog rte kyi khams rgyamachog ni mas tog gi na gyis brgyan 'i ma rgyam tsho yongs su dag sa yang bya sa byu ba le lta /
151b6(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/ nor bu'i
151b7(phal chen): rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan dan thams cad las grub pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi
152a1(phal chen): brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba rin po che'i chu thams cad kun
152a2(phal chen): nas 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyun thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog
152a3(phal chen): dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan
152a4(phal chen): bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan
152a5(phal chen): dang yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
152a6(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can// nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnam
152a7(phal chen): par 'phrul pas byung // dri med khor lug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang // mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha'/
152b1(phal chen): las rin chen rnams kyis brtan// ming po nor bu'i sdom can sna tshogs ma// 'dzam bu chu chung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs// 'od 'phro ngam pa phyogs su spang zhing tsher/
152b2(phal chen): khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rjes 'dus byas shin tu sra zhing brtan// mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'phrul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin
152b3(phal chen): chen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang // spos chu'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas to// rin chen tsan dan me tog kun tu dgram// padz+ra
152b4(phal chen): sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog/ rin chen gyi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan// nor bzangs kun gyis kun ras
152b5(phal chen): gzi brjid 'dar// 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'phro ba dug pa'i gdugs 'chang ba'i/
152b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag
152b7(phal chen): thams cad dang // nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing // kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba// gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang // thams cad
153a1(phal chen): gzugs su mu rnams mtha' yas te// sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pas// thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bka' zhing // sems can/
153a2(phal chen): mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag
153a3(phal chen): byas pa// de dag de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyasu phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor lug
153a4(phal chen): gi rgyun rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'khor yug chen po de'i nang na 'jig rten gyi khams
153a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa/ rin po che'i rigs thams cad
153a6(phal chen): las grub pa rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can/ mi mtho mi dma' ba'i thung mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa nor bu rin po che'i tshen thams
153a7(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/
153b1(phal chen): rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
153b2(phal chen): yog pa nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam par gang la bya/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyi sprin gyi rnam par
153b3(phal chen): bres pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang / nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs
153b4(phal chen): ba sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos
153b5(phal chen): yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
153b6(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam// 'khor lo'i dri bas bsgrubs pas mi shig sra// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shig/
153b7(phal chen): rin chen sna tshog kun gyis kun tu gang // yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi// rin chen chu ba ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs// pad+mo dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa// tsan dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram/
154a1(phal chen): 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams// 'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs su smin kyang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram
