154a2(phal chen): sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas log/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas// mi zad yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs
154a3(phal chen): rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni sman par rab tu sgrog/ rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun// shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston// sngan
154a4(phal chen): chang spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang // de la rgya mtsho nor bu zla tshogs gting // dri yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul sdang /
154a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong yuli dri dag ming gi rnangs// rgyamatsho gan kyi rdul bran ze rer rma'i// me tog snying po chen gyi 'khor las bsgrubs// der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'ad ba'i
154a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog/ snang pa byang chub 'khor du ngam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag/ sa yi nor bu rgyam las rab tu 'byung /
154a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston/ chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam lus
154b1(phal chen): shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams rgya ma tshe kun bya yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i yong sangs rgyas pal la mnas
154b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam mchi sa'i gzhi'i rnam shis tu bstan pa zhes b+ha bas+ye lerje bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi grus
154b3(phal chen): mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis
154b4(phal chen): brgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par sdang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o//
154b5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi glong du 'khyil pa'o// tsan dan gyi phye ma dang
154b6(phal chen): 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o//
154b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bur rab tu 'gyed pa'o// kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs pas rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan
155a1(phal chen): pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi 'phreng ba bcur/
155a2(phal chen): rab tu brtse ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun
155a3(phal chen): nas brgyan pa'o// 'di lta lnga/ nor bu dang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu thams
155a4(phal chen): cad kyi pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
155a5(phal chen): snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka dang spros kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba rin po
155a6(phal chen): che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// tsan dan dang / spos dang / nor bu mang po sgra thams
155a7(phal chen): cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / gos dang /
155b1(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun
155b2(phal chen): nas bskor ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
155b3(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yis// rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de// gzhi rnams rin
155b4(phal chen): chen gos kyis kun bting ba// mi shig rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang // nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro sdug sprin dang // pad+mo rin cher 'phreng ba'ang kur
155b5(phal chen): nas bres// gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong // sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis
155b6(phal chen): kyang // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog/ them skasu 'phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan// gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stegs bu kur bkod rin chen pad+mo yi/
155b7(phal chen): sprin sdug dra ba rnam par dris pa ste// rin chen nor bu'i shing gi 'phreng ba dag/ rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang
156a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste// me tog puN+Da ri kas kun nas bskor// spos dang 'od dang
156a2(phal chen): bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed// de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tigi 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing // rin
156a3(phal chen): tshen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag/ thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ pad+mo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan/
156a4(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyi
156a5(phal chen): rnams// rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// rgya mtshos bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan// sngan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyi// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs
156a6(phal chen): sbyangs pa// shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa'ang // de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogs
156a7(phal chen): su 'khor zhing 'bab pa gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor byas pa ste/ spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog
156b1(phal chen): dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i 'khor lo dang / nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil
156b2(phal chen): 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che
156b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o// spyod pa'i 'od kyi glong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan
156b4(phal chen): thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i
156b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o// dus gsum du gshegs
156b6(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o// spos kyi chu dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab
156b7(phal chen): tu 'byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
157a1(phal chen): bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu /
157a2(phal chen): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag smras so// chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing // gzhi ni nor bu'i rdo rje pad+mos byas// rin chen mang
157a3(phal chen): sil bus gzhi bkram zhing // kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them skas 'phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor// pad+mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te// me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig
157a4(phal chen): 'phreng ba dang // me tog lnga ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres// nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab// rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par
157a5(phal chen): bkod// sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad rjod// de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' glong ngo // phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par
157a6(phal chen): yang // spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo // chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang //
157a7(phal chen): rin chen kun gyi zer du rab tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong/
157b1(phal chen): las// spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab// rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis// log cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab// rgyal ba kun gyi byang
157b2(phal chen): chub stod pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud// sangs rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang // sangs rgyas tham cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag/ rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang
157b3(phal chen): ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dpa' glong dag las kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/ chos kyi dbyings rnams
157b4(phal chen): rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang // chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing // nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs
157b5(phal chen): rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang / spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa
157b6(phal chen): sde/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka'i 'phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// chu klung gi bar
157b7(phal chen): de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o// shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad
158a1(phal chen): sbyin rtag par rab tu 'byung/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // shing gA par de dag pan+d+ha/
158a2(phal chen): cad byu rjong shin tu 'byung ba/ snyos dang me tog sa tshogs kyis rab tug pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal ba sna sa na sa thams cad kyi sngon lam brgal ba thams cad du byin gyis ma
158a3(phal chen): sgyu sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs sgra gang ba no// thos 'od 'phro ba'i smin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o// spos kyi rdul pa yang du 'ong ba b+hU/
158a4(phal chen): tshigs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyam bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gros kyi tshogs sna tshogs smin
158a5(phal chen): lta bus mngon par yog pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par
158a6(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs pargya
158a7(phal chen): klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos tshun
158b1(phal chen): chu krung gi bar gyi rgyun yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid longs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ klu de'i tshe tshogs su bcang
158b2(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bris// yal gi me tog sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i// shing gi 'phreng bas
158b3(phal chen): kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas// rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams
158b4(phal chen): kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste// me tog rnam bris rin chen 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste// rgyan dang sems
158b5(phal chen): can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang // sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par gang // phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i
158b6(phal chen): sprin// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par sdang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas// mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye// nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod//
158b7(phal chen): kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing //
159a1(phal chen): stobs brgya mngar ba'i chos nyid rab tu srog/ rin chem sna tshugs buN+Da ri ka yis// chu rnams kun nus snying po non bu mos// de las mi zad 'od zer /
159a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnams// rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo sna tshogs 'byung // dus rnams gsum po'i rgya marnams thams cad kyang // nor bu de dag 'bru yi na na ste// 'byung ba med ning
159a3(phal chen): gzung dungu'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed// sngan chad
159a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de// rang gi
159a5(phal chen): ming dang lung bsdums yi rnams// bsam pa rnam ngag tshul bzhin de dag mthong / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
159a6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis
159a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par
159b1(phal chen): bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing / yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyud shin
159b2(phal chen): tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yos su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
159b3(phal chen): zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste// sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par
159b4(phal chen): 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par snang // zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// byang chub sems dpa'
159b5(phal chen): rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste// nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams/
159b6(phal chen): rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od// rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang // 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid
159b7(phal chen): 'chang ba dang // sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho gang // sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra// de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis
160a1(phal chen): brlabs pa yi// ning rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni nam 'phrul zhing // ji snyed shing du de dag kun drug
160a2(phal chen): dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang // de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang // 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad
160a3(phal chen): spyong phul te// sngon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang ba'i spyod pas grang rnams byung gyur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul phran
160a4(phal chen): kun la rang rang gis// rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su// de dag spyod yul
160a5(phal chen): thams cad mthong bas na// skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste// de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med// sbyar
160a6(phal chen): lam stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste// sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin
160a7(phal chen): tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi
160b1(phal chen): khams kyi chung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phywa bskyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/
160b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas
160b3(phal chen): ba dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang
160b4(phal chen): gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyis rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa
160b5(phal chen): dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa
160b6(phal chen): la la ni rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can
160b7(phal chen): gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni
161a1(phal chen): me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtshol rab tu gnas s+ho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshe 'byam klas pa la lani nor bya na pa lta'i dra ba'i rnam stsol
161a2(phal chen): gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa lnga la ni 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho grong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyab ma 'grus /
161a3(phal chen): pa la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs
161a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa 'jig
161a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang
161a6(phal chen): dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni chu
161a7(phal chen): klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o//
161b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pA la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa lnga la ni mig mangs ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
161b2(phal chen): 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni
161b3(phal chen): rdo'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa'i
161b4(phal chen): dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten
161b5(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
161b6(phal chen): pa la la ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
161b7(phal chen): la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun nas yog pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
162a1(phal chen): lnga la ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs la bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drug/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam
162a2(phal chen): pabar bye ba shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun
162a3(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa skye/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 'ong
162a4(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'odra 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog/
162a5(phal chen): kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul lA lA ni byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la
162a6(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no//
162a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyis lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya ma
162b1(phal chen): la /
162b2(phal chen): sa rgyas ma nga tshul sasu dag pa // 'dzim ma lams kyi rgyal po 'di myung ba
162b3(phal chen): nga kyi rnam 'i sgra'i rnam na/ ga rngur me khams kyi tshul la la sangs rgyas kyi rdul thams cung mngan par sgrub pa'i sgo'i lham camado// 'jig rte kyi las
162b4(phal chen): kyi tshul la la ni nang gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i ldum can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can no//
162b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor la'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lo ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung
162b6(phal chen): ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la lani sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgo'i lhur can no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
162b7(phal chen): dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub
163a1(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/
163a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan par grub// dri med dri dral 'ong
163a3(phal chen): 'gyed snying po can// nor bu pad+mo rgya mtsho kun+da la gnas// la la gAng+gA'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gi gzhi gnas shing // dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog
163a4(phal chen): gzugs kyang mang // ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang // zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs kun lta// la la 'od lus me tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin
163a5(phal chen): dang chu// la lnga'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus// nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shig sra// 'byam klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal// 'od 'dra 'od 'phro me mar sprin gyi
163a6(phal chen): mdog/ la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung // la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra yi lus// spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi dgra yi lus//
163a7(phal chen): la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra// la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tam sla// zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bas ma las pa// kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul/
163b1(phal chen): yangam pa mi zang rgyad gyi rnams// tshang me dgun gyis phyogs sun rgyas par 'grengs// phyogs rnams gung tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te// langs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyung zhugs par
163b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun tu 'dra bar snang ba yang // 'gro ba mod cing 'jug pa med pa min// tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gangs// thams cad ma lus re re ma rab tu 'dra// de la
163b3(phal chen): tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te// gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus kyang med// zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun ras snang /
163b4(phal chen): smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing // zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul// zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang // bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpa'
163b5(phal chen): gang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston cing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ zhing
163b6(phal chen): gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bsnun pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// / bam po dgu pa// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi kham
163b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings de na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas rnam par bye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de//
164a1(phal chen): kye rdul ba'i sras dag/ de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus/
164a2(phal chen): ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan
164a3(phal chen): gyi pad+mo chen po gzhi spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od
164a4(phal chen): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab
164a5(phal chen): tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa
164a6(phal chen): mtshams nor bu rin po che'i zla ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu log par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi
164a7(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/
164b1(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das panA
164b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spros sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyud ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyis mtshams can/ rin po che'i pad+mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs
164b3(phal chen): lngar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
164b4(phal chen): kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu pra ba sbed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
164b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyar kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can
164b6(phal chen): rin pa che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzung po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa/ yan lag brgyad du dpa' ba'i
164b7(phal chen): dbyibs can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ den de
165a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu/
165a2(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sa mtshams can kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan/
165a3(phal chen): pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i
165a4(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
165a5(phal chen): gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang drag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
165a6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed 'das pa nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can
165a7(phal chen): shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad nas grwa/ du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i
165b1(phal chen): rdul ba mangs pa'i dbyangs su sdog pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyan mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu grub med kyi 'khor gyis/
165b2(phal chen): bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phrang
165b3(phal chen): skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag
165b4(phal chen): cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che shI la'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyam gyi sa mtshams can rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su
165b5(phal chen): 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
165b6(phal chen): de'i skyeng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyar gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig
165b7(phal chen): rkyen gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyar/
166a1(phal chen): gyis mtshams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang rin po che'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang / mu tigA dang / skyegs
166a2(phal chen): bus kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
166a3(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi
166a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs
166a5(phal chen): kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun
166a6(phal chen): nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
166a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu dra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyi dbyangs rab tu klog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/
166b1(phal chen): rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyis mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho/
166b2(phal chen): gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs lhur 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri'i sden rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgya man+dan gyis kun nus yog pa yod de
166b3(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/
166b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan
166b5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang /
166b6(phal chen): rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho lo rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa/ spos dang / nor bu dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sbyin
166b7(phal chen): ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
167a1(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas/
167a2(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun+da nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams can/ me tog sa
167a3(phal chen): tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i bla res kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
167a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
167a5(phal chen): snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nus nyon mongs pa
167a6(phal chen): 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi glong can gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa me tog 'khyil pa'i dbyibs lhur 'dug pa/
167a7(phal chen): gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
167b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu za ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng
167b2(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyan mongs la rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams can/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dog sna tshogs can gyis shim tu brgyu
167b3(phal chen): ba tra pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ nam mkha' lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
167b4(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'dri bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gI rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa ni/ 'jig
167b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing cu ma ni'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas/
167b6(phal chen): nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun gyis mtshams can/ rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu granas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa rdo rje'i smin
167b7(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
168a1(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
168a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi tha ro'i sa mtshams can/ me tog gi drang rgya batshornam
168a3(phal chen): par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
168a4(phal chen): stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
168a5(phal chen): gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag
168a6(phal chen): pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbal gyi mgo
168a7(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med
168b1(phal chen): pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis/
168b2(phal chen): rab tu brgyan gyis snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskyor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa
168b3(phal chen): dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyis mtshams can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa
168b4(phal chen): dbyi bas yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog dang / shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chag
168b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
168b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa
168b7(phal chen): thams cad kyis mtshams can/ me tog gi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs mu tig gi 'phreng ba bskyil ba lta bur 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad
169a1(phal chen): kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshang med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
169a2(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
169a3(phal chen): zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams
169a4(phal chen): can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil pa ltar 'jug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil
169a5(phal chen): 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba
169a6(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang dag par
169a7(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i
169b1(phal chen): sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lnga dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal ba'i rgyamatsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyun gyi rnam pa dum dang ri po che sna tshugs thams cad dang ldarAm/
169b2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags
169b3(phal chen): pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa gzhan
169b4(phal chen): dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis
169b5(phal chen): 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa/ rnam par
169b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang byin gyi rlabs gzhan can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor
169b7(phal chen): ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas
170a1(phal chen): yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu gru bsnyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyi
170a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor
170a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas
170a4(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byam klas
170a5(phal chen): byas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo sangs rgyas kyi
170a6(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sems can sna tshogs
170a7(phal chen): kyi gzugs dang lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i shin tu phra ba snyed dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs
170b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu dra ba med dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprid/
170b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dru ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
170b3(phal chen): klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs lngar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs
170b4(phal chen): ltar 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
170b5(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa rnam par gdag
170b6(phal chen): pasangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa srungs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
170b7(phal chen): sbed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba
171a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcus bcu gu gri grong dang bzlas pa'i khyongs na 'dug go/ sos
171a2(phal chen): rgyamatsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ying du 'ong bya de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs log na sngas chu'i rgya mtsho gong chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ ngan
171a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya spros dang rin pa che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+mo chen po la rab tu
171a4(phal chen): gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can yod do// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa
171a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ring gi rdul shim tu phra bamed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bsko / gcig tu dag bya/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi glang chem po tshol rab tu
171a6(phal chen): gnas pa/ 'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ pad+mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces
171a7(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
171b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu zla bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rim pa che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze brgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du
171b2(phal chen): 'dug pa/ mu tig grong khyer dngul gyi dpal gyi snying ge'i khri'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i bla rga sa
171b3(phal chen): shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal myi dkyil 'khor
171b4(phal chen): ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor bya/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril
171b5(phal chen): bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho lnga rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan rtswa tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
171b6(phal chen): ba chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
171b7(phal chen): khams gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos chu kha dog
172a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshen dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho lnga rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i/
172a2(phal chen): 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor logs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
172a3(phal chen): khams sang rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na / 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra
172a4(phal chen): ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa spos dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer rdul
172a5(phal chen): dang bral ba dang spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
172a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
172a7(phal chen): kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas
172b1(phal chen): ba/ zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang khrod zer gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba drim
172b2(phal chen): med pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos
172b3(phal chen): brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas
172b4(phal chen): pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa me tog/
172b5(phal chen): gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag
172b6(phal chen): par bsags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od
172b7(phal chen): mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis
173a1(phal chen): kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
173a2(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
173a3(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar
173a4(phal chen): 'dug pa/ me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
173a5(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
173a6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
173a7(phal chen): sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdug kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
173b1(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
173b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor
173b3(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi ma sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal
173b4(phal chen): shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyings su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
173b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas
173b6(phal chen): nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i rgyun thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis
173b7(phal chen): nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
174a1(phal chen): tu pra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis/
174a2(phal chen): bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi ze ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog
174a3(phal chen): ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
174a4(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
174a5(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ gling bzhi'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i/
174a6(phal chen): rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
174a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba med 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam par sdang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag
174b1(phal chen): ni kun nam nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje bcwo rgya mtsho lnga rab tu gnas pa/ lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs lngar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lum mig yor gyi smin rin po che'i cod par rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can
174b2(phal chen): gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu zab
174b3(phal chen): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dam mchog lhor yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
174b4(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i tsan ngan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
174b5(phal chen): mu tig gi me tog mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ dri na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi
174b6(phal chen): brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun
174b7(phal chen): tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha'
175a1(phal chen): yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ thos chu'i grong gi dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ brin ma po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi smin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin
175a2(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i skung 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba med 'das pa na/ 'jig
175a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas
175a4(phal chen): nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas dran pa'i glong gi dbyings su 'dug pa sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i
175a5(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
175a6(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dbul gyi dbyangs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
175a7(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ gser gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo la/
175b1(phal chen): dog snga tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas ldog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i
175b2(phal chen): steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning nyi shu'i rdul
175b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su
175b4(phal chen): 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron pa
175b5(phal chen): nam mkha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs log spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de
175b6(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so// de thams cad kyi
175b7(phal chen): 'og 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba sdang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rted gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal
176a1(phal chen): zo shing gi snying po'i rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po tshangs pa thams cad las byung chubasems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun/
176a2(phal chen): nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sa sa rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
176a3(phal chen): skyedu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan mthun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
176a4(phal chen): de'i snying 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha drog tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/
176a5(phal chen): den de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das
176a6(phal chen): ban/ 'jig rten gyi khams smos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rten ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi na ba kyang gas bya bzhugs so//
176a7(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba
176b1(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i sdeng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin pa che'i badros rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo rnam
176b2(phal chen): rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i la
176b3(phal chen): shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs mo// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ba med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya
176b4(phal chen): mtshe yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog
176b5(phal chen): pad+mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyun du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings
176b6(phal chen): kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu sdang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dang
176b7(phal chen): bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/
177a1(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/
177a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin
177a3(phal chen): du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
177a4(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glong gi 'phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan
177a5(phal chen): nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshen gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams
177a6(phal chen): cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
177a7(phal chen): gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan langs pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun tu brgya/
177b1(phal chen): pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
177b2(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phrang snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rter gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor
177b3(phal chen): bgacig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas
177b4(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i lho phyogs logs ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal
177b5(phal chen): rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
177b6(phal chen): mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba pad+mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
177b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i glong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i go cha dang
178a1(phal chen): mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
178a2(phal chen): tshe rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rted kyi khams gzi brjid 'ong 'gro ba'i spyang
178a3(phal chen): bo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'kho
178a4(phal chen): lo gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal
178a5(phal chen): mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
178a6(phal chen): zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par shin tu phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhug so//
178a7(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes shin tu langs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
178b1(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs su meng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
178b2(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
178b3(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas
178b4(phal chen): gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byam klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba
178b5(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba
178b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
178b7(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgrom ma rab tu snang ba
179a1(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis
179a2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
179a3(phal chen): pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
179a4(phal chen): ba yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
179a5(phal chen): dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer
179a6(phal chen): phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
179a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi pad+mo dri ma med
179b1(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
179b2(phal chen): tu za ba med 'das par / 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig
179b3(phal chen): tu dag pa/ rgyan dang / spos dang / nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i
179b4(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong+ga kun tu 'byung bas sprul pa chen po'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas lho
179b5(phal chen): phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+da n+ti las rab tu brgyad pa'i rgyar can ces bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa zhes
179b6(phal chen): bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyun gyi pad+mo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ba yod de/
179b7(phal chen): de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
180a1(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/
180a2(phal chen): rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad pad+mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i
180a3(phal chen): steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
180a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng ge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
180a5(phal chen): khams pad+mo'i gdan yongs su byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byam klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
180a6(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab
180a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i
180b1(phal chen): gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal
180b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i
180b3(phal chen): dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes
180b4(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs ri rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so//
180b5(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so//
180b6(phal chen): bam po bcu pa// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogarab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
180b7(phal chen): gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i smon lam rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi grong gis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
181a1(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng nu 'jig rten gyi khams sra zhing mi shig
181a2(phal chen): ba'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan pa dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi
181a3(phal chen): thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
181a4(phal chen): rgyan shin tu bsrungs pas spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams in+d+ra nI la
181a5(phal chen): dang tsan dran gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsgul bar zab pa'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i
181a6(phal chen): steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od rab tu 'gyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes
181a7(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur sprul pa shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi gzi brjid dam pa mnyam pa
181b1(phal chen): med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba
181b2(phal chen): bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
181b3(phal chen): kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos dang nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa/ rgyan dang
181b4(phal chen): theg pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas lho phyogs logs na spos
181b5(phal chen): chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje brtad pas bsgrubs pa'i gzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'khrul rnam par phye ba'i dra ba'i bye brag ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
181b6(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i ye shes thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi lhun can yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i dra ba 'khor lo'i sprin ces bya ba/ 'jig rten
181b7(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ man shel gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtshos brtan pa/ ri rab kyi dbyibs ltar
182a1(phal chen): 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul mig 'phrul lta bu'i sprin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mu kun
182a2(phal chen): nas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer phra mo mi zad pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
182a3(phal chen): pa dgongs pa dam pa mchog shin tu langs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi chu bo kun nas snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
182a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po bla na med pa'i sprin mi zad pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing dang me tog nye bar gyur pa'i rgyal mtshan
182a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gis yog pa'i 'od ces
182a6(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i 'khor lor dbyangs rab
182a7(phal chen): tu gtong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus shin tu thugs su chud pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
182b1(phal chen): khams shing mdzes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs par 'gro ba mngon du ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams se
182b2(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od 'dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od dri ma med pa nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
182b3(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che mang po rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i blo gros kyi dpal zhes bya ba
