211a1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo ra ba bskor ba/ 'jig rten kun nAnu tha mi dang / sangs rgyas ming rnams re reng yang / rgyal ba gcig ni skye 'gyur te// lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du//
211a2(phal chen): chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston// sems can snod du ma gyur la// sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad de// sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni// de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po'i
211a3(phal chen): zhing gi rnams// zhing rnams re re dag tu yang // sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye// rgyal ba so so de dag na// sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing // chos kyi
211a4(phal chen): dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// zhing rnams la la 'od med de// mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra// bltan mi
211a5(phal chen): bzang gyi yang gzhag/ zhing rnams la la lha 'od nan// la la khyin gyi 'od can te// la la'i zla'i 'od dang ldan// ning gi dra bya bsam mi khyi// rnyi rnams la la rang gi 'od/
211a6(phal chen): ga 'od kyad dri ma med// gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/ de dag sems can dgengs byung // la la ri yi 'od can te// zhing rnams la la non nu'i 'od // la la ma mchi 'ang
211a7(phal chen): ma // mams can mas kyil kyi'i byug/ zhing rnams la las sa rgyas 'ong/ byang chub sems dpas sung thugapa/ zhing rnams la la bcwa'i 'od/ 'od 'gro'ang can
211b1(phal chen): du'adzes/ nang mas lal ba tog 'od// rlom chu'i 'do dang ldam pa'ang yod// zlos dang dag pa'i 'od 'gro can// smod lam dbang gis rnam par stsal// nying yus la la sri thong /
211b2(phal chen): nod du'i go cha'i 'od kyis gas pa/ sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyi sa blang // ying du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyas lham rin na bo dang 'ong du chud
211b3(phal chen): rdo rje gapar kyi'odakyis sdang / yongs su dag pa'i sgra bya mtshan// de dag na ni mug bsngal med// thams cad rgya gyi 'od can drug/ ning rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la snying bye byung
211b4(phal chen): 'od// 'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang // sangs rgyas spel ba'i snang ba can// sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon par log/ kun tu 'od kyis rab tu sngag// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/
211b5(phal chen): ning rnams la la 'jigs sgra can// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can// rtsub cing brlang ba sgra rnams dang // yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog/ dmyal ba byel song skye gnas dang // gshin
211b6(phal chen): rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams// mya ngan rgya mtsho zhing gi rnams// nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung // la la dag na yid 'ong sgra// dga' bar byed cing ston 'dems pa// dge ba'i
211b7(phal chen): las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs// zhing gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog/ la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs// gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te// 'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang // la la'i zhing
212a1(phal chen): na rab tu zag/ zhing rnams la la sprin gyi sna// rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang // nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang // rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab/ 'od zer grong /
212a2(phal chen): gi sgra rnams dang // sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang // 'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung // chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang / kha cig ni phan bsam
212a3(phal chen): yas pa'i// smod lam rgya mtsho'i ngo ro dang // spyod pa'i sgra yang ldan pa 'byung // dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang // de dag zhing rnams 'byung
212a4(phal chen): ba'i sgra// zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang // tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin// chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang // kha cig zhing na rab tu grag/ kun tu bzang
212a5(phal chen): po'i smon lam gyi// sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin// bskal par gnas shing rab tu sgrog/ sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes// zhing gi dbyibs rnams la la na// sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa
212a6(phal chen): yi sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba// de dag kun na rab tu grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod po shin
212a7(phal chen): tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten kyi la kyi rdul shin tu pra ba
212b1(phal chen): sred kyi pha rol/ de bas kyang ba snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba
212b2(phal chen): byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni rin po che'i pad+mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu
212b3(phal chen): bri ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas
212b4(phal chen): bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ri rab dang / grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang / rkom dang / gos
212b5(phal chen): kyi longs spyod yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba rgyan gyi rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par
212b6(phal chen): dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi rgyan mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng
212b7(phal chen): na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag
213a1(phal chen): tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa rin po cha
213a2(phal chen): rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i 'phreng gis kun nas bskor ba/ spros dang rin po che'i pad+mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams
213a3(phal chen): cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra lid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang bar byasdu pa/
213a4(phal chen): grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po yal gA'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar
213a5(phal chen): phyogs logs na/ grong khyer chen po'i 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa/
213a6(phal chen): chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tags dang / phru ma'i ra ba bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'obs spos chus gang ba/ rin po
213a7(phal chen): che'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog puN+Da ri kas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i 'phreng brgyan sna tshogs kyi tshigs mang po 'byin pa bdun
213b1(phal chen): gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang khang pa brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi 'greng ba'i dra ba dang / in+da nI la'i dra ba/
213b2(phal chen): dang rdo d+ha'i pad+ma'i drabs sun nas log pa/ rin pa che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang rol mo'i sla mang po thams cad kyi srin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang 'phreng ba'i rtsem pa rdzogs
213b3(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor ku na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin mo
213b4(phal chen): che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// bza' shing gi ra dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun+da nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi bab
213b5(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i
213b6(phal chen): sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ nam mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha
213b7(phal chen): stag go// de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
214a1(phal chen): yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer/
214a2(phal chen): gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do// de dang 'dab chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin
214a3(phal chen): po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do// de dang 'dra ba chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag
214a4(phal chen): khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i
214a5(phal chen): bar du stenags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thab cad kyi shing la lag sku
214a6(phal chen): mi rgya ba'i kyil 'khor ras rgyas bkun nas klong gi na che'i po tog gzug dang phyi rnam pa tha da mang po shin tu rgyas pa/ spros da me mngo poms cad kyi kha dzeg ltar 'dug pa'i 'phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkram pani
214a7(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od thung du 'gro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa phyogs bcur 'od zer mang pos rnam par spang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams
214b1(phal chen): cang rin po che sna tshogs mang thos smras pa rol mo thams cad kyis dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcu ma tog/
214b2(phal chen): sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung bya yod de/ de'i mdun du bad+mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya bu rgyar dbag chad bye ba zag brgya yong pa rtsa bsgos dang
214b3(phal chen): rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su myur ba/ rin po che rnam pa tha dang pa tshad med pa'i 'dab mnyan rin po
214b4(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba dang spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshan bkye ba pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu
214b5(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba phyogs bcur 'od kyis dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa ze ba thams cad las ling du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi/
214b6(phal chen): khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rI rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las bskal pa'i thog ma
214b7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ste/
215a1(phal chen): des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'jig rten gyi khams
215a2(phal chen): dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyi
215a3(phal chen): rgyun gyis rab tu brgyan par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor/
215a4(phal chen): gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed gzhal med khang dang khang khyim gyi rdal thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed rin po che'i
215a5(phal chen): me tog dang 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
215a6(phal chen): mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
215a7(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams
215b1(phal chen): der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang sangs rgyas
215b2(phal chen): blta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
215b3(phal chen): yon tan thams cad kyi ri bor rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros
215b4(phal chen): pa ta sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil
215b5(phal chen): gyis gdon pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon
215b6(phal chen): du sdod pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa 'jig rten gyi kham tham cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa
215b7(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de pad+mo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to// ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab
216a1(phal chen): me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po
216a2(phal chen): che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun
216a3(phal chen): nas snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
216a4(phal chen): dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi/
216a5(phal chen): sprin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye
216a6(phal chen): ste'ajig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab
216a7(phal chen): dpal gyi sprin gyi 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ bsgrings pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu gsal
216b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta ba la bsgribs pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems cad thabs cad kyi rtog pa yang rnam par dag/ dge ba'i rgyam tshethams cad kya bzung / sapa/
216b2(phal chen): yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag/ mi lom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i g.yangs dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par gras la/ lus dang sems kyi
216b3(phal chen): gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi sangs rgyas mthong ngas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od
216b4(phal chen): zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dod par gyur to//
216b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ nga la grong khyer chen po 'od 'gro ba'i 'od ces bya ba der rgyal po bltan dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po
216b6(phal chen): byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yong ngo // rgyal po'i bu gzi
216b7(phal chen): brjid chen po la yang bud med bltan bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod ngo do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon du gzi brjid chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/
217a1(phal chen): sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyas chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgya su thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting /
217a2(phal chen): 'dzin khong du chud // 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgro kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i
217a3(phal chen): sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud //
217a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya/
217a5(phal chen): ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btung snyoms chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya
217a6(phal chen): chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi
217a7(phal chen): tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs shes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen
217b1(phal chen): po'i sgo khong du chud do// de nas rgyal po gzhon du gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs
217b2(phal chen): thams cad la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams// mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med lo// sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu sngam/
217b3(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba stong dag gis// mgon po 'jig rted byung ba ni// sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams// rgyal ba su ni rab tu snang // ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la// sam
217b4(phal chen): rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang // de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gzhag/ 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab bkye ba// 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes//
217b5(phal chen): 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus/
217b6(phal chen): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags// 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan
217b7(phal chen): rnam par brjod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis// sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu ni// 'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes// byang chub
218a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing // bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung // phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs/
218a2(phal chen): snying po byang chub 'di la yang // sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang srid zhu ldan gyur te//
218a3(phal chen): dga' zhing shin tu mos byas shing // chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong // kye rgyal ba'i skus dag/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshig
218a4(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grug par gyur to//
218a5(phal chen): de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
218a6(phal chen): zhang rnon rnams dang gzhon nu dang // rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang // tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang //
218a7(phal chen): snga dag gis myur du sgrogs/ kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir deng zhig srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang // dge ba'i dril gyi snga spogs shig zus
218b1(phal chen): chung ma 'khor bcas pa// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'dreng // grong khyer rnams kyang rgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun kyang kun tu res// rgyal mtshan dram pa bzung po'i rnams/
218b2(phal chen): nong bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sbrengs// rin chen dra ba'i tha res rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil du ze bar gyis// nam mkha' 'dri las thams cad du// sil snyan sbyin gyi sgra dgu byung /
218b3(phal chen): lam gyi srang yang rgyan par gyis// rin chen char yang kun tu pho ba// gzhon pa rin chen bstang bar gyis// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis/
218b4(phal chen): sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab par gyis// spos dang pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin// me tog gri dugs rnams
218b5(phal chen): bsam las dang // se mo do dang 'phrong sprin rnams// gos kyi sngon gyi char thob cig/ ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor los rgyan par gyis// dri med tsan ngan phye ma'i/
218b6(phal chen): rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston// nor bu'i 'phreng dang me tog 'phreng // rin chen 'phreng ba dri med dang // rin chen sgron ma'i sprin gyis rnams// nam mkha'i dbyings la
218b7(phal chen): sgrub par gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la// dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de// bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// rgyal ba blta phyir kun 'dong ngo //
219a1(phal chen): de nas rgyal bu blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs
219a2(phal chen): pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun du
219a3(phal chen): bdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas de'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu
219a4(phal chen): chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
219a5(phal chen): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas kyang / lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu/
219a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gan ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang
219a7(phal chen): klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa'
219b1(phal chen): bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod myi dbye ba bdun num bdun dang lhan cig/ dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med yang bzang po nas kyang / dri ba'i rgyal po bltan dga' ba zhes bya ba dri babye ba
219b2(phal chen): dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhad cig/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshen nas kyang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lham yin bye ba sto
219b3(phal chen): phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte b.ras kyang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba rnam
219b4(phal chen): mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang // mi 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ni bye ba phram
219b5(phal chen): bco brgyad dang lhan cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po che grag pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba
219b6(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig/ tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshungs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyi pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba
219b7(phal chen): phrag bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom
220a1(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang /
220a2(phal chen): bcas pa dag nas/ sems cad gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de dong skye bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
220a3(phal chen): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyis dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i
220a4(phal chen): dbang nye bar bzung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi/
220a5(phal chen): khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa bsdam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di
220a6(phal chen): bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo//
220a7(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang
220b1(phal chen): chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/
220b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smod lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa
220b3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab
220b4(phal chen): tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang
220b5(phal chen): dbus med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par
220b6(phal chen): sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba
220b7(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon du bstan pa
221a1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thams cad la
221a2(phal chen): le sa kyi srung ba rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brji chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi byi rab kyi dpal gyi snod d+hI
221a3(phal chen): rgya mtshol ye shes kyi snang b.rabatu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brdabs kyis da'i tsho tshigs su cad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal mas nyid 'di thos nas// ngag ni
221a4(phal chen): shes snang ba skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong // sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur// phun sum tshogs 'gyur kun kyang mthong // mtshan gyi rnam pa
221a5(phal chen): rnam dmigs dang // gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes// stan chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor skyod spyad de/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas// ning
221a6(phal chen): gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yongs su kun btang zhing // spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de// rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs// snyan dang shangs
221a7(phal chen): mang rgya mtsho dang // phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// zhing rnams so so re re la// bskal pa bye
221b1(phal chen): babasam las su// byang chu bstod par baspyad de// ning gi rgya mtshor ba tu srungs// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis// spyod durtsa mamobun spyad nas// sangs rgyas rgya ma mo ru
221b2(phal chen): drung // ming gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbya sa// dzi ska 'i ma'i 'o srung bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas la shes 'od byung bas// khyod gyi spyod pa rnams
221b3(phal chen): mthong // byang chub 'tshang rgya'i ba yi// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i// zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams// dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rnabs kyis
221b4(phal chen): byang chub srung po spyong pa'i tshe// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams// de ltar bdag gis spyang par bya/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' grardzi
221b5(phal chen): brjid chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo rI rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pasnga de bzhin gshegs
221b6(phal chen): pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni sdang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho ni rab tu brjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgro
221b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu rjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston/ snying po bya
222a1(phal chen): chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu rjod/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsangs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin tu rjod de/
222a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu rjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha'
222a3(phal chen): dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam ni mngon par sgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byang chub
222a4(phal chen): tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
222a5(phal chen): yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri reb dpal gyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub
222a6(phal chen): don du khyod zhugs pa/ gzi brjid chen po legs so legs// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab byas shing // bsod
222a7(phal chen): nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul sred du// zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing // nga yi ye shes ji lta bur// khyod kyis
222b1(phal chen): mthong ba de ltar 'gyur// tshul 'di kud nas shes par ni// brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te// brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i rnams// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams drag par byed//
222b2(phal chen): thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du// bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyis rnams// de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur// sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskul
222b3(phal chen): ba rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing // 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pas// rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang // gang gi
222b4(phal chen): sems la skyo med pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun// khyod kyi smon lam dbang gis gsal// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na//
222b5(phal chen): khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/ sangs rgyas kum gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la// blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni// de dag tshul 'dar gnas par 'gyur/
222b6(phal chen): nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang // gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis// sems can ri rab rdul mnyam pa// byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag
222b7(phal chen): kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bskal pa rgya ma chen po rig pa zhes
223a1(phal chen): bya ba de la/ bskal ba bar ma chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe yang bskul ba bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de
223a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha
223a3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol/
223a4(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sgro rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba
223a5(phal chen): rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po'i byin gyis rlabs dang chos kyi glong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo// kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen
223a6(phal chen): po yang rab tu thob bo// dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyi rlabs kyi
223a7(phal chen): mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo// chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo// rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i
223b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus shes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu 'thob bo// chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par/
223b2(phal chen): shes pa yang rab tu thob bo// rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas tham ma
223b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu thob bo// de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas nod par gyur te/ de nas
223b4(phal chen): rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu//
223b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gtso yi dam pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob// de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong // sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab
223b6(phal chen): bkye ba// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag/ 'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab// kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed// 'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga'
223b7(phal chen): ba skye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal ni// phan tshun srid 'u byams pa'i sems gyur cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong // sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin
224a1(phal chen): rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston//
224a2(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas// dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel/
224a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas dbyangs na phyogs rnams bcu po nas// sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de
224a4(phal chen): ngag ltos// sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung // de nas rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zad/
224a5(phal chen): rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par 'phrul pa dag la ltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems
224a6(phal chen): can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis// dge ba'i yid dang sri zhu spro ba yis// bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
224a7(phal chen): de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing // 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing //
224b1(phal chen): chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/
224b2(phal chen): thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to// de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
224b3(phal chen): dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams cad du kun nas yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo // 'ongs pa de dag
224b4(phal chen): la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin
224b5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to// des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so// ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med
224b6(phal chen): pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thams cad du yang dag par
224b7(phal chen): 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan
225a1(phal chen): ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba la yang rjes su rtogs par
225a2(phal chen): gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyun ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so// rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho
225a3(phal chen): la yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos
225a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i snying po'o smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyad
225a5(phal chen): gyi rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas/
225a6(phal chen): sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/
225a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i// ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur/
225b1(phal chen): pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kur gyi tshul// grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // so so yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang // spyod pa smon lam khyod
225b2(phal chen): kyis mngon bsgrubs pas// gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang zhin/
225b3(phal chen): tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyang byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam
225b4(phal chen): par lta bar gyis// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs// nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi// spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa//
225b5(phal chen): de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis// zhing rnams re rer sangs rgyas mang po ngas// rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyad de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma
225b6(phal chen): med pa'i rgyan la ltos// las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par
225b7(phal chen): 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing // zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mo tsho sbyangs byas nas// bskal pa 'byam klas kun tu sbyang byas shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan
226a1(phal chen): 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya
226a2(phal chen): ngan las 'das nas/ blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par
226a3(phal chen): gyur to// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis
226a4(phal chen): mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshong rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs
226a5(phal chen): dang / rin po che bdun dang / grong gi mi dang / yul mir bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der
226a6(phal chen): dong nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brdegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyar kyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo// der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i sbyor ba/
226a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to// de thos nas byang chub
226b1(phal chen): sems dpa gzi can pam bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi rang tuthobab// ting nge 'dzin do thobapas cang dus gsus kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams rung /
226b2(phal chen): bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du zung to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas/ 'khor gying
226b3(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rnam par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can// byang chub mchog
226b4(phal chen): tu sngon lam ying ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying d+ha rgya mtsho yis// nga yi drung du khyod 'odas legs sa legs// snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems cad rnams// sdug bsngal gyur
226b5(phal chen): kun grol don zhugs pas// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa'i rnams// skyo mong
226b6(phal chen): yid kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi// mthu chen smon lam spyod
226b7(phal chen): par zhugs pas no// bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te// bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha'
227a1(phal chen): dang dablas med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang dbus med de dag ma thong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgyam mo rtogs par 'thun// khyod kyis phyogs
227a2(phal chen): bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong // de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang // stan chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong // 'di tshul
227a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'di la mu zhugs shing // ye shes sa la su ngag gnas gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing // thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// khyod mi nIng kun rgya mtsho'i
227a4(phal chen): rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas// rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams// bslabs nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i rnams// phyog
227a5(phal chen): bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te// smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang // khyod kyi smon lam thos
227a6(phal chen): gyar rab tu dga'// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byam klas par// bskal pa rgya mtsho dag
227a7(phal chen): spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis// / nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog
227b1(phal chen): rgyas pa de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grug pa'i spyar pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lnga'i gro byed/
227b2(phal chen): rin po che zhi ba'i gnas shes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to// de nas de lnga'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ rin po che'i me tog gi
227b3(phal chen): sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grag
227b4(phal chen): pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag
227b5(phal chen): par bstan to// des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to// shin
227b6(phal chen): tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdosangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// bam po bcu gsum po/
227b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs
228a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'jug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
228a2(phal chen): khams ni yongs su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig spyod pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar
228a3(phal chen): 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khoms ni gnas kyi dam pa/ mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi
228a4(phal chen): dbye bas ltar 'dug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal ni mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbye bas ltar 'dug pa/
228a5(phal chen): bza' shing ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyi gnas pa'i
228a6(phal chen): dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la
228a7(phal chen): gnas par ming mthun pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang
228b1(phal chen): rangasangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par mi mthur bya/ thams cad can thos kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug drugazug dang / gzung de bzhin dun dang / klu dang /
228b2(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhar lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i lag mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams
228b3(phal chen): cad kyang / mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
228b4(phal chen): bsnyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'ag
228b5(phal chen): rkyen gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o//
228b6(phal chen): snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
228b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o//
229a1(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
229a2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi brla dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams kyi smon
229a3(phal chen): lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi
229a4(phal chen): sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
229a5(phal chen): snyed kyi dpral ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o// byang
229a6(phal chen): chub kyi lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin tshugs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po
229a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
229b1(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
229b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi lce
229b3(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par sdang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o//
229b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
229b5(phal chen): bzhi pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang /
229b6(phal chen): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ngad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig
229b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi ro rgya
230a1(phal chen): smra / smra
230a2(phal chen): byis rje kyi mas rgya ma 'i rnam shi zla ba skyed rnas par smra/ 'jig na kyis nga nga/ rna
230a3(phal chen): kyi khams rgyam mang cu'i rnam shin tu tha bamaud kyis kun gyi khengs par bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi nyid ngag gi chu rgya ma tsho 'jig rted ci 'phyas rnam 'i ma
230a4(phal chen): kyin tshang // de bzhin du mjugs dang / rdza dang / ji dang // ma #
230b1(phal chen): snying po dang ldan pa'o// mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du ra ba dang / sna dang / lde dag lus dang /
230b2(phal chen): yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog su
230b3(phal chen): la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog ut+pa la de dag re re dang me tog pu N+Da ri ka de dag pa
230b4(phal chen): la'ang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka'i
230b5(phal chen): khar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rang rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang
230b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pad+mo'i tshil dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smyig pa'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya ma/
230b7(phal chen): zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/
231a1(phal chen): da ltar byung ba 'am/ rlung gi 'am/ phyi'i la5/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thug nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji ched
231a2(phal chen): yod ba de dag thams cad khongs na sdang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang /
231a3(phal chen): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/
231a4(phal chen): chu 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed dag na/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa
231a5(phal chen): 'amam 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang
231a6(phal chen): snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin
231a7(phal chen): du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams//
231b1(phal chen): rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shis 'tha ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan paste/ sems can gyi khams rgyam tshe rab tu snang ba'i dpe byang bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shing du zung
231b2(phal chen): srid kyi rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bu skad kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi
231b3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rted kyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ rdul shin tu phra bra re re la yang gzugs bar nA rab tu snang bar 'byung
231b4(phal chen): ba'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu/
231b5(phal chen): gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i ming
231b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas
231b7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na ram mkha'i dbyings rgya mtsho sa mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig
232a1(phal chen): chen gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
232a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu smra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed rab tu gnas so//
232a3(phal chen): de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi skyeng na me tog mtshan ma med pa
232a4(phal chen): las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thom te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
232a5(phal chen): sred kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi thag gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de
232a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o//
232a7(phal chen): de lta de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin/
232b1(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dag na/ yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
232b2(phal chen): kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/
232b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig/
232b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig
232b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed dang ldan pa'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
232b6(phal chen): kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med de/ der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs pa byed
232b7(phal chen): pa'i dmigs pa de dang nges kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o//
233a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yon tan ji snyed
233a2(phal chen): cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
233a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig
233a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod pa
233a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du/ klu dang / gnod sbyin drang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
233a6(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// sangs
233a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod/
233b1(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang jisbying/
233b2(phal chen): cig skyes pa de dag kyang / 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud la tha dad pa sred do// skye gnas tha dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzin
233b3(phal chen): rkyen gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der/ sems can gang
233b4(phal chen): ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 'jigs pa'ang med/ theg pa dman par lhung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung
233b5(phal chen): ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'tshal
233b6(phal chen): par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas/ de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong
233b7(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cing
234a1(phal chen): yod pa de med kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do// stong gsum gyi sgo chen po'i 'jig
234a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang
234a3(phal chen): po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
234a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag
234a5(phal chen): tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
234a6(phal chen): 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phung drung du
234a7(phal chen): bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed
234b1(phal chen): cig ces pa de dag thabs cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shing tu phra bsnyed la rab tu gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul
234b2(phal chen): shin tu zla bsed larab tu gnas pa/ sargya mtsho 'jig ched kyi 'ams rgya mtshod cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed la rab tu gnas pa shA stag go// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ldan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba
234b3(phal chen): de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
234b4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji srid pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi
234b5(phal chen): 'jig rter gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor me stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de sbed
234b6(phal chen): kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba den/ stong gi 'jig rted kyi
234b7(phal chen): khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor
235a1(phal chen): pa yod de/ sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shis/
235a2(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba chos kyi dbyings rgyam
235a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba derasems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad
235a4(phal chen): kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
235a5(phal chen): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
235a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sems can
235a7(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba rtsed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra/
235b1(phal chen): bsnyed la rab tu gnas pa ga sdug go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten/
235b2(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems
235b3(phal chen): dpa'i khams rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs/
235b4(phal chen): pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan
235b5(phal chen): de dag ni/ sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do// skyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya
235b6(phal chen): ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'jug pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi
235b7(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ ming po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ ming po byang /
236a1(phal chen): chub kyi rgyu mde dag re re la yang seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rter gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re re la'ang/
236a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der/ sems can gang ji snyed
236a3(phal chen): skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon
236a4(phal chen): par sgrub pa'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
236a5(phal chen): tu phra ba skyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong
236a6(phal chen): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog
236a7(phal chen): tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
236b1(phal chen): gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni
236b2(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan
236b3(phal chen): ces b+ha ba sumacu rtsa gsum myi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal/
236b4(phal chen): mtshan ces bya ba de ni rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul gimatra b+hA ba myed kyis kun nas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs
236b5(phal chen): ba'i legs kyi 'a zer ci drab rgyam tsho 'jig rnyed gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shim su za ba med kyis kun tu khyab pa 'i chos kyi dbyings rgyam che 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam mo bcu'i rdul zhi
236b6(phal chen): tu zla ba med kyis mngan par bar spyod ste/ rdzi byang chu kyi rgyal madres nas bya ba dang / sems can gang ji skad skyes par gyu pa de dag thams kyang klung tI 'dzid tso nam ni
236b7(phal chen): rlob kyi rgyan bying sa par byung ba 'jig cad gyi khams rtso mche bcu rdul shin tu tho bamed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dang pas 'byung ba rgyal tshe 'jig tan gyi khams rgyal ma'i
237a1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu gru bskyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag
237a2(phal chen): go/ ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten ces bya ba byang
237a3(phal chen): chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/
237a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling
237a5(phal chen): byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni gling
237a6(phal chen): byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yod do// gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig
237a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
237b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rdzu
237b2(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul pashin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
237b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pal dang
237b4(phal chen): pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni byang chub kyi sems
237b5(phal chen): rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pa gru rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed las brtsegs pa/ sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang gzhal med khang ga 'phreng ba rgya
237b6(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
237b7(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi su dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ skang cig skang cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
238a1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las bzlo ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi
238a2(phal chen): phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mthal
238a3(phal chen): yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rlung gi khams
238a4(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
238a5(phal chen): phra ba snyed ma gzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa
238a6(phal chen): de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan gyi yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ grong rdal mdzod mthu' yas pa de na yod do//
238a7(phal chen): grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
238b1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba de mtshugs tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de
238b2(phal chen): nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'ong rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
238b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o// sems
238b4(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo
238b5(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
238b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
238b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i ngar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o// dri ma
239a1(phal chen): med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgreng ba'o// bza
