239a2(phal chen): shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas
239a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog
239a4(phal chen): ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / puN+Da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can
239a5(phal chen): ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho
239a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten
239a7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi re ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig
239b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes byang bcug te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral
239b2(phal chen): ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi rab mya ngang bral ba de ni yon tam ched med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdom mthong brdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yom ta dgang
239b3(phal chen): ji srid yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba dra na yod do// bza' shing gri rab mya dran dang bral ba de'i mngan khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas spang
239b4(phal chen): du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang
239b5(phal chen): ldan pa yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
239b6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang
239b7(phal chen): ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshog dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der/
240a1(phal chen): sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya ma
240a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa/ ye shes sgyum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes
240a3(phal chen): sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bsod
240a4(phal chen): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sems cad de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stug go// ci'i phyir chu khang pa brtsegs pa/
240a5(phal chen): kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs
240a6(phal chen): pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya
240a7(phal chen): ngan dang bral ba na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun ras spar du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas spang du med pa de na/
240b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgyamatshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya tshe bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes/
240b2(phal chen): gong chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lngar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
240b3(phal chen): kun nas bskor cing / 'angs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shim tu phra ba snyed kyis kun ras bsgo
240b4(phal chen): te'adas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang /
240b5(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga
240b6(phal chen): ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
240b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re
241a1(phal chen): ning yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa za ba rgyam tsho 'jig rted gyi 'byas rgya ma mo bcu'i rdul shing tu
241a2(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu rnga ba snyed kyi
241a3(phal chen): 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha drad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa
241a4(phal chen): de bzhin du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang /
241a5(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor drang 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig
241a6(phal chen): tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams/
241a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
241b1(phal chen): shin tu za bamed dang spud pa ga stag ste/ lus rnam pa thadad pa rgyamatsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul byin rtsu ba med po de dag las lus re re la yang gon pa pa za dang pa rgyal tsho 'jig rte/
241b2(phal chen): gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shing tu phra bamed yod do// mgo rnam pa tha dang pa rgya mtsho 'jig rjed gyi khams rtse mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bya ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig go dbang po rnam pa
241b3(phal chen): tha dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du lung 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
241b4(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shim tu rdzi ba med yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed nas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ba
241b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ dbang po re re la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten
241b6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba drang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi lam rgya ma tsho su'i rdum
241b7(phal chen): shing wa snyed do cig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyid po de dag la
242a1(phal chen): rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do//
242a2(phal chen): ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i
242a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ba
242a4(phal chen): byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
242a5(phal chen): dang ta nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par
242a6(phal chen): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod
242a7(phal chen): pa dang / tsan dang pe byad bzang po'i yod tan rnam par bye ba ji srid cig yod pa dang rgya kyi yod tan rnam par bye ba rgyam tsho byed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yod tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho byed cig yod pa de dag dngabyang chub sems dpa' nas/
242b1(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas/ lus kyi rdul shin tu pra ba re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'grengs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgya
242b2(phal chen): rgyal tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba med kyis bskal pa rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bamed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo //
242b3(phal chen): bas po bcu bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsha rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i baspu'i bug ri nas kyang / 'od zer
242b4(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o// 'od zer rgya ru tshe de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+mo rgya mtsho la bzugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
242b5(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
242b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thod to// de dag las yang dag par skul ba'i tshigasu bcad pa rgya mtshe re re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba
242b7(phal chen): ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed
243a1(phal chen): cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi
243a2(phal chen): ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul bar byed do// shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang de bzhin te/ de nas byang
243a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis lang
243a4(phal chen): dag par bskul nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang
243a5(phal chen): mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ me dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcom
243a6(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / me dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub
243a7(phal chen): sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig
243b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pha ba snyed yong pa/ lus re rol yang /
243b2(phal chen): mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbeng yod pa/ kha'i sgo re ral
243b3(phal chen): yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / me dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho
243b4(phal chen): de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
243b5(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin du mar me dang / spos drang
243b6(phal chen): bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lce re re zhing
243b7(phal chen): yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas/ rang rang gi stobs dang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to//
244a1(phal chen): ba'ad nas kyangad bye'i de'i du brgyam mo jig rte gyi khams rgya markyo cu'i rgyal shis zla bzed mos su thu babyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa le ges/
244a2(phal chen): gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad des nus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems
244a3(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o// rnam par bkrol lo// gsal bar
244a4(phal chen): mdzad do// yang dag par bstan to// de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
244a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshothams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing
244a6(phal chen): 'tsho gzhes te/ thog mar yang dge/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po/ dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs
244a7(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
244b1(phal chen): kyi do gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par bye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mdu' bya dang / mu
244b2(phal chen): tshe'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rje med cig mnga' bya dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par
244b3(phal chen): phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bskyed pa'i yon tan rnam par bya ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag nI/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
244b4(phal chen): snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
244b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
244b6(phal chen): bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa
244b7(phal chen): stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shim tu phra ba snyed yod pa/
245a1(phal chen): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags dang / sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sang+yas/
245a2(phal chen): kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad
245a3(phal chen): grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i mthas glo ba'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po chergya
245a4(phal chen): mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs
245a5(phal chen): rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi lam gyi rol gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
245a6(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lha ma rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thams
245a7(phal chen): cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gang chen batsho thams cad kyi glong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
245b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang /
245b2(phal chen): las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshar rgya
245b3(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phru ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpa
245b4(phal chen): byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
245b5(phal chen): snyed rab tu 'joms pa sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
245b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa
245b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng yod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
246a1(phal chen): kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba/ yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
246a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sem
246a3(phal chen): bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgro dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
246a4(phal chen): kha snyed kyi dpral dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can// shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya
246a5(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
246a6(phal chen): phra ba skyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos rgya
246a7(phal chen): rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
246b1(phal chen): khams rgya mcho cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu dra bskyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams/
246b2(phal chen): cad kyi don yongs su bsgrubs pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi rnying dang ldan pa/ bsod nams drang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khabs
246b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rum legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig can gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmigs
246b4(phal chen): pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i thar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu titri nge 'dzin yangs shing
246b5(phal chen): shigs la brtan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ste zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya
246b6(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang 'phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
246b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
247a1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyad rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyis
247a2(phal chen): legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu byugs pa/ dga' ba'i rgyan dang
247a3(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha
247a4(phal chen): nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang / snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dran gyi spos rgya mtsho
247a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
247a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tsher
247a7(phal chen): bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// sems can gang dag
247b1(phal chen): dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku
247b2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rted gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
247b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad
247b4(phal chen): kyang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsod nam
247b5(phal chen): dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang dang bstan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying
247b6(phal chen): po byang chub kyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang / rnam par
247b7(phal chen): thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis bang du 'khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam
248a1(phal chen): #pa nyid rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang dang chos kyi dbyings su rten par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang ngo //
248a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la de bzhin gshegs
248a3(phal chen): ba'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so//
248a4(phal chen): de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dgra par bskul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab
248a5(phal chen): pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der/
248a6(phal chen): song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/
248a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag par bskul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad
248b1(phal chen): ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
248b2(phal chen): 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu
248b3(phal chen): gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// chos kyang ston to// yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su
248b4(phal chen): bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
248b5(phal chen): kyi don gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas
248b6(phal chen): ba deng / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o//
248b7(phal chen): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
249a1(phal chen): rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shes na 'gro la rag ste/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu
249a2(phal chen): gnas pa der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gsheg pa de'i zhal blta bu dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos ma nyan pa mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byid
249a3(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa ma rtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rkyen rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas
249a4(phal chen): pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba zhig yod na/ de khyod kyi slan chad mthong
249a5(phal chen): ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug/ 'jig rtend gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa
249a6(phal chen): dang chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyog
249a7(phal chen): gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye ba 'am/ ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho gzhes shing chos
249b1(phal chen): ston pa ni spos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sngar chad bdag gis ma thos so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi dor gang chen mtsho rnam par
249b2(phal chen): snang mdzad kyis rgyal ba rin chen mang po la 'di mad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rnyed kyi khams rgya mtsho phyogs gdun yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mthong
249b3(phal chen): 'di nas ji snang ba dang / de na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'chog zhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs par sems shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen
249b4(phal chen): mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzim rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam
249b5(phal chen): par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang
249b6(phal chen): bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po
249b7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen 'tsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
250a1(phal chen): bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas
250a2(phal chen): ring ba 'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
250a3(phal chen): mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po
250a4(phal chen): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu granas
250a5(phal chen): pa de na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
250a6(phal chen): phra ba snyed la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur ba 'am/ de las chos
250a7(phal chen): mnyan pa bde thag pa yin par shes par gyis shig de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad/
250b1(phal chen): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang ma mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas mi thag ji srid ci gar/
250b2(phal chen): mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig nga ltar der bzhugs shing 'tshe ga zhes pa dang chos stong pa bstan du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi dor
250b3(phal chen): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nub phyogs logs kyi sa mtshams kyi mtha'
250b4(phal chen): 'dri nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de
250b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so// chos kyang ston to//
250b6(phal chen): de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma shes ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsams so// jig 'jig rten gyi khams
250b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta la ci smos snyam nas/ de ltar rjes su bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs legs par
251a1(phal chen): len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kum tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bskyed la mnyam par bzhag go
251a2(phal chen): de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed no/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
251a3(phal chen): gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyi brlab pa mdzad do//
251a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang
251a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
251a6(phal chen): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/
251a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa ye shes
251b1(phal chen): rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rab tu shes so// dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamamo bcu'i drug
251b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa 'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngo sdang ba bzhin no//
251b3(phal chen): de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzim rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
251b4(phal chen): bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po lnga rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang /
251b5(phal chen): de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho
251b6(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la da bab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu
251b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig/ de nas rgyal
252a1(phal chen): po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed po de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
252a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig
252a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
252a4(phal chen): lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
252a5(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur
252a6(phal chen): brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los
252a7(phal chen): sbyar ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling gcig gi 'khor los
252b1(phal chen): sbyar ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
252b2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu zla ba dang lhan cig/ khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtshor me ni ni/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu ma bu med dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar rmas pa dang /
252b3(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras
252b4(phal chen): te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsam du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa
252b5(phal chen): ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi ba gsol lo// de skad
252b6(phal chen): ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos/ chung ma'i 'khor de dag drong / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du ma
252b7(phal chen): gnyer/ chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni tshol bar mi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba mngon du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba ni tshor bar mi
253a1(phal chen): byed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni
253a2(phal chen): don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
253a3(phal chen): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas/ sems can
253a4(phal chen): thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ma byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam yang dag pa'iye shes
253a5(phal chen): la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi cho ga rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na/ dang la rag go// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin
253a6(phal chen): chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi
253a7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa mtsho la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to//
253b1(phal chen): rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud ba'i rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to//
253b2(phal chen): sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// lce'i khams
253b3(phal chen): re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed rab tu thob bo// lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin
253b4(phal chen): pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs
253b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed rab tu thob bo// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang /
253b6(phal chen): bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas/ spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
253b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin ched mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // yongs su mchod de
254a1(phal chen): bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis// 'on kyang 'di 'dru rgya mtsho'i chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur// da ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las sgrub pa yi// sa mang rgyu
254a2(phal chen): mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur// byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi// sna yi khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste// rten 'brel 'byung ba'i
254a3(phal chen): chos rnams rtogs par gyur// lces kyang nyan thos su mang rgya mtsho thob// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur// lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na// sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par
254a4(phal chen): bgyi// yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho'i rnams// 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las
254a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa phul po che'i le'u ste bcu gcig go// / bam po bco lnga pa// / bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga
254a6(phal chen): d+hA'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
254a7(phal chen): spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrogs pa med pa/ rnam par dgod/
254b1(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba/ pho brang kun tu 'od na seng ge'i khri bad+mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi snying
254b2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa/ sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/
254b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa/ don dang yi ge la dpyod pa// 'jig
254b4(phal chen): rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la dpyod pa sha stag dang thabs cig
254b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
254b6(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas
254b7(phal chen): kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs
255a1(phal chen): su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan
255a2(phal chen): kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu'i ji ltar rnam par dgod pa de dag yongs su bstan
255a3(phal chen): kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs
255a4(phal chen): su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
255a5(phal chen): bcu rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems
255a6(phal chen): dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon
255a7(phal chen): mongs pa med par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
255b1(phal chen): the tsom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / nem dur thams cad shin tu gsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung /
255b2(phal chen): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung / gong
255b3(phal chen): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung / gong du
255b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du
255b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
255b6(phal chen): ljags bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung // gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung /
255b7(phal chen): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
256a1(phal chen): #chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyi thugs su chud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du
256a2(phal chen): mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten
256a3(phal chen): gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
256a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying /
256a5(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
256a6(phal chen): kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
256a7(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sgo phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri bad+mo'i
256b1(phal chen): sring po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'byig
256b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams pad+mo'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed bcings med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
256b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i
256b4(phal chen): snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten
256b5(phal chen): gyi khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
256b6(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der drang ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po
256b7(phal chen): can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi
257a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal byang chub
257a2(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar mi phyogs
257a3(phal chen): mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
257a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
257a5(phal chen): dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag
257a6(phal chen): 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu
257a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
257b1(phal chen): byang chu ba sems dpa' babyod 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi gling bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsed dang ldan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
257b2(phal chen): phyog ral hUM/ lhob kyi phyogs pa ngams su ba rgyanas skye ge'i khyo ba'i snang ba can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil ma krung bcasadas 'thod // rab byung gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig can gyilas
257b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shodan tu phra ba med 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub se spang par
257b4(phal chen): chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba byang chub se spang ba sang+ga rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub
257b5(phal chen): byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo bkrung bcas nas 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
257b6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
257b7(phal chen): ye shes dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og
258a1(phal chen): gi phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi/
258a2(phal chen): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i
258a3(phal chen): dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi phyogs
258a4(phal chen): su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
258a5(phal chen): brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag ni ngo mtshar thob pa dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
258a6(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
258a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bosam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
258b1(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyis rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das ras kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba'ini sas
258b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258b3(phal chen): byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu/ sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa
258b4(phal chen): thugs su chud cing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
258b5(phal chen): 'di nyid dang / de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag na'ang / sku gzhan dang gzhan/ mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan chu zheng gzhan dang gzhan sku
258b6(phal chen): tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan/ skye mched brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan/ sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du ngo
258b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na'ang /
259a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// seng ge'i ngamocan zhes bya ba ba dang
259a2(phal chen): tu shes so// shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so// go'u ta mo'i rigs
259a3(phal chen): shes bya bar rab tu shes so// dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mu stegs byed ces bya bar rab tu shes tekye rgyal ba'i
259a4(phal chen): sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal
259a5(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
259a6(phal chen): dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thub par dka' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyon
259a7(phal chen): mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tusatu shes so// skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba rab tu
259b1(phal chen): shes so// tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan sdong
259b2(phal chen): phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'ad ba chags su lho phyogs logs ma rdzing bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ der
259b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nor grags zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dri ma med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yang dag par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu
259b4(phal chen): shes so// 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgyes pa mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// don mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu
259b5(phal chen): shes so// mtha' yas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba na/
259b6(phal chen): mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa gnyer dang
259b7(phal chen): ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de de bzhi gshegs pa la chu'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bltam dga' ba zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// rgyal po dam pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// seng /
260a1(phal chen): ge 'dul ba zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// bden pa'i blo gros shes bya bar rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das par gshegs pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// dgyes pa
260a2(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'phrin las grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/

260a5(phal chen): bsgrubs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhing la dpa' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yid bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
260a6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lha ldi bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// brtul bzugs brnyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te
260a7(phal chen): kyekyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling
260b1(phal chen): bani pa 'di dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nA/ gling bzhi pa rnam par bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de mde bzhin gshegs pa la bdud rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu
260b2(phal chen): shes so// yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ni ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bzang po'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu
260b3(phal chen): shes so// blo gros mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros kyi dbyangs rashes bya
260b4(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// ring du bzhung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa rnam par bsags pa zhes bya ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de
260b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i skus dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa dga' ba zhes bya ba yod
260b6(phal chen): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jigs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// me'i phung po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs su chud ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// khyab pa dang ldan pa
260b7(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mi ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rang bzhin 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rig par spyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mig gi rgyal po zheg
261a1(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// stobs kyi brtson 'grus shes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la
261a2(phal chen): sogs pa gling bzhi pa dga' ba na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su lho nub
261a3(phal chen): kyi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mi g.yo ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs
261a4(phal chen): su rgyas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mi bskyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mdzes pa'i spyan can+da zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal po'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dbyangs kyi/
261a5(phal chen): dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang srong 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ri rab dpal zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i
261a6(phal chen): sras dag/ gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su
261a7(phal chen): ruchub byang gi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa sa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu
261b1(phal chen): shes so// na po che gan ces pab rab tu shes so// dran padu ba zhesu par rab tu shes so// don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// shim tu banang pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rigs gtsang ma zhes bya bar rab
261b2(phal chen): tu shes so// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya bar rab tu shes so// phyag shin tu 'phyang ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thog mar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
261b3(phal chen): dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa sa bzang po na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab
261b4(phal chen): chags su 'og lcogs na gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// seng ge'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu
261b5(phal chen): shes so// rno ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gser gyi 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gsung mthar thug pa zhes bya
261b6(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lha ma nor ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sbyin pa sgoms pa zhes bya ba
261b7(phal chen): rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// /
262a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng logs na gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la blo gros dang ldan/
262a2(phal chen): pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhal dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bshes gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thog mar gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
262a3(phal chen): byin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgongs pa grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// me zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshul
262a4(phal chen): khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gcig la brten pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin nu/ mtshan stong phrag
262a5(phal chen): bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'din gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
262a6(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ de dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis rjod de/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu
262a7(phal chen): shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
262b1(phal chen): de mede bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'phags pa lhag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bsam pa grol ba zhes bya/
262b2(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// nyan pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// khyab par bzhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang du gyur pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sA lnga'i lhun ces
262b3(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// rtsal chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo 'dra ba med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khe ba
262b4(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags
262b5(phal chen): su lho phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin thugs su chud ces bya bar rab tu shes so// bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar
262b6(phal chen): rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes
262b7(phal chen): so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/
263a1(phal chen): pa la dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lam rnam par bsgoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// brtan pa'i gzhi zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
263a2(phal chen): khyab cing grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// don mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bye brag la dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gzigs pa dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
263a3(phal chen): 'dul ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kun tu snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgyes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag
263a4(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi
263a5(phal chen): khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la tsam pa ka'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu
263a6(phal chen): shes so// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mthu shin tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// byin gyis brlabs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
263a7(phal chen): rang bzhin dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zla ba shar ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
263b1(phal chen): rlung gi shugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// skra shin tu gsal ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/
263b2(phal chen): mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi
263b3(phal chen): phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa la sdug bsngal dang bral bar rab tu shes so// thams cad las grol ba zhes bya
263b4(phal chen): par rab tu shes so// rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// grol zhing mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'das pa'i gter zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rin po che'i 'od ces
263b5(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gnas med pa'i sa thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
263b6(phal chen): thugs mi bskul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa
263b7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su shor lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa zhes bya ba
264a1(phal chen): yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// byang ba thugs kyi chung ba zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// gsung stan pa zhes bya ba
264a2(phal chen): rab tu shes so// rtsa ba khyad du 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyun gyi gdugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyu shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par phye ba'i
264a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ngas pa'i bsam gtan mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ran par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo rgya mtsho zhes bya bar rab tu shes
264a4(phal chen): tekye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i
264a5(phal chen): sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu song ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la thub pa'i
264a6(phal chen): dbang po zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// mngon par sel ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dus las shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ngo bo yongs su mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes
264a7(phal chen): so// bka' nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// skal ba mnyam pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang phyug gi dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang
264b1(phal chen): slong ston pa zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// 'phrin las brtsams pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rdo rje'i seng ge zhes bya ba sa rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sgras dag/ de dgu la sogs pa 'jig
264b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams kun tu song bar mtshar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
264b3(phal chen): mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su rub byung gi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rted gyi khams yongs su dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya bar rab tu
264b4(phal chen): shes so// tsan dan gyi gdugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi ldum bu zhes bya
264b5(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gdugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// spyan shin tu yangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshul
264b6(phal chen): bzang po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos rtse gcig ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dra ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa mtshar bye ba
264b7(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi
265a1(phal chen): khams mi che ba zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'od 'phro 'gyed pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang po'i
265a2(phal chen): mtshon cha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mi rtag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rtsa ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'phro ba med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rlung dang mnyam pa
265a3(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gtong ba la mos pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lam shin tu brtags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'jom pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes te kye rgyal
265a4(phal chen): pa'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
265a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes so//
265a6(phal chen): rin po che tshad med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mchod sbyin la brtson pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// lha'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'khor
265a7(phal chen): las 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'khor lo mi ldog pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bya ba dang bzhud pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu
265b1(phal chen): shes so// thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pan// mtshan bye ba brgya
265b2(phal chen): stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa
265b3(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs
265b4(phal chen): ba med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthus gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
265b5(phal chen): thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// gzung de ltar lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du
265b6(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du
265b7(phal chen): 'og gi phyogs dang de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa
266a1(phal chen): kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig
266a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ yongs su smin par
266a3(phal chen): mdzad pa de dag gis ni spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga ro rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa
266a4(phal chen): dang te skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis
266a5(phal chen): sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes
266a6(phal chen): bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis
266a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang
266b1(phal chen): byung ba zhes pa'o// gnod pa zhes bya'o// skal ba mi mnyam pa zhes pa'o// dmigs pa zhes pa'o// kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o// gnas kyi rtsu ba
