295a7(phal chen): pa yang shin tu ston// bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugs su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyong/ rgyan tshad med pa
295b1(phal chen): yang byin gyis rlob/ spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
295b2(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris// de ni mkhas
295b3(phal chen): bsra rnam par shes// yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed// ji ltar sa ni gcig bu yang // sems can mang po rab tu rgyu// de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de
295b4(phal chen): bzhin no// ji ltar me ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud// de la me lce tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu yang //
295b5(phal chen): chu klung tshad med 'bab gyur kyang // de la chu yi bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang // de la
295b6(phal chen): gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing // sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed// de yi chur la bye brag med// sangs
295b7(phal chen): rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang // myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston// sa la bye brag 'byed pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar
296a1(phal chen): sgrib med nyi ma ni// phyogs bcu kun na snang bar byed// de la 'od zer tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni//
296a2(phal chen): 'jig rten kun la rab tu snang // gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag/ steng gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi//
296a3(phal chen): de la lus ni bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces
296a4(phal chen): smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba bskyed par gcig kyang / de bzhini gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams gzugs sna tshog dang //
296a5(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang /
296a6(phal chen): yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs su 'ang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la'ang mi mnyam pa 'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig
296a7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang // sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston/
296b1(phal chen): byung byu sa smra ba dang // sangs nas 'omadul de sbyi no// ji ltar ma ru gcug kyang / rjod kyi dang gi rnam parapa phur// de bzhims sa rgyas son rdul pa rlu kyi
296b2(phal chen): lo rnam par 'gyur// ji ltar rgyam khanam khas pani// rtag tu 'khor la'amagu bur byed// de bzhimasangs rgyas yom phul ba// shin du sbyangs pa dgu' bar byed// ji ltar ma las po'i rgyal /
296b3(phal chen): dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon bral ba// ji ltar bskyeng bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med me long la// ci 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang /
296b4(phal chen): de bzhin sems can bsum tshul dro// sangs nus yon phul rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar drug pan sman gyis rnams// dug nang thams cad sos par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas khon bul
296b5(phal chen): bya nyon mongs drug ni chen de se la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mur pa dag kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas lon bral de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba rje
296b6(phal chen): med pa// kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu snang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis// sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba// sangs
296b7(phal chen): rgyas yon phul de bzhin du// srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang skyon// 'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i me// thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// 'du
297a1(phal chen): byed thams cad sreg par byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces
297a2(phal chen): smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad lta ba mthun pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur// de dag kun la yang
297a3(phal chen): gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tsher ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par shes pa yang
297a4(phal chen): rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs
297a5(phal chen): med pa'i khams nyid du zud/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zud// sred pa yang sred pa nyid du zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa 'am/ gnod par byed pa
297a6(phal chen): ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar khyod
297a7(phal chen): kyis gang dris pa// la la myur du rnam 'grol zhing // la la dka' bar 'gro la 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon// 'di ni dpag tu med pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin//
297b1(phal chen): dang nga pon rdzas na ta tsa// nag tu tu byang 'gyur ba yan// ji ltar dang shing gsher ba// meng sugs shin tu rnam chung shing / ya ma thugs kyi bar gyur// da /
297b2(phal chen): ma stan du la// ji lda gazlanganas gtsub pa'o// / ma byung ba ni myur btag na// nur du 'chi bar 'gyur du bzhin// de ltar li lo bstan pa la// nyi ma'i b+h+yor bu hU~M la// yang
297b3(phal chen): dang bzag dag pa ni// de lami 'byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pA la/ ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni mog brnams shing // mi mtho ni phy-ir zhes smras
297b4(phal chen): ga/ de banyin la lo bstan pa la// rkang lag myod par skyes pa'i mi// ji ltar smrig mnga' kha drug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin// re wAr le lo bskur ba lA/ ji lta sa
297b5(phal chen): bas rgya mtsho las// yang dang yang du bcu byas shing // skam par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang bzhin// bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe//
297b6(phal chen): la la gsang bar 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i// gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba// de bzhin/
297b7(phal chen): le lo bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi tshul nyon
298a1(phal chen): mongs pa thams cad sems pa 'di nyid blangs kyang / sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro la la gti mug gi dbang /
298a2(phal chen): du 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/ khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sku'i dbang du 'gro zhing / g.yol
298a3(phal chen): dbang du 'gro lo/ chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du yang mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun kyang rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud du zud na/ de ji lta bu/
298a4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshogs su bcud de smras pa gang gi don du dris pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sras blong las
298a5(phal chen): nyon// yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di// thos pa tsom gyis mi 'grub bo// la la stobs med chu klung gis// nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin//
298a6(phal chen): ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'gro ba mang po lnga// zas dang skom drag sbyin byas kyang // bdag nyid bkres pas shi bra ltar// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o//
298a7(phal chen): ji ltar sman pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du// lto la nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu// rin chen
298b1(phal chen): mang po bgrang byed kyang // nam phyed tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang // zas dang sgrom dag
298b2(phal chen): mi bdog pa// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi// sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig/ gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no//
298b3(phal chen): ji ltar dmus long ri mo mkhan// tsheng dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig/ skye bo ma
298b4(phal chen): sgrol byed kyang // bdag nyid de na'ang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang // phun sum tshogs pa kun rjod cing // bdag gis thob par
298b5(phal chen): mi 'gyur ba/ chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so//
298b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskrun pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad la la la ni
298b7(phal chen): tshul khrims/ la la la ni bzod pa/ la la la ni brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan/ la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzadal la la ni byams pa/ la la la ni snying rje/
299a1(phal chen): la la la ni dga' ba/ la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so//
299a2(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyis bsam shes pa/
299a3(phal chen): mtshar rmad du byung ba ste// de ltar gang gi don dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon// smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung // chos gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang 'byung
299a4(phal chen): ba yod pa min// 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med// skal pa gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing // gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa
299a5(phal chen): mdzad// ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod// tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams// mi bzod la ni bzod dang des// brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o// rnam par 'khrugs la bsam
299a6(phal chen): gtan brjod// shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o// gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad// 'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste// zhum pa la ni dga' ba bshad// 'khor ba'i sems la
299a7(phal chen): btang snyoms te// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang // rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin// ji ltar sa la las bya ba// khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin// de bzhin sbyin pa tshul
299b1(phal chen): khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro// rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rub pa'i phyir ni rang ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
299b2(phal chen): rung phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no// 'khor los sgyur/
299b3(phal chen): ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byasade nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
299b4(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'byung ba gcig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na
299b5(phal chen): sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
299b6(phal chen): khyod kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa drung / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos kyi byin
299b7(phal chen): gyis brlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
300a1(phal chen): mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chos
300a2(phal chen): kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni// 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa li// 'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste//
300a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste// mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngan chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/
300a4(phal chen): 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang // de drug zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa'i
300a5(phal chen): rnams// de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no//
300a6(phal chen): gang rnams smon lam phul ldan zhing // sngan chad bsam pa longs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyis rnams// ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong // sems can bsam
300a7(phal chen): pa ji bzhin dang // las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de lha de ltar mthong 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'// de dag byams sdang
300b1(phal chen): yong ba sbyin// bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// thog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong // rnam pa za dang 'jig rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur ba de// drang bro cheran po gzig pa'i//
300b2(phal chen): ces pa'i spyan las gyur pa med// gang na 'dul ba yong bu yi// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang // de ni sangs rgyas chos nyidang
300b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa
300b4(phal chen): bstan pa'i rnams smras pa len na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul la rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni grang sangs rgyas
300b5(phal chen): kyi yul gyi tshogasan gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba re grang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang / sangs
300b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni ga sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rdzogs pa ni gang sangs
300b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji tsam du yangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la
301a1(phal chen): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste// kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med// sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste// chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med//
301a2(phal chen): tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa bye bar mi nus te// ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// blo gros sems kyang de bzhin du// sems
301a3(phal chen): can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang // 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la
301a4(phal chen): ye shes gnas// gzugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de// dus gsum kun la chags pa med// nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de ni ye shes
301a5(phal chen): yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dang // sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// sgrar gdags/
301a6(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa dang // sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang // rnam par rtog pa gang yang med// rnam shes rnam par shes pa med// sems kyis brjod/
301a7(phal chen): pa'ang ma yin to// ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag/ sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad// nyon mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med/
301b1(phal chen): cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod// sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams// dus gsum kun gyur ba langs pa// sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas
301b2(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gyi chung ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang //
301b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snad ba dang / lus kyi rgyud ji skyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ji skad pa dang / skye ba'i rlung rje snad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims
301b4(phal chen): log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rab tu
301b5(phal chen): snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du shwar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med
301b6(phal chen): bi kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du myed pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa
301b7(phal chen): thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyu ba ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar
302a1(phal chen): gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin
302a2(phal chen): du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng
302a3(phal chen): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa / mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/
302a4(phal chen): mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthus gtugs pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed
302a5(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
302a6(phal chen): mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// / bam po bco brgyad pa//
302a7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha/
302b1(phal chen): nam thong med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na mtho bsnang ba'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha mam tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma
302b2(phal chen): nyarnams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin+da/ yid kyi las rnam par mnyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma spang ba yin/ ngag gi las na smang ba yin pa yid kyi las ma snang
302b3(phal chen): pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'phrog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi rdzogs pa ying/
302b4(phal chen): yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ lus kyi lus mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin
302b5(phal chen): ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags pa yid/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin
302b6(phal chen): lus kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin//
302b7(phal chen): ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yir/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin
303a1(phal chen): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phum sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum
303a2(phal chen): tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur ba yin/
303a3(phal chen): blo gros tshad med pa yin/ blo glos grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du/
303a4(phal chen): med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs can
303a5(phal chen): yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtag pa'i stobs can yin/ phung po la
303a6(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la
303a7(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yi/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub
303b1(phal chen): kyi ya lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yid/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// dga' ba yang
303b2(phal chen): dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byung ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan 'gal mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang mas
303b3(phal chen): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtsham ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin
303b4(phal chen): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
303b5(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/
303b6(phal chen): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang
303b7(phal chen): brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud ba yin/ khams sna tshogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs
304a1(phal chen): dang mos pa dum shes par bya ba khong du chud ba yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
304a2(phal chen): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud ba yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud
304a3(phal chen): payin/ lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su
304a4(phal chen): bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang
304a5(phal chen): bos yongs su bzung ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i drabang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su
304a6(phal chen): bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin// lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/
304a7(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang
304b1(phal chen): bos bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bku ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur
304b2(phal chen): pa yin/ skyabs su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/
304b3(phal chen): rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu
304b4(phal chen): gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin// de skad
304b5(phal chen): ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'od med ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de ltar skye/
304b6(phal chen): bo mang po la phan dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying byertse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzung spyod
304b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub se mas
305a1(phal chen): dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed du'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par
305a2(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams
305a3(phal chen): kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag lnga
305a4(phal chen): nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzanga' zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i
305a5(phal chen): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye
305a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sgras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byeng ba'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di reg thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems
305a7(phal chen): kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lo byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas
305b1(phal chen): khyim kyis thabs pos zil gyis mdzod par byar TIg ces sems bskyed do// pham dang 'phrogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyag/
305b2(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu
305b3(phal chen): bral bas dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
305b4(phal chen): cad yod tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed // glu dang / gang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyam dang 'grogs pa'i tshe
305b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshen lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chung ma'i
305b6(phal chen): 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing / 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan gyis
305b7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin par khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khang tog tu phyin pa'i tshe
306a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing / chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyin pa
306a2(phal chen): gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing / bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces sems
306a3(phal chen): bskyed do// ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyin te/ 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig ces sems
306a4(phal chen): bskyed do// btson ral kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
306a5(phal chen): khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing / chags pa med de mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems
306a6(phal chen): bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa chos dang ldan zhing / mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig
306a7(phal chen): cis sems bskyed do// mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
306b1(phal chen): rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dngapa su sems can thams cad bar chad med cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos dkur po 'dor/
306b2(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i tshe/ byang
306b3(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos ngur smrig gon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
306b4(phal chen): can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad
306b5(phal chen): yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
306b6(phal chen): dge ba la mos pa mngon par bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gradung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
306b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chags pa'i
307a1(phal chen): gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
307a2(phal chen): thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams cad la shin tu bslab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
307a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
307a4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces bskyed do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
307a5(phal chen): dbas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsug lag khung du 'gro ba'i tshe
307a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// stan 'ding ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
307a7(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyod ngo do// 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas
307b1(phal chen): ba'i sems kyis snying po la byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba
307b2(phal chen): shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zhi gnas yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul
307b3(phal chen): ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhag mthong yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems rabs sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du
307b4(phal chen): gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dbus sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam
307b5(phal chen): par gzhag cing / 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
307b6(phal chen): thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil 'degs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha
307b7(phal chen): na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thom par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// smang g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thas
308a1(phal chen): cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sku rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
308a2(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bla gos gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sem/
308a3(phal chen): can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
308a4(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ thubs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
308a5(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po 'thob pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
308a6(phal chen): thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom ste/ sems dul zhing sems dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags
308a7(phal chen): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngogs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten la
308b1(phal chen): 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsang sgra'i las byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsam
308b2(phal chen): dring nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir/ bkra
308b3(phal chen): shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par
308b4(phal chen): dgra pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'khor ba len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos sbyin byas shing / lam ston par gyur cig sems bskyed do// lhung
308b5(phal chen): bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i tshe// byang
308b6(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe
308b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
309a1(phal chen): thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
309a2(phal chen): lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam dma' ba
309a3(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu brtan cing / sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam nyam du ba
309a4(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba lo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te/ nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/
309a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
309a6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste/ 'dod chags par myang ba'i chos las rnam par 'grol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam
309a7(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yangs mthong ba'i
309b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems cad thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
309b2(phal chen): 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zang mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i cho
309b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang 'khrugs pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe
309b4(phal chen): byang chub sems rapas sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ri mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
309b5(phal chen): cod thob par dka' ba dang thibs po me dang rab tu thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tshor ma can mthong ba'i tshebyang chub
309b6(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med cing / tsher ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
309b7(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu log par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/
310a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas/ me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog gi shing
310a2(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing thog mthong ba'i tshe
310a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub tu gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces
310a4(phal chen): sems bskyed do// chu klung mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gzhag par gyur cig ces sems
310a5(phal chen): bskyed do// lu ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces
310a6(phal chen): sems bskyed do// rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shim tu bstan pa la mkhas shing chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las
310a7(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems/
310b1(phal chen): bskyeng ngo // tshu thong ba'i tshi byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab tu brtsom zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyu cig ces sen su bskyed do//
310b2(phal chen): zab pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskal ba la zam par reng bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lung ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
310b3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab mthong ba'i cha
310b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang / spu dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la sred pa rab tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong
310b5(phal chen): ba'i chobyang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
310b6(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi btang ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
310b7(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
311a1(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin par thob pas rgyan med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
311a2(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang spobs dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
311a3(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems cad bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
311a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas/
311a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
311a6(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ tha dad pa med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug gu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub
311a7(phal chen): sengs dpas sems can thas sadas margyas dang / byang chu mas dpa mams cad lamos pa yo sa kyad ci gces sems bskyed // mi thug pa'i sem ma nga 'i na bya chu
311b1(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la bos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
311b2(phal chen): sems cam thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin gzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
311b3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma
311b4(phal chen): lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshangs
311b5(phal chen): ba'i dam par gyur te/ sdig pa spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la
311b6(phal chen): brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub longs
311b7(phal chen): su mi gtong ba'i phyir/ brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rang byung gi chos yongs su
312a1(phal chen): btsal ba lagro cha bzang po shin tu bgros par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gom gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams
312a2(phal chen): cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad pas kyi rgol ba
312a3(phal chen): thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'tshe ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spyod lam bcos pa med cing 'tshe ba dag pa
312a4(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems
312a5(phal chen): bskyed do// rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa/ chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim bdag
312a6(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi chos spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang
312a7(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
312b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo che'i lus dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong bu'i tshe / byang chub sems dpas
312b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar mthun pa la myos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal gyi 'dab mthong ba'i tshe ga byang chub sems dpas sems
312b3(phal chen): can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med
312b4(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sgor phyin po'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor byir
312b5(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nang du phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig ces sems
312b6(phal chen): bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing phyir spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sbyin
312b7(phal chen): no zhes byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs par gyur cig ces sems
313a1(phal chen): bskyed do// lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stongs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do//
313a2(phal chen): lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gror byas pa'i tshe
313a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gror byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
313a4(phal chen): can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
313a5(phal chen): dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas
313a6(phal chen): shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas bsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing
313a7(phal chen): smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas mi gsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba
313b1(phal chen): thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas snum ngag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldar/
313b2(phal chen): zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// snum bgra med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te sku ma phrag
313b3(phal chen): med pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dgu' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shi
313b4(phal chen): bsam gtan gyi zas zla bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ro myang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ngo za
313b5(phal chen): ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces
313b6(phal chen): sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing / spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur
313b7(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// phyir 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur
314a1(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyu 'bog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
314a2(phal chen): 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrus byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig
314a3(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par byin te/ yongs su gdung ba sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsil ba/
314a4(phal chen): la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems tsam thams cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te/ bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos thob par
314a5(phal chen): byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing / chos kyi dbyings dang 'dres par gyur cig ces sems bskyed // sangs rgyas
314a6(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cangs sa rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tuthob ste/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig nas sems bskyed do//
314a7(phal chen): mig mi 'gebs par lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mchod rten mthong ba'i tshig byang chub sems//
314b1(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i
314b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyi bos 'thug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug lngar mi snang bar
314b3(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed pa'i cha/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bsgreng ngo //
314b4(phal chen): lan gsum bskor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed // sangs rgyas kyi yon tam rjod pa'i tshe/
314b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtshan rnams rjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
314b6(phal chen): cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i
314b7(phal chen): mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lus skyong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed/
315a1(phal chen): shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gnyid sang pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob
315a2(phal chen): par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi sem+ba kyi las
315a3(phal chen): yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par
315a4(phal chen): bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa thams
315a5(phal chen): cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las spyod yul
315a6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / bam po bcu dgu pa// yon tan langs pa'i spyod yul yong drug pa// de skad smras nas sems
315a7(phal chen): can dri med pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris// spyod yul yongs dag rgyal bas spyad pa'i rnams// bdag gis rgyal sras
315b1(phal chen): rnams la 'dir bgang ngo // yon tan spyong ba ji myed gang pod pa// rgyal mas rnams la dani khyod kyis god// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras 'on// yon tamam /
315b2(phal chen): las de dag yon tan las/ mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin rung shas shig/ mgo smos tsam du cung zung brjod par bya// byang chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes// thogs dbyang
315b3(phal chen): chub sems skyes gyur pa yi// yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med// dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad mo gyur// pha rol phyin deng sa yo yon tan la/ bskal pa mang por
315b4(phal chen): spyad pa ci zhig smos// de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan lus// dpe tsam sha NAs
315b5(phal chen): cung tsam brjod par bya// mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung // sa chen lhun las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra// byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems skye ba// rgyu med ma yin
315b6(phal chen): gyi na 'byung ba yin// rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang // dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye// de yang 'dod pa skyid pa rgyal srid dang / bdag bla di'i don dang
315b7(phal chen): grags dang sman phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir// 'jig rten pam bskyed sems ni yongs su skye// de ni sems can rtag tu bad don dang / zhing srungs
316a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur// yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // ye shes rnam par skyong ba'i sems skye'o// rtul ba kun dang chos dang dge
316a2(phal chen): 'dun dang // de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la// dad dang mos po dga' ba bskyed byas te// srid zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang skye// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid
316a3(phal chen): ches nas// rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te// byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste/
316a4(phal chen): yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing 'dron// nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/
316a5(phal chen): nga rgyal rnam spangs sri nu'i rtsa ba yin// drad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bur dge sdang rtsa ba yin// yongs su gtang la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i
316a6(phal chen): chos la dad pa spro ba skyed// yon tan ye shes khyod par dad pa byed// sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang // gzhan gyis mi thub
316a7(phal chen): dngos la dad pa stobs// nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te// dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te// mi khom spong zhing 'dra
316b1(phal chen): 'ji med par byed// dang pa bdud kyi lam las tho ba rtse// thar lam ngas pa yongs su sbyor pa yin// yom tan rgya yis ngom sa rgyal bzhin// dang pa byang chub shing rab rnam ga skye /
316b2(phal chen): le shes kyang bar sgo rnam 'phel bar byed// dang brtul pa rnams kyi ston pa yin// de bas dang mos chung par dga'i nga la// skyed pa'i gyis rnam par rjod par byed// chos nu
316b3(phal chen): 'di 'dra 'jig rtem rnamasan dkon// rin chen seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no// dang pas sangs rgyas sre'u gang byed pa// de dge tshul khrims slob pa mi gtong ngo // tshul khrims
316b4(phal chen): slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba// de dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan// tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste// bslab pas sa yi yon tan logs la brtson// tshul
316b5(phal chen): khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os// ngad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa langs pa byed/
316b6(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la phung dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan/
316b7(phal chen): ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos// dad pas dge 'dun phung dung su byed pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos// mi ldog
317a1(phal chen): dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa// de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog/ dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno//
317a2(phal chen): gang rnams dbang po rab tu gas la rno ba// des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs// gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin// chos
317a3(phal chen): kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su sogs// dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang sogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan// bdag nyid
317a4(phal chen): che ba rgyu mthu gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thob// mos pa yengs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs/ rgyal ba'i byin gyis
317a5(phal chen): gang rnams brlabs gyur pa// de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye// byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa// de dag sangs/
317a6(phal chen): rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes// sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dge 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs// 'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnams spangs pa// de dag
317a7(phal chen): bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag/ gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhag bsam dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol
317b1(phal chen): phyin la spyod// pha rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pa sangs rgyas mchod// nang tan dam pa
317b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas su mchod pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran phyed pa med// sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi byed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // rtag tu sangs rgyas
317b3(phal chen): bsam yas sus mthong ba// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs min// rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma yin// de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med// gang la chos
317b4(phal chen): nub 'gyur ba med gyur pa// de dag spobs pa bsgrib pa med dang ldan// spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang las// gang gis chos rab
317b5(phal chen): bstan pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshel// 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba bsten// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su bsten
317b6(phal chen): pa/ de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba// de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rloms sems bag med//
317b7(phal chen): spangs// nga rgyal rlom sems bag med sus spangs pa// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa// de dag 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med//
318a1(phal chen): gang la 'khor ba yongs su skyo med pa/ de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon/
318a2(phal chen): par skyes// gang gi mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa// de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs// spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyung ba// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas/
318a3(phal chen): 'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro sdud ye sheso tshul la mkhas// 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos
318a4(phal chen): bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed// 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su byed pa// de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thab
318a5(phal chen): kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa// dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis
318a6(phal chen): thun min pa// de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das// bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin// mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa//
318a7(phal chen): de dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin// mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thong gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba
318b1(phal chen): kun dang mngon du gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas// rgyal ba'i 'phrul ba gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis
318b2(phal chen): dgongs pa yin// gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan longs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan longs kyis su brgyan pa// de dag bsod
318b3(phal chen): nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams dam pas gang gis lus sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar bya// de dag mtshan rab
318b4(phal chen): sum cu gnyis dang ldan// mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan pa// de dag dpe byad bzang ngos lus kyang bris// dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus dris pa// de dag lus 'od kun tu
318b5(phal chen): mtha' las so// gang gis lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od zer bsam las rgyan yod pa// de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung /
318b6(phal chen): gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang // don yod rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul// gang rnam rgyal ba
318b7(phal chen): pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing de dag phyogs bcu kun tu yang // don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gi mngon
319a1(phal chen): shes rnam 'phrul mtha' sbas pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab gar byed pas// bsam gyis mi khyab ni ngan rnam par
319a2(phal chen): spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing ston cing // bas mA yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa// de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na// tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems cad
319a3(phal chen): 'dul// tha dad yang drag shes pa'i ye shes mthus// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba// de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung /
319a4(phal chen): gang gi lus dang ngagra yid rtag dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab tu 'byung // de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston/
319a5(phal chen): smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyung du gzugs mang sngon byed la// de dag tshig tu brjod cing smra ba yang // sga la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyag
319a6(phal chen): tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa// de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams lud kyis rnam par shes// gang gis
319a7(phal chen): ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa// de dag skye dang shi 'phonam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med// skye dang shi
319b1(phal chen): 'pho gang la med gyur cing // nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin mye med pa// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis spros par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid
319b2(phal chen): ye shes lus ldan zhing // chos kyi smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang
319b3(phal chen): rnams bcu po yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par 'phrul// ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob// mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis
319b4(phal chen): rnam 'phrul zhing // ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bsgyur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod// gang rnams
319b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nor byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang
319b6(phal chen): bskur// gang gi spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur bas// de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing // phyogs rnams kun
319b7(phal chen): tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed// gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa// dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni// 'jig
320a1(phal chen): ngams / mengs gi stsa shes / lag sa nas du pa das pa
320a2(phal chen): // ma sa sa na da/ gla sa seM rgyas ma zhun smra rgyur smra sa na
320a3(phal chen): sbyin padag gtong bzhin// sbyin pa'i gnas thathams cad do kya 'od// rgyas du sa pa dag sbyin mnayin// dam rjes tshu ma 'jig rten gdas// den pa'i 'phrul
320a4(phal chen): ngos pa mchog rnams kyang // don chen 'du mthus gnan rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje sdug da'i rim che tshogs yod pas// de yi mthu mis rgya mtsho ni chen rnams// mi dzad 'phel
320a5(phal chen): 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yin tam mtsho// sangs rgyas mi bzugs zhing rnams gang yong pa// de dag kun du byang chub sangs rgyas sto/ phyogs rnams
320a6(phal chen): gang na dam chos med gyur pa// de dag sum du'ang chos kyi gter gyon to// de dag mi rtog rnam par 'i rtog ste// lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad dra/ zla ba lta bur gzugs bcu
320a7(phal chen): ston byed cing // thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu/ rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor mo rgor dbum ngan 'das/
320b1(phal chen): zhi dang // su gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston// mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa/ yongs su ston cing bskul ba bsam las/
320b2(phal chen): su// theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul// khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus// skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/
320b3(phal chen): mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su stong// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgya yi sgo rag nas// 'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang // chu byed spyod pa sgra dubyangs tshul gyi rnams// thams
320b4(phal chen): cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed// de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed// de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab// sems can 'grel
320b5(phal chen): pa'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa dang // bzod
320b6(phal chen): pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rab rnam 'phrul dang // thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin
320b7(phal chen): sgo dag nas// yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag rdul phran 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin rnams// rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul phran rtse
321a1(phal chen): gcig bsam las zhing gi rnams/ ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs rgyas bzhugs ning dang // sangs rgyas mi bzugs
321a2(phal chen): zhing yang de bzhin ston/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang // yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig cing 'du ba dang // la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyis
321a3(phal chen): gnas par ston// la la snrel ni smig rgyu lta bu ste// de bzhin gzham rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston// de dag rdul gcig rtser skyon ji bzhin du// ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te/
321a4(phal chen): drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// mtha' yas grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o// rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed kyang // lag pa'i mthil
321a5(phal chen): gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing // skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ phyogs bcu kun na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba// de dag byang chub shing drung
321a6(phal chen): bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang // gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla re/
321a7(phal chen): dag/ lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs// phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams// drang srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa// de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs//
321b1(phal chen): byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa/ rnga chen rnga dang pi wang snga skan dang // rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu slar ba rnams// de dag lag mthil je ras/
321b2(phal chen): sgra yang srog phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrubs pa sna tshogs kyang // lag mthil de nas
321b3(phal chen): sgra rab snyan par 'byung // de dag 'od zer las dges yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing // rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par// kun tu btab cing
321b4(phal chen): 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing brgyan ldan pa// lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab// pad+mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs// mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba
321b5(phal chen): mchod pa byed// 'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab dkye zhing // me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang // me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer
321b6(phal chen): spos kyi rgyun rnams rab bkye zhing // spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams
321b7(phal chen): rab bkye zhing // phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang // bye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // na bzag
322a1(phal chen): rgyan dang na bza'i bla re dang // na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing /
322a2(phal chen): rin chen rgyan dang rin chen tha re dang // rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer pad+mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // pad+mo'i rgyun dang pad+mo'i
322a3(phal chen): bla re dang // pad+mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang 'phreng ba'i bla re dang /
322a4(phal chen): 'greng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing // de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sna dang /
322a5(phal chen): sna tshogs rnam mang rgyun can gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nus rgyan pa byed// de dgu pad+ma gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog/ rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyun ldan pa// dar gyi lnga lji ba
322a6(phal chen): den mas sbyangs gog/ dril 'breng rgyal ba'i gsung rnyog dzin po byed// lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mchod pa rgyal b+ha gcig la byed pa / ma lus rgyal ba
322a7(phal chen): rnams la 'ad pa// phra mang ti 'dzin 'phrul 'dra'o// de dag 'grob yongs srud le gas kyis// rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting 'dzin mchen srubs shing / bya ba'i tshul
322b1(phal chen): dang 'on tan thams cad du // thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo// sbyangs pa
322b2(phal chen): yon tanam gur kyi tshul khrims sgo// bzod pa mi zad mi basprul sgo ga dang // lha la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtsod 'grus sgro// byasam gtan rab tu zhir gnas sgo dag dang /
322b3(phal chen): don rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo// tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang /
322b4(phal chen): bsod nams yongs su bas gas dang ye shes sgo// bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang // la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang /
322b5(phal chen): rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo// theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang // la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo// la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes
322b6(phal chen): 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo// la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu// 'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas//
322b7(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dgonas// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed po// de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te/
323a1(phal chen): ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba'i rgyar gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs sprin 'byed mthun pa// dga' de spro ba rab dga'
323a2(phal chen): kun ldan pas// bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul// gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten badre ba'i yo byad rnams// thams cad bsam pa rdzogs
323a3(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed// de dag zas mchog skom dang ro mchog dang // gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug
323a4(phal chen): longs btang bas// skyon la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing // gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te// 'phreng bas rnam
323a5(phal chen): brgyan spos kyis bslu byos pa'i// gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul// mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pA la// de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ma byad
323a6(phal chen): mdzes// // gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag ka la bring ka'i sgra snyan dang // ko ki l+le kun drang ba'i sgra dbyangs
323a7(phal chen): ngag brdza dang mengs pa mi 'am ci yis// chos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston// de dag stong phrag brgya cu mye bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i ngon mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye bros
323b1(phal chen): skyo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la
323b2(phal chen): grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyis rnams// grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed// 'gro ba
323b3(phal chen): kun la phan don bde don du// de dag grogs don mi bde nyams su len// grung na 'byung ba med cing chos med de// dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa// de dag kun tu rgyul srid
323b4(phal chen): che spangs shing // zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim gyi btson ra sred gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun
323b5(phal chen): la mi gnas par// mngon par byung zhing thar pa yongs su brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod// drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus
323b6(phal chen): bar// yongs su sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// gang na sems can tshad med che ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun tu nang gzer nang pu can// bdag la dbang
323b7(phal chen): med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig rten
324a1(phal chen): bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas badrag
324a2(phal chen): nyid che ba rjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyi 'gro don byed// de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin
324a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// dri dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi// 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim+ba gror byed/
324a4(phal chen): 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+mo bzhin// dga' bo mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod// de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyang dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing sdug pa
324a5(phal chen): ba nad gang byed pa dang // sgyu mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston pa byed// grong ba grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang // ded dpon tsheng dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang /
324a6(phal chen): sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur// snga dang rin cher mi zad gter dag dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa'i byim shing dang // lam gol 'khyams
324a7(phal chen): la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmos thabs tshang thabs dang // sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang
324b1(phal chen): rjod pa byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams// kun kyang drang srong de
324b2(phal chen): ngag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dang 'gyur dang / brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub mchog gi rnams// kun kyang /
324b3(phal chen): mkhas pa de dag ston pa byed// de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang // sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi mkhan po
324b4(phal chen): mkhas pa byed// de dag longs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang // bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams// ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul bzhugs can// de dag tu yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur/
324b5(phal chen): nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi ding ba glang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/
