324b6(phal chen): lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed yul du chu ba dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnams// chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur// gnas btegs
324b7(phal chen): gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // tsher ma rtsa dang thal ba'i mal can dang // dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can
325a1(phal chen): rnams ji snyed pa// de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsgrub dka' mi zad drug shul dka' thub kyi// mu skyegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul//
325a2(phal chen): 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis// bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed// la lar
325a3(phal chen): dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu// shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// la la dgra la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge'i/
325a4(phal chen): dbye tshig dang // don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang // bstan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshig
325a5(phal chen): rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang // la la dag la lha yi tshig rnams dang // klu yi tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig rnams dang / sbrul la ngag la srin po 'byung po dang /
325a6(phal chen): dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig/ mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i
325a7(phal chen): chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par
325b1(phal chen): spab byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul// 'od zer mthong na legs pa rab dkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes/
325b2(phal chen): ga/ de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gri d+ha// sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dge 'dun bstan ras mi rnams lam bstan te/
325b3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na// des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'od byung rab tu bkye byas shing // murU pa
325b4(phal chen): kun dang rdul rnams kun bsal te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // 'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin// rgyal ba mchod phyir/
325b5(phal chen): me mar bzung byas pas// 'jig rter sgron mar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mur dang // shing dang rtsa dang smyig ma swa yi sgron// spos dang ro mcho ga rin chen sgron ma dag
325b6(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba// de dag sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor// sems can
325b7(phal chen): bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon// gang rnams sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mchor// sems cad bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed// mya ngan med pa bde/
326a1(phal chen): pa'i grong yang ston// stegs dang zam pa gcig min byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na// nges
326a2(phal chen): ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing // chos kyi rnam grol
326a3(phal chen): ro la don du gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs te// chos kyis grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i
326a4(phal chen): skom pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lum dang // mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de// 'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na// skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub bo//
326a5(phal chen): 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// thugs/
326a6(phal chen): rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub po/
326a7(phal chen): 'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// nga ngag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dag 'dun mos pas dga'//
326b1(phal chen): de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang // rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med
326b2(phal chen): 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchod la// sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na// des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa
326b3(phal chen): grub// 'od zer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs
326b4(phal chen): su gtong // de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe// slong mo ba yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na// des ni 'od zer bsod nams bsag
326b5(phal chen): grub bo// 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes
326b6(phal chen): su shes// chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi tshig dor brjod pa byas pas na// des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/
326b7(phal chen): 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ dngos
327a1(phal chen): po med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug bdag po med chos stong pa byed myed pa// sprin dang sdig rgyu rgyu zla 'dra ba'i dngos// rmi lAm lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhid
327a2(phal chen): rnams// bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// 'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing // sems can ji stod 'od zer des bskul ba// mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab
327a3(phal chen): thob cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos 'chang rnams la yongs su phan btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing // 'gro ba kun la
327a4(phal chen): chos bzhin phan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyi rnam 'phrul de grub bo// 'od zer stong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba// skying ba mi
327a5(phal chen): brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dgu' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa 'dul dka'i sems can ma dul dang // nor rnam rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas// dga'
327a6(phal chen): ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer yongs su gdung med rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/
327a7(phal chen): tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang // tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing /
327b1(phal chen): byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas// yongs su gdung med 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pas rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing // mi bzod sems can ji snyed de bskul
327b2(phal chen): ga khro ba'i za ba rgyal longs sangs shing // de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' byar 'gyur// sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pam byas gong //
327b3(phal chen): bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub bo// 'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // le lo'i sems can ji snyed nges bskul ba/
327b4(phal chen): rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas
327b5(phal chen): mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te/ myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob// sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum
327b6(phal chen): la mchod pa rab byas nas// tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas// des ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can rdzi
327b7(phal chen): snyed des bskul ba// de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyams su mi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su 'gyur// sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang // 'du 'dzi yongs
328a1(phal chen): su rnam par spangs byas te/ bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas// des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing /
328a2(phal chen): shes rab 'chal pa ji snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes par 'gyur// bden dang brten dang rnam thar tshul rnams
328a3(phal chen): dang dbang po rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing // nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal srid nor dang bdag 'phangs
328a4(phal chen): yongs btang ste/ byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba// de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas// shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer sangs rgyas ldan par rab
328a5(phal chen): bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang ba'i rnams// pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas bdag
328a6(phal chen): nyid che dang rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te// sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer/
328a7(phal chen): mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // 'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa// 'byung po gza' dang gsad cing brdeg pa dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol// mi
328b1(phal chen): 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa dang // srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing // 'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyab byas pas// 'od zer mi 'jigs
328b2(phal chen): sbyin pa des grub bo// 'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing // nad pa na pa ji snyed des reg pa// thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par grol// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams
328b3(phal chen): kyang thob// nad gsol 'bras bu sman dang rtsu ba dang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma myur dag dang // 'bru mar zlas skyom byin pas de grub bo// 'od
328b4(phal chen): ze sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing // tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzugs shing 'gro/
328b5(phal chen): 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer
328b6(phal chen): des thob bo// 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed// chos la mos pas rtag tu
328b7(phal chen): dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos
329a1(phal chen): rab rjod pa de thob bo// sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir// 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa
329a2(phal chen): dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos// gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang srong che bstod de// rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung ngon
329a3(phal chen): du/ yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// bag med spyod pa thams cad rnams spang
329a4(phal chen): te// yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len// 'dus byas rtag tu bde bo med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing ni dga' zhes/
329a5(phal chen): brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo// 'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba// tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang /
329a6(phal chen): shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan// tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste// shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don du bsngags
329a7(phal chen): shing bstod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob// 'od zer rim chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// rin chen gter ma
329b1(phal chen): mi zad thob gyur te// drang srong che la rin chen ngam pas mchod// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rim chen duspyang de ri rten
329b2(phal chen): sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer spos mchog snang ba rababakye zhing / sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba/ mi la med pa'i spos dri
329b3(phal chen): tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi spros dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtse la mchod par rab byas te// spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs
329b4(phal chen): mchod rten dag/ byas pas 'od zer spyos mchod snang ba grub// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo
329b5(phal chen): sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis// pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs// sngan chad rgyal ba rol myos bsu byas te// me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma drung /
329b6(phal chen): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan mchog dag gis/ mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan 'grub bo// 'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing / sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas
329b7(phal chen): par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang byas pas// des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub// 'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin
330a1(phal chen): rnams kun nas gnas// mchod rten gam lo spos chus yongs btab pas// 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob// 'od zer lhab lbub rnam brgyan rab bkye
330a2(phal chen): zhing / gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang bgo ba 'phreng ba sna tshogs dag/ yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub// 'od zer dro mchog ldan pa rab
330a3(phal chen): dkye zhing // bkres pa kha zas dro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams// byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor ston rab
330a4(phal chen): tu dgye byas shing // 'phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob par 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum// gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo// 'od
330a5(phal chen): zer mig sbyong rab tu dbye byas shing // long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten lA// mar me gsol bas mig skyong 'od zer grub
330a6(phal chen): rna ba rnam skyong 'od zer rab dkye zhing // rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam skyong thob// 'od zer
330a7(phal chen): sna skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sngan chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/
330b1(phal chen): 'od zer lce sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sgyu sngan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlang bar smra brnam sbyangs te// 'jam par skabs lce skyong 'od zer grub/ 'od zer
330b2(phal chen): lus sbyong rab tu dartse byas shing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams drang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus kyis rab btud lus skyong 'od zer thob/ 'od/
330b3(phal chen): zer soms sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur// ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas// des ni sems skyong 'od zer de grub bo//
330b4(phal chen): 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // bsam yas su mnga' mi yi dbang po mthong // sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs skyong thob pas
330b5(phal chen): 'gyur// 'od zer sgra skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo//
330b6(phal chen): 'od zer dri skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur// spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od dri yin//
330b7(phal chen): 'od zer bro skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/ sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ zo mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/
331a1(phal chen): 'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam der 'gyur// tri shul mdung dang ral gri mnga' yi char// 'phreng ba yid 'ong ut+paH
331a2(phal chen): pad+mor 'gyur// gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams// rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du gting bkrum ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang // 'phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i
331a3(phal chen): 'od de yin// 'od zer chos skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i// bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// mos pa'i lam tshul
331a4(phal chen): bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te// chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas shes// brjod pas
331a5(phal chen): chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer sgro mo de dag la sogs pa// drang srong rnams kyi ba spu sgo gcig nas// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung // kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul
331a6(phal chen): can no// ji ltar ba spu gcig gi sgro gcig nas// 'od zer gang+gA'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba// de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// /
331a7(phal chen): yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyur pa'i// yon tan de la bstang grogs sus byas pa// de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag
331b1(phal chen): bsod nams bstang grogs byas pa la// rjes su yid rang gsol ba sus btab dang // gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsngags gyur pa// de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes// gang gis/
331b2(phal chen): bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te// sangs rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing // sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dmus
331b3(phal chen): long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char// mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas// kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin
331b4(phal chen): skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang // byed pa ma'i makun tu 'phro ba ste// de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin// phal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mong // rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhal
331b5(phal chen): ming khang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams// de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi// nyon mongs 'phongs pa rnams la yod pa min// gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te//
331b6(phal chen): dadal yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na// bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du// mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed// de dag 'khor gyi brgyan du rnam 'phrul bar// ting 'dzin//
331b7(phal chen): dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing // phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed// de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam// 'od kyis rnam
332a1(phal chen): brgyan byin gyis brlab byas shing // lus gcig skyil mo krung gi pad+mo de// yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+mo
332a2(phal chen): gzhan// 'khor dang bcas la byin gyis brlab byas shing // rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par skyod// drang srong des ni yongs su
332a3(phal chen): sprid byas te// rgyal ba'i legs la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa// de dag pad+mo chen po'i 'khor byed cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste/
332a4(phal chen): gang rnams ting 'dzin rnam spyod zhugs gyur pa// kun yang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing //
332a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag ting 'dzin rnams rab sngon sgrub cing //
332a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi dra bar spel zhing spyod pa byed// la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam lang par// rang rang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing /
332a7(phal chen): dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang // nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing // shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang // de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed cing //
332b1(phal chen): phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing // ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan las ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// shar phyogs zhing bgrangs ji snyed yod//
332b2(phal chen): pa'i rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyis rang byung gi/ spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang // der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas
332b3(phal chen): nas// nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang // nub kyi zhing bgrangs ji snyed yod pa'i
332b4(phal chen): rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi// spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin lo// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang // der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas//
332b5(phal chen): shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// longs shing rgyal ba kun gyi sbyar snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang // phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste// phyog
332b6(phal chen): rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo'i rnams// la la mnyam gzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang // de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing /
332b7(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang // 'jig rten lhar bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi// bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kyang kun tu ston// gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag/
333a1(phal chen): byas shing // dran dang ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang // mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa ste// de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam
333a2(phal chen): bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sgra yi lam las ldang // sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag
333a3(phal chen): byas shing // dran dang ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong par byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid
333a4(phal chen): che ba dri yi lam las ldang // dri rib mchog la 'jug par rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa
333a5(phal chen): sna yi lam las ldang // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang ba byed/
333a6(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba de dag bro mchog shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lce yi lam las ldang // lce nim
333a7(phal chen): skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba reg gi lam las ldang // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i reg la
333b1(phal chen): zhugs// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te//
333b2(phal chen): stong ba byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag rnying / bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang // chos sgrub 'jug par bya la rab tu thugs// 'jig rten
333b3(phal chen): lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang // sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed
333b4(phal chen): pa med par ston pa byed// byis pa'i lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // gzhon nu dar la bab pa'i lus su ldang // gzhon nu dar la bab par mnyam bzhag cing // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i
333b5(phal chen): lus su rnam par ldang // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus su rnam par ldang // dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cig/ dge bsnyen dang pa'i
333b6(phal chen): lus su rnam par ldang // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong ma yi lus su rnam par ldang // dge slong ma yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus
333b7(phal chen): su ldang // dge slong mang thos lus su mnyam bzhag cing / slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang // slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam bzhag cing // rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam
334a1(phal chen): par ldag/ rang rtul lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog phul du rnam par ldang // sangs rgyas su mchog phul la mnyam bzhag cig
334a2(phal chen): lha yi lus su de dag rnam par ldang // lha yi lus su de dag mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul chen klu li lus su rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen klu yi lus su mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul
334a3(phal chen): chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par ldang // 'byung po kun gyi lus su mnyam bzhag cing //
334a4(phal chen): spu rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang // spu rtse gcig gi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // spu rtse kun gyi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse gcig gi sgo
334a5(phal chen): nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse gcig gi sgo ni mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing // rdul phran gcig las de dag rnam par ldang //
334a6(phal chen): rdul dran gcig lnga de dag mnyam bzhug cing // rdul blam ma lus kun las rnam par ldang // rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mchi'i rdo rje gzhi las rnam par lda /
334a7(phal chen): rgya tsho'i rdo rje gni la mnyam banag cing // rin tshim shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang // rin chen shing gi 'bras la mnyam bzhag cing / rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang /
334b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i 'od zer skor ni mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu klung kun ras ldang // rgya mtsho chu klung kun la mnyam banag cing // bdag nyid che ba me yi lam las ldang // me yi lam/
334b2(phal chen): la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldeng // rlung gi lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sa yi gzhi las ldang // sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag
334b3(phal chen): byas shing // lha yi gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang // lha yi gzhal med khang du mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa klu yi gnas nas ldang // yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de
334b4(phal chen): ngag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su// bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo // rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min//
334b5(phal chen): 'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang // bsam gtan pa yi rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/
334b6(phal chen): de la 'dra ba'i dpe lnga yod min te// mkhas shing gsal ba'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis// bstan na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur// sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i// nyan
334b7(phal chen): thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur cing de bzhin gcig gyur te// nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha'i zhing 'bar/ 'og nas 'bar yang sbeng nas chu'i rgyur/ sdong
335a1(phal chen): nas me 'bar 'og nas chu'i rgyun// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te// skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de ni snying rje chen po ldan
335a2(phal chen): ma yin// byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// 'jig rten phan tshol ci phyirari de mi ston// nyi zla mkha' las rnam par//
335a3(phal chen): rgyu 'dong zhing // phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang // lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya mtsho snod// chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston pa byed// de bzhin bsam gyis
335a4(phal chen): mi khyab gzugs kun kyang // skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal// mtshe/
335a5(phal chen): gsal dang bar yan lag bzhi yi dpung // so so rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong // ral gri shang lang sogs ka mde'u thung mnga'// bzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas
335a6(phal chen): par mthong // gang gi gang gzugs cha byad ci 'dra ba// chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong // chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o//
335a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa'i rnams// de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyangs tshul shes// sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod// dbyangs
335b1(phal chen): ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can// 'on kyang skra gung dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas// gzugs drang chos kyi stobastsa la dbang thob rnams// 'jig rten lngar bcu sa ni phyir mgu mi
335b2(phal chen): byed// dga' byed chung ma smra san ldan pa mo// tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste// dam tshig bden sgrub mi tshe dga' bya yi// sems ling dag rnams byidan gyis rdob pa byed/
335b3(phal chen): sgra sman ldan pa 'dod chags ni sdang can// brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang // 'jig rten ying 'ong sngas kyang tshim par byed// ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston/
335b4(phal chen): sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed// nyin mtshan lung dang zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes
335b5(phal chen): pa ston// 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu mu'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab byang rnams// spyod pa'i tshul
335b6(phal chen): mkhas ni phyir dga' mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// lha min lha yang rung ste gang 'pham pa// de dag gzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par// go cha gyon bzhin
335b7(phal chen): 'jigs pas kun tu byer// lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang la gnas pa'i dpa' bo rnams/
336a1(phal chen): lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen glang chen dbang po'i 'khor gyur pa// mgo mang sum cu rtsa
336a2(phal chen): gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste// so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams// bdun bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed// rdzing rnams
336a3(phal chen): re re kun tu pad+mo rnams// bdun bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed// pad+mo re re la yang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo
336a4(phal chen): glu gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse// glang po che yang klu yi lus btang zhing // lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar dz+dza// spyod pa'i tshul dang
336a5(phal chen): ljongs spyod kun dang mthun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// shes rab thab
336a6(phal chen): kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams// ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed// sgra gcan ci dga'i tshul du lus rdzun// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing // rgya mtsho'i ja
336a7(phal chen): ring lte bar phyin tsam byed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron pa bdung mA yong 'dul ba//
336b1(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul mtha' las kyi ro ba snom mi byed// bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang ltos shig dang // lha dang ltung ba 'thub par gyur pa'i tshe// lha min bye ba 'byes pa ji snyed pa// de seng brgya byin
336b2(phal chen): rang gi lus 'phrul byed// lha min dbang po lha rin nga la kur gyis// brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'jug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces// lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myong //
336b3(phal chen): 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mag stong rab bstan te// rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'o// brgya byin mthong nas lha mon dbang po 'byar/
336b4(phal chen): de mi bsod nams phul gyi stobs dang mthus// lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i// bsod nams ma bzang rnams ko cir mi 'phrul/
336b5(phal chen): lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yod pa// lha yi lus rnams rnam par smin pas byung // lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas// mkha' las rnga li dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog
336b6(phal chen): 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan te// 'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin// srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos// bag med thams cad
336b7(phal chen): gcugs can mya ngan ldan// tsham gyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin// ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa'i rnams// bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yid// yongs su 'dzin pa tham/
337a1(phal chen): cang sdug bsngal rtsa// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis// chos la mos pas rtag tu
337a2(phal chen): dga' bar gyis// brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzang 'dun sar dong phyin te// lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams// 'dod chags bral
337a3(phal chen): dang rjes su mthun pa brjod// rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang // don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na// bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi don
337a4(phal chen): chen cir mi byed// lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur tshe// lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis// lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog/ lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes
337a5(phal chen): sgra yang sgrog/ rdzas bskul lnga rnams yongs su dga' ba ste// 'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// lha mi ni dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur nus// de ma thag tu
337a6(phal chen): 'jigs kying kun tu 'byed// de bzhin rdzu 'dra'i che med stobs pa'i rnams// 'gro bkun gyi migo ni dbang pung 'gyur te// bdud dang nam mongs bcom pa'i snying rjeHna// zhi ba'i sgra
337a7(phal chen): sgroganyon mongs rab tu sil// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes// gcig
337b1(phal chen): ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang // chos bzang 'dums kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang // brgya byin
337b2(phal chen): skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams draga' byed na// 'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir/
337b3(phal chen): 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun tu'o khri zhags kyis/
337b4(phal chen): so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rob ste// 'gro ba
337b5(phal chen): thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog/ stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang // stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na// ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang /
337b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog/ de ni 'jig rten pa yi tshungs lam gyi// bsum gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul// 'jig rten longs 'dras bla na med pa yi/
337b7(phal chen): bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba// skad cig gcig gis thams cad
338a1(phal chen): bgrang ba byed// thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bsam gyisna mi khyab tshul bsgrubs te// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams//
338a2(phal chen): ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// skad cig gcig la sems bsam shes mi 'gyur// sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas// rlung las 'jig rten thams cad song
338a3(phal chen): su byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang // sa bon rnams mang kun kyang de las byung // rlung las sprin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab// sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis
338a4(phal chen): 'gyur// lo tog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te// 'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed// de ni pha rol phyin lam bslabs te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs
338a5(phal chen): min na'ang // 'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na// rang nyam thob pa ci rob ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra sprin gyi chu tshogs ni// bya skrad rnams dang ji snyed ri
338a6(phal chen): dgas skad// khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad// thams cad sgra bzhin 'gro ba rnam par sgrog/ de bzhin sba brnyan rang bzhin smras shes nas// bsgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa
338a7(phal chen): rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun tu sgra brnyan brjod byas shing // 'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sbas tshim byed// rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'gro ba thams cad rgya
338b1(phal chen): dang mnyam snang zhing // chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad// chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med// de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar gsal te// bsod nams bsam ga na/
338b2(phal chen): rnam thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun// bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med// rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse byed na// sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur
338b3(phal chen): gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs// de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan// de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog tu sprin
338b4(phal chen): mang rnam par sgrub// 'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog/ mtshe mar mtho ni mthi bai DUR+Ya yi mdog/ sum cu gsum du asma
338b5(phal chen): gar ba 'dra// rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu// rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro// mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te// klu yi gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lnga
338b6(phal chen): bu// gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog/ ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te// gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston/
338b7(phal chen): 'dzam bu'i gling du rig nag 'dra bar te// sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang sgyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu dgyed/
339a1(phal chen): dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston// kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas
339a2(phal chen): su gser mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro// mri tsi gnas su mthon mthing bai DUrma// klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying /
339a3(phal chen): po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste// asma'i mdog tu lha mun gnas su'o// byang du ngang gis snang ba'i rin chen mdo// gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam bye
339a4(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an dA rI la// sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul mthun glog kyang 'gyed// de ni tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su/
339a5(phal chen): 'jug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rta yi dbyangs/ rol mo'i sngar yang dga' ldan gnas su skye// lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu'o// sbomacu gsum du mi ci'i skad du ste/
339a6(phal chen): rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du'o// ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho kun tu ste// mi 'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra// klu yi gnas su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra// gnod
339a7(phal chen): sbyin gnas su kru li bu mo'i sgra// lha min gnas su lha rdzas rdo yi sgra/ rgya mtsho shugs slar mi yi gnas su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas bsung zhim pa'i// me tog
339b1(phal chen): mchog brgyan mu par yang 'bebs thub brnang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul gar te/ me tog ma mngar ba'i 'phreng ba'i char 'bebs so// dga' ldan gnas su rinichen pa yin/
339b2(phal chen): rkyen gyi dam pa rin de du ma tshogs dang // gtsug gi rin chemathang 'dra ba dang // gser 'ong bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang /
339b3(phal chen): 'bring ba byug ba rgyan gyi dam pa dang / mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu/ rol mo yi 'ong char pa mtsho mar 'bebs/ sum cu gsum du rin chen sna tshogs te/
339b4(phal chen): tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang a ka ru/ gyur kum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la/ spos chu'i rgyan dang me tog 'dres par 'bab// nyams du 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyis rnams/
339b5(phal chen): kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang // de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang // rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang // char chung
339b6(phal chen): rgyun mi 'chang ba gnya' shing tsam// mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i// rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'brab// mi ci gnas su 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang // pad+mo
339b7(phal chen): ut+pal dngos dang rin chen dang // me tog bar shi ma li phye ma spos// pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro// klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste// gnod sbyin gnas su rin
340a1(phal chen): chen dang snang ba// lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung // dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so// byang du de ni 'phreng ba rin
340a2(phal chen): chen dang // me tog bar shi mra li tsam pa ka'i// 'phreng ba bzang po ku ran mug ta ka/ gling rnams gzhan du'angadra char pa sna tshogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling du chu' dang rab gsal
340a3(phal chen): gyi// char rnams chos bzhin shin tu phra bar 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu sman dang spros dang shing // lo zas de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed// de ltar sprin rnams bsam
340a4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab dang // glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam byed kyang / khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med// klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab// de ltar chu yi rgya mtsho
340a5(phal chen): gnas pa yang // klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// chos kyi rgya mtshor zhug pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston// dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam// skyes bu de dag yon tan brjod byas te//
340a6(phal chen): dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral// de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang sgyur ro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can// ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo/
340a7(phal chen): ldan pa'i// rnam thar das pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad// gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te/ mi yul kun na da ni dga' byed/ di dri cho 'i
340b1(phal chen): tshe dang byed pa// sos skye bo'i tshogs na 'du shin tu dkon// dge bas gas bsod nams byas pa de dag ni// rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yi ches 'gyur// gang nas
340b2(phal chen): nyan thos theg la'ang yid rgyas pa'i// mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste/ de bas rang rgyal theg la dad pa dkon// theg chen dang byed de bas shin tu dkon/
340b3(phal chen): theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste// 'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon// 'dzin cing spel byed spyos kyang ci dgos te// yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/
340b4(phal chen): la la stong gsum re deng mtshor bcas pa// bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang // 'di'i dri'i chos la dad par byed pa las// de 'dra de ni dka' bar brtsi ba ma len no//
340b5(phal chen): la la stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur na'ang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches drang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra
340b6(phal chen): de 'drad las min// la la zhing bcu'i dang mtshor bcas pa// lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i/
340b7(phal chen): dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches
341a1(phal chen): dang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/ la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// bskal drar bde ba kun gyis bsnyen
341a2(phal chen): bkur te// gal las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas nas/ bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags// rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu'i
341a3(phal chen): zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur// lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan// 'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge
341a4(phal chen): rnams// thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa// bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur// phyag gi
341a5(phal chen): mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ sangs rgyas de dag kun gyi gsung brjod pa/ rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyis// legs par bstan la rjes su nged
341a6(phal chen): dgyes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun no//
341a7(phal chen): bam po nyi shu pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang
341b1(phal chen): byung phyogs dang / byang shar mi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og
341b2(phal chen): go phyogs dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ngu gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang de bzhin gshe gos pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs
341b3(phal chen): par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis chos skyon cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so/
341b4(phal chen): nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma brtul bar byang chub kyi shing drung nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam
341b5(phal chen): par rgyal ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo // ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
341b6(phal chen): cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
341b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang
342a1(phal chen): bzhin seng ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can bog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa
342a2(phal chen): gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa gdugs stong shin tu bzung ba dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu sbyangs pa/ mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga'
342a3(phal chen): byas pa gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba 'od zer skyong
342a4(phal chen): phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal bar lce'i dbang
342a5(phal chen): po brgya byin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis
342a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas
342a7(phal chen): rjes dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su
342b1(phal chen): gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to//
342b2(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig
342b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang
342b4(phal chen): pa thams cad du glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan brgya phragi mang po dag btang ste/ zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
342b5(phal chen): pa de dag rjes su dran nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srungs rigs skyes pa/
342b6(phal chen): rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser thub bsgribs pa med pa ro rab tu gzigs
342b7(phal chen): pa de// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba
343a1(phal chen): 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thams cad
343a2(phal chen): mngar ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba// mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs
343a3(phal chen): rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mnon pa// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shris legs gyur cig/ bkra shrIs dam pa gang zhig gis/
343a4(phal chen): rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon// rin chen rgyun du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis//
343a5(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing bstan pa de// ma la ya yi rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'drir yang bkra shrIs legs gyur cig/ bkra shIs dam pa gang zhig gis//
343a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba// dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/
343a7(phal chen): grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla// dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po
343b1(phal chen): mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de// 'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sangs rgyas kyi/
343b2(phal chen): mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glu blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
343b3(phal chen): lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag grur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to//
343b4(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du
343b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus
343b6(phal chen): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de
343b7(phal chen): bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
344a1(phal chen): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu ngas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi/
344a2(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu
344a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang /
344a4(phal chen): dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros
344a5(phal chen): dang / dam pa'i blo gros drag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ong ba dag ste/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang /
344a6(phal chen): pad+mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog drang / ut+pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog drang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog
344a7(phal chen): dang ldum bu'i me tog dang / nam mkha'i me tog dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi nam ring na tshangs
344b1(phal chen): par spyod pa dag sde/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma nyams pa dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi bskul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa
344b2(phal chen): dang zla ba 'od zer dang / rdza ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te
344b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung
344b4(phal chen): bcas te 'khod do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lpags pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams
344b5(phal chen): cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad
344b6(phal chen): ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go// de bzhin gshegs pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi
344b7(phal chen): mthe bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkye ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de
345a1(phal chen): dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
345a2(phal chen): 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs
345a3(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di skad smras so// snang ba dri ma med la ltos// ri rab rtse mo thams cad la// mgon po dag ni rab tu snang // rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs// lha yi rgyal po thams cad
345a4(phal chen): kyis/ ta spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur// kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis// rab tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod// kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste// byang chub sems
345a5(phal chen): dpa' mang po lhags// phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing // yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod// kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin// 'jig rten
345a6(phal chen): khams kyi ming dag kyang // de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod bla med la// the tsom med
345a7(phal chen): par de dag spyod// kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig/ drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs// 'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na// rgyal ba 'di ni bzhugs snyam byed// bdag cag
345b1(phal chen): rnams ni 'di sam du// ba rtse la bde gshegs sam// 'jig rten khams rnams kun ma yang // sangs rgyas ngo mtshar drang re che// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ byung /
345b2(phal chen): chub mchog tu rnams btang zhing // de dag ston 'am 'ang btab rtse/ byang chub snang ba rab tu spyod// kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas// gang zag mchog ni sbyor byed kyang // chos
345b3(phal chen): kyi dbyings la ma chags te// de dag sus kyang mi shes so// gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing // thams cad dus su ma snang ba// de la 'dra ba gang yang med// de ni shes pa
345b4(phal chen): lngang rung/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dren pa rnams ni
345b5(phal chen): mthong nas kyang // bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mgon skyob de dag go/ chos nyid de ni shes pa min// mtshan ma dag la spyod pa'i rnams// gti mug dra ba 'phel bar
345b6(phal chen): 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor ba'i btson rar mdongs pa yin// chos rnams 'di dag brtags byas na// rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste/ skye dang shi 'phor
345b7(phal chen): gyur pa'i rnams// ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin// chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med// gang yang de bzhin skye ba med// chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang //
346a1(phal chen): gzung du med cing bltar med de// chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med// dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na// sangs rgyas rnams la tshad kyang med// tshad med pa yi chos
346a2(phal chen): rnams kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa// des ni ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar gyur pa gang yang med// gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// /
346a3(phal chen): de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang med mthong ngo // dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams// mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste// mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin/
346a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med// la la dag gi chos nyid shes// la la dag la chos kyang brjod// gang la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i// yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong // sangs
346a5(phal chen): rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid 'di// chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod de// de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam lus shes/ de nas byang chub sems dngam
346a6(phal chen): dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga'
346a7(phal chen): ba'i/ ye shes shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs// sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas/
346b1(phal chen): de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnams mi mi mthong ngo // shes rab chung ba thams cad ni// phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas// phung po rnam paras bsgoms pas/
346b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni// bdag gi dngos shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing / rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad
346b3(phal chen): ltos/ sngan chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du// ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba// ma 'ongs pa yi tshul shes pa// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// ji ltar snang ba med pa'i//
346b4(phal chen): mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang // de bzhin chos rnams ma bshad pa// mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo // ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis// gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba/
346b5(phal chen): de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa// rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba// de bzhin phug na gnas sems kyis/
346b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo // de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs// gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis// 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ba yin// /
346b7(phal chen): ji ltar kun blos sngon bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi bsnyengs pa// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong // de nas byang chub
347a1(phal chen): sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gnas med/
347a2(phal chen): pa yi chos rnams la// gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na// de phyir srid pa'i btson ra na// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor// brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos// blo zhan rnams
347a3(phal chen): kyis rnam par brtags// des ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas// bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chung ba'i lam nor cing / bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa/
347a4(phal chen): phyin ci log gi blo dag gris// mi bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed// gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga // chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
347a5(phal chen): mig kyang de la yod pa min// de bas mig ni sbyang bar gyis// bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par soms// gang phyir bdag cag sngan chad du// bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos// /
347a6(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na'ang // gang gis sems la chags med pa// des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong // gang gis shes rab che mngag/
347a7(phal chen): bta/ chos su bde gshegs mthong ba'i rnams// de dag 'jig rten mig can te// gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya// lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni// chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste//
347b1(phal chen): lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na// thams cad mthong ba med pa yin// kye mu chos kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni rang bzhin thams cad du// shi ba
347b2(phal chen): med cing 'tsher med/ sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba// dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te// de las bdag gis thos nas kyang // sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur
347b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam par rtog la spyod po yi// mig ni shin tu
347b4(phal chen): 'khrul pa yin// 'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste// sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'// gang gis log par shes gyur te// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la// yang dag ma yin bden
347b5(phal chen): shes na// sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag gis dri mar gyur// rnam par mthong na de med de// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral// de bas rnam par gzigs shes
347b6(phal chen): bya/ de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste// 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags// 'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na// snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni/
347b7(phal chen): 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing // de ltar mthong nas mthong ba'o// de ltar mthong na nyon mongs med// dbang du gyur cing zag pa med// gang
348a1(phal chen): gis tha dad med mthong ba// dngos por brtags pa ma yin no// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma
348a2(phal chen): yin pas// rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin// de dag rang bzhin rnam par drag/ nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med// de dag la ni ston pa med// mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar
348a3(phal chen): ltos// chos rnams la ni mos med de// chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing // shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa// des ni thub chen mthong ba yin// ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa//
348a4(phal chen): de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong // de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par ni// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis
348a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad/
348a6(phal chen): med do// rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'// 'jig rten mthar byin rgal ba'o// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar// bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas// ji ltar mkhas pas
348a7(phal chen): mthong ba bzhin// 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs// 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma// so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs// nam mkha'i khams ni bzung byas shing // de dag
348b1(phal chen): de phyir khom pa med// 'om pa med ces bya ba ni// ci grang brjod du med pa ste// khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ khom pa bsam gyis mi khyad thog gang la dngos po med/
348b2(phal chen): ba la/ mi zad 'om pa med par ba gang // yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// des ni grags chen mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong zhes bya/ yong ba med
348b3(phal chen): pa'ang yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni// ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par bsgoms// ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba// de dag gis ni lba bo bshig/ gang las
348b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas spros pa yi// de dag chos rnams zhig pa med// ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten sdang bar byed//
348b5(phal chen): rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan// des ni brtson blo brtan pa de// chos mang bye ba rab tu
348b6(phal chen): ston// yod dang med pa shes byas te/ gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa// des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste// yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas/ de nas
348b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rje thos kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas to// de'i tshetshogs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/
349a1(phal chen): snang ba bdag cag shes par gyur/ phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba ste// yang dgas sa rgyas nges kyang mthong // sems can rang bzhin yod gyu ga/ de /
349a2(phal chen): sems can g.yangs ste// 'di la ci yang yod pa min// tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rnams// bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la/
349a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas sdang bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa bzung ba med// yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa// de dag bskal pa grangs
349a4(phal chen): med du// srid pa'i gang chen mtshon 'khor// nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang // rang bzhin rnyed
349a5(phal chen): par mi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te// mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dag ni mi shes s+ho// 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba
349a6(phal chen): 'di// 'di srin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi bo'i rang bzhin ji lta bar// gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa/
349a7(phal chen): des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong // chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du ba/
349b1(phal chen): rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med// thog ma dag dang tha mar yang // 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na// de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod/
349b2(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
349b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyan pa'i phyir// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par// sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla// de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab// ci phyir zhe na bskal pa'i rnams//
349b4(phal chen): grangs med sdug bsngal sngan chad byung // 'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas// bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo// de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams// yang dag nyid du rdzogs gyur te/
349b5(phal chen): gang la 'grogs pa med pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub bla na med// sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa// sngan chad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos//
349b6(phal chen): de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du// gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs pa// yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong /
349b7(phal chen): yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs/ yang dag min par yang dag min// 'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes kyang bya// khong du ma chung chos bstan te/
350a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsgoms pa ste/ gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no// de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa
350a2(phal chen): mang po dag tu rnam par shes/ gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas// byas pa med cing byed pa med// las kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms
350a3(phal chen): shing // las 'di ji bzhin shes byas na// rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas// gnas pa med/
350a4(phal chen): pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs
350a5(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can chen po bla na med// sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// 'jug par bya ba gang
350a6(phal chen): yang med// de bas bla na med ces bya// gang la phra ba yod min pa// de la sdom pa'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes// rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas//
350a7(phal chen): gang zhig sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// de la phra ba yod pa min// yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral// de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa rnams ni rnam gsal cing // de bzhin/
350b1(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang // de la snang ba grang yang med// mi snang ba dang ci yang med// thams cad chos la kun nas dga'// skyes pa med cing gnas pa med// 'dod chas/
350b2(phal chen): med cing brten pa med// chos nyid de yang sbed pa med// gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing // gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi// shes rab
350b3(phal chen): chen po legs par mthong // mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med// gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// byis
350b4(phal chen): pas byang chub mi shes kyang // de dag dri la rab tu gnas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// rang gi lus ni rjes su blta// lus med pa ni lus su bshad/
350b5(phal chen): 'byung ba med cing bstan du med// 'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa// sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med// sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid// de skad bden pa'i blo smras te/
350b6(phal chen): de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs// shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs
350b7(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas to// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir/ skyes bu drang srong mchog gi rnams/ dpa' tshan sems can gtso bo dag
351a1(phal chen): 'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung // thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de// sems can khams la rnam gzigs kyang // srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i//
351a2(phal chen): sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na// yang dag sangs rgyas dpa' mnga' ba// sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par// skyob pa gzhan
351a3(phal chen): ni gang yang med// gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ med na 'jig rten khams kun na// sems can bde ba gcig mi 'byung // sems
351a4(phal chen): can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ 'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu// gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthong ba/
351a5(phal chen): de dag 'thob pa legs par thob// gang gis thos shing dang 'gyur ba// de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no// gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa// bdag cag rnams kyis 'thob legs thob//
351a6(phal chen): 'di dang 'dra ba'i tshul thos pas// kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs
351a7(phal chen): pas/ nye spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas// da rung phyir zhing dad pa skye// de yi ye shes mtha' yas pas// da rung brjod du yod pa min// gang gis
351b1(phal chen): mchog gi blo sbas dang // rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa'i rnams// de dag da rung bdag gis kyang // bskal ba bas ma yas bshad par bya// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas/
351b2(phal chen): bal po che zhes bya ba las/ ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
351b3(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po nyi shu gcig pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros de'i tshe/
351b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
351b5(phal chen): sbyor ba mtha' las pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/
351b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed kun kyang chos kyi blo gros shes bya bar mthur pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas
351b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so legs so//
352a1(phal chen): de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis/ bcom
352a2(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
352a3(phal chen): ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang / bslabs pa med
352a4(phal chen): pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams
352a5(phal chen): cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bston pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa
352a6(phal chen): mdzad kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spob pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
352a7(phal chen): de dag gisabyang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// thogs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chod pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do//
352b1(phal chen): rmongs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tha dad pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kha na mtho ba med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dpag tu med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// bum pa med /
352b2(phal chen): banye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// 'phrog pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid do// ba'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
352b3(phal chen): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag gis reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'
352b4(phal chen): chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs shes bya ba 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
352b5(phal chen): klas la/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/
352b6(phal chen): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub
352b7(phal chen): sems dpa' brtson par byed pa gang la bsams te/ de skad du smras pa de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das
353a1(phal chen): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go// bcu gang
353a2(phal chen): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang
353a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam/
353a4(phal chen): ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
353a5(phal chen): dgod pa dang / rgyal tshob kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
353a6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba
353a7(phal chen): dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan
353b1(phal chen): 'das rnams mthong nas mdzes pa dang / bzang ba dang / mig tu 'ong ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dka' ba dang / mthu che bar mthong ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
353b2(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba 'am/ sems can sdug bsngal pa mthong ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
353b3(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dri bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed
353b4(phal chen): pa dang po des ni thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa dang /
353b5(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam paza dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang mos pa dum shes pa dang //
353b6(phal chen): khams tha dad pa dang khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas
353b7(phal chen): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / rjes su dram pa bsgribs pa med pa shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa med pa
354a1(phal chen): shes pa'o// thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su zin par 'gyur te/ de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
354a2(phal chen): ngag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi
354a3(phal chen): nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// zil gyis mi gnon pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis bdag nyid
354a4(phal chen): che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'khor ba'i
354a5(phal chen): 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
354a6(phal chen): de bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
354a7(phal chen): 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye
354b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar gzhog ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sems nye bar
354b2(phal chen): gzhog go// snying brtse ba'i sems dang bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan 'dog pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems
