354b3(phal chen): dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// rnam pa bcu po de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar gzhog ste/
354b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de ni thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su
354b5(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o// mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dge ba'i
354b6(phal chen): bshos su gyur nAs nga lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// nga lo bde bar gyur nas 'du shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul
354b7(phal chen): bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// don shes nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar
355a1(phal chen): gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na
355a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid
355a3(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
355a4(phal chen): dag/ de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcus chos thams
355a5(phal chen): cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi rtags pa dang / chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
355a6(phal chen): bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang / chos thams cad myong ba med pa dang chos thams cad brda med pa dang / chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang chos
355a7(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la ched du byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de//
355b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi
355b2(phal chen): khams sdug pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sa
355b3(phal chen): khams brtag pa la yongs su bamyal bar byo'o// chu'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// me'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rlung gi khams brtag
355b4(phal chen): ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul brdob 'o// gzugs kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar ba'o// gzugs med
355b5(phal chen): pa'i khams bdag pa la yongs su bskul brnyabya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de de bas kyang chos la snang ba 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kya de la bdag nyid rtsor bar bya ba dang /
355b6(phal chen): bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di mi rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o//
355b7(phal chen): kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhen kye rgyal ba'i sras dgo 'od la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la yos su sim
356a1(phal chen): pa bcus skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos la nges pa rtogs pa
356a2(phal chen): dang sems can rnam par bsgoms pa dang / zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / las rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam
356a3(phal chen): par bsgoms pa dang / 'khor ba rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs su smin pa bcu po 'di dag gis 'phags pa'i gsung rab la skyes pa
356a4(phal chen): yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// de ltar cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnam par
356a5(phal chen): bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la
356a6(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrubs pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
356a7(phal chen): bsgrubs par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// 'das
356b1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul
356b2(phal chen): bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul
356b3(phal chen): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan
356b4(phal chen): gyi drong la 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'dri ni cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la
356b5(phal chen): sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems can
356b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad bde bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la snying
356b7(phal chen): brtse bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad
357a1(phal chen): la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad drang ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams
357a2(phal chen): cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
357a3(phal chen): dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni sems can mtha' yas pa brjod par bya'o// sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can grangs med pa
357a4(phal chen): brjod par bya'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par bya'o// sems can gzugs med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can stong pa
357a5(phal chen): brjod par bya'o// sems can byed pa med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dngos po med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i
357a6(phal chen): sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa la mi gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/
357a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang/
357b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyam ma bsam pa nges pa rab tu 'thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltu sangs rgyas la
357b2(phal chen): sngar bu'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin chos la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin byung
357b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi
357b4(phal chen): chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon
357b5(phal chen): mongs pa dang sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar sla ba dang sems can gyi khams skyo bar
357b6(phal chen): dka' ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings chung ba 'am chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings
357b7(phal chen): 'grub pa 'am chos kyi dbyings 'jig par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa 'am chos kyi dbyings med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa/
358a1(phal chen): nges pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drag/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ de ltar bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
358a2(phal chen): dpa' de la chos la 'jug pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po med//
358a3(phal chen): pa dang / chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad brdzun pa dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
358a4(phal chen): chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad rtog pa med par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shas cher mi 'phrogs pa la rnam par bsgrub par bya ba dang //
358a5(phal chen): gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i
358a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang
358a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe brtan pa rab tu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas yod ces 'am/ sangs rgyas med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las
358b1(phal chen): phyir mi ldog go// chos yod ce 'am/ chos med ces na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod ce 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
358b2(phal chen): mod ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpo'i spyod
358b3(phal chen): ba la mi 'byung zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'das she na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir
358b4(phal chen): ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa byon ce 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas pa
358b5(phal chen): ltar byung ba ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad mi shes so zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zung shes so zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos
358b6(phal chen): las phyir mi ldog go// dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ dus gsum mtshan nyid tha dad ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'din phyir mi
358b7(phal chen): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos 'byam klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad
359a1(phal chen): par 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o// mang po las tha dad par brjod par bya'o// don dang mthun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o// yi ge dang 'thun pa'i don brjod par bya'o//
359a2(phal chen): dngos po med pa yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// dngos po yod pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o//
359a3(phal chen): mtshan ma mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtsham nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan nyid mtshan nyid med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par
359a4(phal chen): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang shas cher mkhas pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag
359a5(phal chen): nyid gzhan gyi dring mo 'jog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal
359a6(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ de la gzhon nur pA'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/
359a7(phal chen): 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba sgrub pa yin
359b1(phal chen): sems can gnan gyis bsam pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyi mos pas rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin gyi rlabs tha dad pa rab tu
359b2(phal chen): rtogs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang 'jig pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gar dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'din gzhon dur gyur pa'i bya
359b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
359b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyod pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyis rlabs brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par
359b5(phal chen): brgyu ba brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mnan pa brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// chos grangs med pa yongs su dri ba brjod par
359b6(phal chen): bya'o// yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o// dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye ba brjod par bya'o// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur
359b7(phal chen): bar bya ba brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de bas kyang shes cher chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i mkhas pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya
360a1(phal chen): ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
360a2(phal chen): par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu
360a3(phal chen): rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/
360a4(phal chen): bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyad pa
360a5(phal chen): rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig
360a6(phal chen): rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub
360a7(phal chen): sems dpa' ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba de la ni gnas bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o//
360b1(phal chen): rnam bu'i gnas kyi tshul brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o// rgyal ba'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su snang ba brjod par bya'o/
360b2(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po byin brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o//
360b3(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sem pasgrib pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang
360b4(phal chen): thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drug/ 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
360b5(phal chen): ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyong
360b6(phal chen): pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya'o
360b7(phal chen): sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig
361a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can
361a2(phal chen): grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa yongs su gzud pa'i sems mang
361a3(phal chen): ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par mi nus te/ lus kyi las
361a4(phal chen): shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par mi nus so// 'das pa blta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// ma 'ongs pa blta ba 'am shes par mi nus
361a5(phal chen): so// da ltar byung ba blta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus so// sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so// ye shes kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa'/
361a6(phal chen): rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
361a7(phal chen): dbang bskur ba de la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs
361b1(phal chen): rgyamasams byas gas ga dang yang du rgyas kyi byings nagasu bskyed pa bad pa mdzar/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus me pa brjod pa mdza dang / 'jig
361b2(phal chen): mas thams cad rgyas pa gang ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba brjod pa yang da / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa
361b3(phal chen): brjod pa mdzadang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas mtha'
361b4(phal chen): yas pa brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang
361b5(phal chen): bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems
361b6(phal chen): dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te
361b7(phal chen): g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go/
362a1(phal chen): chemachen rab tu che mchem kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// wa/ rab tu 'a3/ kun tu 'ur bur ro// shig shig
362a2(phal chen): rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon
362a3(phal chen): bar bab bo// lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
362a4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi snang
362a5(phal chen): ba rab tu byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grag par gyur to// gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams
362a6(phal chen): cad du'ang phyogs bcur rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
362a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'
362b1(phal chen): rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kun kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtsham chos
362b2(phal chen): kyi blo grom shes bya ba sha stag gi zhum ring 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag nas 'dir byin te/ thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid la
362b3(phal chen): gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing lhag chad med par ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar
362b4(phal chen): bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dir phyin to// ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
362b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par gyur
362b6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i
362b7(phal chen): tshe tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba// sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing // mtshan bzang thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas/
363a1(phal chen): byang chub don du brtan pa sems sgyur ro// dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang // yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste// srid lam kun tu sdug
363a2(phal chen): bsngal gyur mthong zhing / byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mnga' ba// kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing // nam mkha'i dbyings
363a3(phal chen): mnyam rtog pa med pa yi// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// khams gsum kun na gnas ni 'di dag yin// gnas min rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes// ma nor dngos
363a4(phal chen): po khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// 'das dang mu 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang // dkar gnag las rnams ji snyed yod pa dag/ de kun mnyam nyid rjes su
363a5(phal chen): rtog bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang // mnyam gzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang rnam par ldang
363a6(phal chen): pa khong du chung bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang // brtson 'grus stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba// rnam pa sna tshogs
363a7(phal chen): de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// sems can kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam pa kun tu
363b1(phal chen): thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// 'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang // 'jig rten kun gyi khams mang dus dag/ khams
363b2(phal chen): kyi rang bani na rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir / bcad pa byang chub rje du sems sbyar ro// susu tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams kyi 'dra dang / lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi
363b3(phal chen): chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir// brten pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'das pa'i dus na gang rnams ci byung yang // mtshan nyid gang yin ci 'dra ci dngos pa
363b4(phal chen): na gyi gnas rnams rjes su rnags bya phyir// gartan pa byung chub den du sems stong ro/ 'jig rtem kun na kun myor ji med dang // don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags ba'i
363b5(phal chen): mas yang bya pa rnam shes sa kyas ga namasas rgya/ 'grub yang gdags pa dang // tshig la sa sa dus drub
363b6(phal chen): brda'i bded pa rjes su rnags pa'i phyir// btan pa byang chub da dusams / cho thams kyi chung brjod du med pa dang // tshang ba byed med pa pa
364a1(phal chen): de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho thams
364a2(phal chen): cad yongs su bskyam bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan po byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// spu rje re re'i sgo nas 'od zer rnams/
364a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu guno tu rdo ltar dgye bya bar// de 'dra'i rang bzhi khong du chung bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi
364a4(phal chen): khyab pa// bdag gi lag pa'i mthil du gzhag bya bar/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// ji ltar zhing gi sems can
364a5(phal chen): yangs pa kun// gnod pa med par skra rtser gzhog byed par// srog med chos rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen
364a6(phal chen): gang rgyas pa// skra rtses blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar// mthar thug ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi
364a7(phal chen): rnams// rdul blags ma lus bgrang bya bar// rdul phran grangs rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sgyur ro// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs
364b1(phal chen): dang 'jig rted tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te// bskul bzang cing gnas pa shes pa'i phyir// btam pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
364b2(phal chen): ba dang // rna la sras rang tshul nyan thos thams cad kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chung po'i phyir/ bcad pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// brjod du med pa'i 'jig ched khams kyi rnams/
364b3(phal chen): mA yi zhwa gams bcings shing tshad gang ba par/ dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// brjod med khor yug shim tu langs pa dag
364b4(phal chen): ba spu'i khung du ji ltar gzung ba bar/ pra dang langs pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ ji ltar
364b5(phal chen): dbyangs gcig kun tu grags 'gyur bar// dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems skur ro// sems can kun gyi sgra skang ji snyed pa/ dbyangs
364b6(phal chen): gcig brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar// sgra yi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'jig rten thams cad ma lus shes byed cing // ji ltar 'gro kur
364b7(phal chen): zhi zhes bstod 'gyur ba// lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad rab tu 'tshig pa dang // kun nas gnas pa ma lus
365a1(phal chen): mthong 'gyur bar// rnam rtog chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sgyur ro// zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du/
365a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar/ rang byung chos ni rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phrar blags pa/
365a3(phal chen): de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar// thams cad yid kyi dngos su shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sgyur ro// kun gzigs 'das pa ji snyed byung ba dang // ma
365a4(phal chen): byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa'i rnams// skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// chog gcig brtsams te brjod cing
365a5(phal chen): bshad byas kyang / bskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar// chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chung bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
365a6(phal chen): rten ma lus rnams// 'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag/ sems kyi rab bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// lus dpa ga dang de bzhin yid kyis
365a7(phal chen): kyang // phyogs kun spyod tshe chags par mi 'gyur bar// dus gsum stong pa khong du chung bya'i phyir/ brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed pa/
365b1(phal chen): rgyun pa chunas ma rgyas brjod du da bdun/ mchod par byal langasasu myu ba bya/ na rgya ma ldog gi gdusus lan/ 'khor ba dgan byang chub dran spyong du/ byang rgyub
365b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i bde ba ji snyid pa// de dag de la yongs su brjod pa rag// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams dag go// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ji myed pa// phyogs bcu'i tha dang tshad ming
365b3(phal chen): yod pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos// 'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i
365b4(phal chen): chos// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan// 'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go// gzhan gyis mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa// 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non rnams//
365b5(phal chen): de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon po'i bdag nyid che ba kun// de la byang
365b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de bzhag ste/ 'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go// sangs rgyas grangs med brjod du med pa dang // ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang / byang chub
365b7(phal chen): sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa// de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par/ byang chub sems dpa' de la
366a1(phal chen): bstan par bya// 'din phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang /
366a2(phal chen): 'jig rten kun gyis chags par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya// sems can sdug bsngal gzer ba ji snyed dang // ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi/
366a3(phal chen): skyabs dang mgon dang rten du 'gyur bar yang / byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// rnam pa 'dre 'dras rgyal sras dang po de// byang chub dron du sems rab skyer gyur te/
366a4(phal chen): ltar gdams ngag rjes su bstan par bya// 'dra ni rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam bkod pa'o// de nas gnyis pa las kyis dang po pa// thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la/
366a5(phal chen): sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon byed pa// 'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go// phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems// snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sem//
366a6(phal chen): bsrung ba'i sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems// de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar bzhag pa la// kha don lung la yongs su bskul ba rla
366a7(phal chen): mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul// dben par gyur pas dge ba shes pa snyen 'gyur bya// dge ba shes gyur nas dang bder 'gyur bar bya// ngang tshul bde bas dus tshul shes par bya/
366b1(phal chen): dus rnams shes nas pa 'jugs 'gyur ba da // mi 'jigs gyu nas ngon la brtson padag// ngan shes gyur nas chos rjes shes pad // chos shes myang das rmongs pa med parang /
366b2(phal chen): mamed dus lags par bag rjes lo// rgyal sras des ni rnam pa gnas par bya// rngatsas gyis rna las kyi dang pa pa// byang chub das thugs byang chub sems dpa
366b3(phal chen): gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te// sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson/
366b4(phal chen): mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid// bdag med de bzhin byed pa med pa dang // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang // 'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang // ched du spyod med
366b5(phal chen): de bzhin rtog med par// kun la byang chub sems dpa' dpyod pa byed// de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang // de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya// 'jig rten khams
366b6(phal chen): yangs ma lus mthar thug pa// brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// sa dang me dang de bzhin chu rnams dang // de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs
366b7(phal chen): dang de bzhin gzugs med pa// brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing // khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas/ byang chub
367a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa// des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no// cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di la skyes
367a2(phal chen): pa ste// dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs dran pa can// chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes// de yi gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa
367a3(phal chen): yin// chos rnams de bzhin nges par rtogs pa ste// sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par sgom// chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang // rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan
367a4(phal chen): 'das// rnam sgom rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa// thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras shes bya// 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa'i
367a5(phal chen): phyir// yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug dang // de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas/
367a6(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug/ de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi pa ste// de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de 'dra'o// de ltar 'di la nan tan
367a7(phal chen): bsgrub byas shing // byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung // de las gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs shes brjod pa ste// thabs mkhas tshul la
367b1(phal chen): rjes su zhugs gyur cig/ bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar byin byed// 'jig rten dgu na bsod nams gang byed kyang // sems cam kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang // par tshol/
367b2(phal chen): de bzhin bde bsrung ba dang // snying brtse skye dgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi gtso ba bsal ba dang // drang zhing de bzhin ngang bar bya ba dang // sems can mang po thams
367b3(phal chen): cad gdul mos shing // mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang // de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang // bsam gyis
367b4(phal chen): mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa// de 'dra'i chos rnams de la brjod par bya// de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can// de yi gdams ngag tshul ni /
367b5(phal chen): 'dra ste// yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa yin// gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing / rnam chog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa
367b6(phal chen): de// lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis bslu mi nus// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung // sems can nyung zhe 'am 'on tam mang
367b7(phal chen): zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur// sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs med ce 'am// gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang // chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang /
368a1(phal chen): kun nas 'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig me 'am/ chos dbyings de ni yod ngam med ces kyang / byang chub sems dngapas thos myur dus gsum tshul// nges par
368a2(phal chen): rtogs byed thams cad rnam rtog cing // sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang // dngos med yod min brdzun pa bden pa dang // sgyu ma rmi lam gyi
368a3(phal chen): rtog rang bzhin med// 'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyanang byed// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / spyod pa yod med rtag tu
368a4(phal chen): rnam par bsgom// 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das dang // ma byon to zhe'am ma byon ma yin dang // skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi
368a5(phal chen): 'gyur// de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin// gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang // don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos rnams dang // thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byed pa// /
368a6(phal chen): mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya// mtshan ma med la mtshan gyis dmigs pa dang // rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba'i rnams// thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed/
368a7(phal chen): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kun gyis// kha na mthor 'gyur ba nam yang med// ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed// gzhar
368b1(phal chen): gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes// de dag mos pa yongs su rtogs par byed// phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa// kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin thob/ bde bar
368b2(phal chen): gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos shing // de la zhum paskyed pa gang yang med// zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang // de bzhin bye ni rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang // sangs/
368b3(phal chen): rgyas zhing rnams yongs su mnan pa dang // grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya// grangs med chos rnams yongs su dri ba dang // ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing // dubya
368b4(phal chen): kyi rnam pa shin tu langs 'gyur dang // sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa ni// sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu
368b5(phal chen): shes// nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes// de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can// chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang // sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phyi dang //
368b6(phal chen): brda yi bden pa don dam bden pa dang // ma lus rtogs par bya lo mkhas pa yin// de ni rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul// der yang ji ltar yongs su sbyang bya dang // 'gro bar
368b7(phal chen): bya dang gnas par bya ba dang // rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod// de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang // byin gyis brlabs dang de bzhin mthu chen dang // chos su gnas
369a1(phal chen): dang 'gro bar bya ba dag/ brjod par bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra yin// de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste// gangams ngag des kyang rlom sems byed pa med/
369a2(phal chen): khong du chung byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de// rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob pa byed// bde gshegs sras po gtso bor dbang bskur ba// thu bo mchog dang dam par gyur pa ni// 'jig
369a3(phal chen): rten khams mang grangs med bskyod pa dang // yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang // byin gyis brlab dang yongs su 'da' bya dang // yongs su sbyang ba'i sems kyang rab tu
369a4(phal chen): mang grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang // dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas// de dag gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang
369a5(phal chen): shin tu mang // zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing // dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam par dpyod// de yi lus dang lus kyi las rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang
369a6(phal chen): shes par mi nus te// dus gsum shin tu rgyu ba'i sems dag kyang // rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyis shes mi nus// de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang /
369a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod// chos dbyings mtha' las mtha' dang dbus med pa// rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad// ci nas
369b1(phal chen): 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par// yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang // sems can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang / sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa
369b2(phal chen): mdzad/ rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bablangs po// rnam par dgod la gnas pa de dag kun/ rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa/ 'jig rten lhur bcas
369b3(phal chen): kun gyis shes par dka'// 'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pas// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad rgyas par bya// dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong
369b4(phal chen): ba// de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur// zhor rnams kun la mu mtha' yod pa min// sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin// las dang nyon mongs gnas/
369b5(phal chen): kyang mtha' yas te// byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin// skad cig sems la byang chub gzhol ba'i sems// gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus//
369b6(phal chen): rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min// de nus gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod// gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// spus bcings srang la tshad du
369b7(phal chen): 'jal byed pa// des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes// 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol// phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun//
370a1(phal chen): #/ spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa// de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'dri 'dra dag/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sgrub par byed/
370a2(phal chen): ji ltar zhing rnams rdul rab phrar glags shing // sems can la la ma lus bgrang byed de// 'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa// de 'dra rgyal
370a3(phal chen): sras spyod pa brjod pa'o// 'dras pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang // gang rnams phyogs bcur byung bar gyur pa dang // rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos
370a4(phal chen): rab mang bar// rnam par dmigs shing byang chub sems skye'o// sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas bkang zhing // byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa/
370a5(phal chen): de yang bgrang bar nus pa ma yin na// de las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las byang
370a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
